The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak that multi-hits two to five times. Can random critical hit.
目标被角或喙连续刺击，连续攻击2-5次。有可能随机命中要害。

The user takes off at sonic speeds, raising its Speed by four steps and gaining the Flying type.
以音速起飞，速度增加4级并获得飞行属性。
Attacks while clearing weather. This move fails in the absence of a weather.
在消除天气的同时攻击敌方。如果没有天气的话，该技能会失败。

使用者以空气之箭攻击目标，有40%概率使目标畏缩。
The user attacks the target while dashing skillfully past it.
巧妙地掠过对手，同时以熟练的技巧向其发起攻击。
Chaotic winds push the target around, dizzying it.
释放出混乱之风，把对手吹得晕头转向，使其陷入混乱。

每只队伍中的精灵各攻击1次，造成的伤害基于它们的特攻。

使用风迅速地将目标原地旋转，连续攻击2-5次。
The target is struck with large, imposing wings. The user also takes 20% recoil.
大大地展开美丽的翅膀，将其撞向对手进行攻击。承受20%的反伤。

使用者向目标投掷强酸。有20%的概率减小目标的特防。

将使用者和目标浸泡在酸液中，这会使使用者的双防减小2级。

在触碰的过程中感染对方，并破坏其身上携带的香草类物品。

以带有腐蚀性的拳头发起攻击，能破坏对手的宝石和树果。
Grips the target with its entire mouth. The user is exhausted on the next turn unless the target faints or switches out.
用整个口腔咬住目标。若目标未濒死或替换，下1回合将陷入僵直状态。

通过分泌厚厚的粘液来保护自身，从而增加自身的特防5级。

偷取对方的血液，减小其攻击，如果成功了，同时增加自身的攻击。
A Grey Mist covers the battlefield. For five turns, stats are reset at the end of each turn.
在接下来的5个回合内，每回合结束时全部精灵的能力会变回原点。
The user attacks while slathered in grime. This poisons the user.
在身上涂满污垢后进行攻击。同时，也会使自身中毒。
The user uses venom that turns the target's body against it. Super effective vs Fighting-types.
用毒液使对手的身体发生异变，对格斗属性的精灵效果拔群。

使用者用一股恶臭的风包围目标。有30%的概率使目标中毒。

The user shoots the target with a dart made of poison. This move always goes first.
使用毒药制成的飞镖攻击对手。
The user lays a hazard layer of poison spikes on the foe's side. One layer hurts switched in foes, two layers poisons.
使用者在对手一侧放置一层毒菱。一层会使替换进入的对手受伤，两层会使对手中毒。
The user attacks with cloying slime, rendering the target's item sticky and unusable.
投掷令人作呕的黏液攻击，使对手的物品变得黏糊且无法使用。
Attacks with energy from jealousy. All opposing Pokémon with stat boosts get poisoned.
用嫉妒的能量攻击对手。会让在该回合内能力有所增加的精灵陷入中毒状态。
The user gives off a terrible stench towards the target. It has a 30% chance to dizzy.
使用者向目标释放恶臭。有30%的概率使对手混乱。
The foe is forced to switch out by a stinky cloud, then the user also switches. Always goes last.
对手被臭云强迫替换，随后使用者也会替换。总是最后行动。

使用有毒的牙齿进行咬击。同时回复造成1/3伤害的HP。
The target is given a Black Sludge, replacing their item if any. Their Sp. Def is lowered.
将对手携带的物品变成黑色污泥，并减小对手的特防。

本回合受到攻击的伤害减半，并让攻击到自身的对手陷入中毒。

通过向目标喷射泥土和碎片进行攻击。

使用者稳定姿态。物攻、特防和命中率增加2级。

The user propels itself forward with a wave of mud which also slams into the target. The user's Speed is raised.
使用者借助泥波向前冲刺，同时撞击目标。使用者的速度会增加1级。

The user attacks while balled up. This counts as a usage of Fury Cutter, Rock Roll, or Snowball.
在攻击时卷成一团。将计入连斩，岩石滚动，或雪球的使用次数。
The user shapes primal clay to heal a nearby ally for their max HP. This can overheal. The user is exhausted on the next turn.
用原初黏土为队友恢复全部HP，可以过量回复。下1回合将陷入僵直状态。
The user hits a pitch that turns earth and stone to dust, damaging its foes.
使用能够将泥土和石头化为粉尘的音调，对对手造成伤害。
The user hits the target with each of its heads from underground. Strikes three times.
从地下用每个头部攻击对手，连续攻击3次。
The user causes the earth to rumble, striking every Pokémon around it and underground.
使大地颤动，攻击周围以及地下的所有精灵。
The user blasts the target with highly pressurized sand. Can random critical hit.
使用者用高压沙粒攻击目标。可能随机命中要害。
The user tosses hot desert sand on the target. It has a 10% chance to burn.
向对手投掷炎热的沙漠沙子，10%概率使其烧伤。
Hits the target with a sandy wind, then summons sandstorm for eight turns.
用风沙攻击对手，然后召唤持续8回合的沙暴天气。
The user slathers mud around to heal itself for half of their max HP, and extends any active screens by one turn.
使用者涂抹泥浆来恢复自身最大HP的一半，并增加任何已激活的屏障类效果1回合。
The user attacks by flattening the target into the ground. The target's stat step changes are returned to normal.
将对方狠狠压在地上，使其能力变化恢复到正常水平。
The user tramples the target. It has a 20% chance to lower the target's Speed stat.
猛然踩踏对手，20%概率减小对手的速度。
The user attacks the opposing Pokémon by trampling it. It has a 20% chance to lower Speed.
践踏对手进行攻击。20%概率减小对手的速度。
The user slams the earth, damaging all Pokémon around it and underground.
猛锤大地，震击周围以及地下所有精灵。
The user burrows deep, charging and becoming invulnerable, then attacks with devastating power on the second turn.
第1回合深潜蓄力进入无敌状态，下1回合发动毁灭性攻击。
The user slams the target with their rock-hard body.
用坚硬的身体猛击对手。
The user smashes its rock-hard head into the target. The user also takes 33% recoil.
用自身坚硬的头撞击目标。但会承受33%的反作用伤害。
The user bludgeons the target's arms and legs with a large rock. This has a 50% chance to fracture it.
使用者用大石头猛击目标的手臂和腿。有50%的概率使其进入破碎。
Protects the user from damage this turn. The user will counter with Granite Head if attacked.
保护自身本回合免受伤害，如果受到攻击，将以花岗岩突击进行反击。
The user attacks with the bright glint of crystals.
使用者用晶石的耀眼光芒进行攻击。
The user shoots a spike of diamond to strike the target. Can random critical hit.
使用者射出一枚钻石尖刺攻击目标，有可能随机命中要害。
A diamond-tough force-field protects the user's side for 5 turns from critical hits, and reduces move damage taken.
释放金刚石般坚韧的立场，在5回合内保护自身与队友不会被命中要害，且减小受到的技能伤害。
The user calls up spikes of diamond. Can random critical hit.
召唤出钻石尖刺。容易命中要害。
The user weakens the target's bones, making them fracture. They deal 33% less damage.
使用者削弱目标的骨骼，使其破碎。它们造成的伤害减小33%。
The user harms the target with a pulse of power. Deals double damage if the user has used a gem this battle.
使用者以力量脉冲伤害目标，若使用者已使用过宝石则造成双倍伤害。
The user rushes into the target with its stony body. The user also takes 33% recoil.
用岩石身躯冲撞目标。使用者承受33%反伤。
The user scratches the target with rough rocks. If in sandstorm, the target's Defense is lowered by three steps.
用粗糙的岩石划伤对方，如果处于沙暴天气中，还会使对方的防御减小3级。
The user slams the target into a nearby hard object. Increases power the higher the Defense of any ally.
将对手猛烈地撞向附近的坚硬物体。威力会随着队友的物防而增加。
The user slams the target with blunt force, taking 20% recoil.
用钝力猛击对手，承受20%的反作用伤害。
The user sweeps away hazards afflicting your side while lunging forward. User also takes 33% recoil.
突进时清除己方场地上的陷阱。使用者承受33%反伤。
The user numbs the target, then welcomes in sandstorm for eight turns.
使用者使目标麻痹，然后召唤持续8回合的沙暴。
The user calls all rocks to join it, summoning sandstorm for five turns and laying a hazard of levitating stones around the target.

The user drops a single piece of solid bedrock on the target, fracturing them.
使用者向目标投掷一块坚固的基岩，使其破碎。
The user and its allies are protected from spread moves this turn, and enemies can only target the user. Fails if used in succession.
本回合内，不会受到扩散类技能的攻击，且对手只能攻击自身，如果连续使用则会失效。
The user afflicts the target by turning their skin into stone. This has a 30% chance to fracture it.
使用者将目标的皮肤变成石头，使其痛苦。有30%的概率使其破碎。
The user slams itself into the target with absurd force, taking 50% recoil.
能破坏整座山的力量猛撞对手，但自身会受到50%的反伤。

The user throws a large rock at the target. If it misses, the user's Accuracy is raised.
使用者向目标投掷大石头。如果未命中，使用者的命中率会增加。
The user dances wildly while churning rocks towards the target. This raises the user's Attack by two steps.
使用者疯狂跳舞，同时将石头搅向目标。这使使用者的物攻增加两级。
The user rolls into the target. Its power doubles if it hits in succession.
技能每次击中，威力就会增加。
If this move misses, the target is forced to switch out. Always goes last.
如果这个技能没有命中，对手会被强制替换下场。必定后出手。

使用者将自身的身体碎片射向目标。使用者失去最大HP的10%。
The user shreds off bits of its own body to launch at the target. The user loses 10% of its max HP.
使用者撕下自身身体的一部分来发射攻击目标。使用者失去最大HP的10%。
The user sprays mining waste at the target. It has a 30% chance to poison.
向对手喷洒采矿废料。30%概率造成中毒。
The user slashes at the target with a steel blade. Super effective versus Dragon-types.
使用钢刃斩击对手，对龙属性效果拔群。
The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. Can't miss and skips protections.
用尖角刺向对手。攻击必定会命中，并无视保护类效果。
The user heals itself for half of their max HP, and extends the current weather by one turn.
使用者恢复自身最大HP的一半，并增加当前天气1回合。
The user enters a protective stance, raising its Sp. Atk and Defense by two steps.
使用者进入防御姿态，特攻和物防增加2级。
The user prepares its dual cannons. Until switch out, each special attack hits twice.
准备好它的双重大炮，在下场前每次特殊类攻击都会攻击2次。
The user drags the target into the water with a heavy anchor. They become waterlogged.
使用者用重锚将目标拖入水中。目标会陷入浸水。
Welds heavy steel onto the target, giving it the Steel type and reducing its Speed by four steps.
将重型钢材焊在目标身上，使其获得钢属性并减小速度4级。
The user ponders ancient wisdom, selecting three random status moves. You choose which one it uses.
思考古代的智慧，随机从3个变化类技能中选择1个进行使用。
Charges by summoning sunshine for five turns, then overwhelms the foe with fiery light on the second turn.
第1回合开启持续5回合的晴天，下1回合用灼热光芒压制对手。
The user rushes the target at blazing-fast speed. This attack always goes before any other move.
以极速突袭目标。
The foe is engulfed in a firestorm, trapping and damaging it for three turns.
对手被卷进火焰风暴中，被束缚并受到持续3回合的伤害。
The target is dried out and loses Water-type. Then, it bursts into flame from the heat.
对手吸干了水分并失去了水属性，接着在高温下陷入烧伤状态。
The user emits great amounts of heat, burning the target and adding the Fire-type to it.
使用者释放出大量的热量，烧伤目标并使其获得火属性。
The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of fire. It has a 20% chance to burn.
使用脉冲火焰攻击对方，20%概率使其烧伤。
The user fires off explosive rounds in a beautiful display that multi-hit two to five times.
使用者以漂亮的方式发射爆炸弹，连续攻击2-5次。
The user lays a hazard layer of burning spikes on the foe's side. One layer hurts switched in foes, two layers burns.
使用者在对手一侧放置一层焰菱。一层会使替换进入的对手受伤，两层会使对手烧伤。
The user targets the opponents soft spots with a fiery strike. Its power doubles if the target is burned.
以烈焰打击对手的弱点。如果其处于烧伤状态，威力翻倍。
Raises Sp. Atk by three steps. Until switch out, the user's attacks spread to hit all nearby foes.
增加自身的特攻3级，在被替换下场前，所有技能都会波及到对方全部精灵。
The user dances rapidly, emitting tropical heat. Any frostbitten Pokémon will be healed by this heat.
进行快速的舞动，散发出热带能量，治愈所有精灵的冻伤。
The user pauses to plan its ranged attacks. This raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Accuracy by two steps.
使用者暂停以规划远程攻击。特攻、特防和命中率增加2级。
The user shoots the target with a small bolt of fire. This move always goes first.
使用小火苗射击目标，
The user sets the target on fire, inflicting a burn.
点燃对手，造成烧伤状态。
If the target has a non-volatile status condition, this deals double damage and heals every battler's non-volatile status condition.
若目标处于异常状态，则伤害翻倍并回复场上所有精灵的异常状态。

使用者烧伤目标，然后召唤8回合的阳光。

将身体加热并攻击对手。10%概率让对手陷入烧伤状态。

发动多重火焰攻击后，开启持续8回合的晴天。

产生电力，向目标发出强烈光线。有30%的概率使目标麻痹。
The user dances with the speed of lightning, raising its Sp. Atk by two steps and Speed by one.
使用者以闪电般的速度跳舞，特攻增加2级，速度增加1级。
The user slams down into the target with electricity. It has a 10% chance to numb.
使用者用电流猛击目标。有10%的概率使目标麻痹。
The user lays an electrical hazard which hurts foes that switch into battle. It deals double damage in rainstorm.
使用者布置1个带电陷阱，对替换入场的敌方造成伤害。在暴雨天气中伤害翻倍。
The user dances to encourage its ally. Their attacks this turn will be critical hits.
跳起舞蹈鼓励队友，使其此回合的攻击必定命中要害。
Cloaking itself in light energy, the user shocks the target, raising the user's Sp. Def by two steps.
将自身隐藏在光能中，并用震荡波攻击对方，同时大幅度增加自身的特防。

找到己方能够使用的威力最高的技能并使用。
A weak electric jolt is launched to numb the target.
释放微弱电流，使对手麻痹。

利用光之爪进行斩击，50%概率使对手麻痹。容易命中要害。
Protects the user's side from status moves this turn. It disables any moves blocked for three turns.
保护自身和队友此回合免疫变化类技能，此回合阻挡成功的技能，将在3回合内无法使用。

目标被电流击中，连续攻击2-5次。有10%的概率使目标麻痹。
This move creates a directional magnetic field which reduces damage from attacks with 100 or more base power for five turns.
产生1个定向磁场，在5回合内减小基础威力大于等于100的技能造成的伤害。
Turns the foe's power against it, dealing damage using the target's Sp. Atk stat.
将对手的力量反制，使用目标的特攻属性造成伤害。
An electrified cloud zaps the target, lowering their Speed. This has a 50% chance to flinch.
通过积雨云内的电荷电击目标，使对方的速度减小1级，50%概率使其畏缩。

使用者爆发出强大的黄光，对目标造成伤害并使其麻痹。

将整个电网的能量注入腹部来猛击对手。但会受到100%的反伤。

发射多枚回旋弩箭，只要对方不是进入战斗的第1回合，将额外造成50%伤害。

使用者发射1个维度微粒，减小目标的特防。

使用者冥想，增加自身的双攻4级。

将自身的精神力注入对方的大脑中，并模拟冰冻过程，30%概率使其冻伤。
Splits off a section of the target's psyche. Disables their last used move for 5 turns.
分裂目标的心灵，使其最后使用的技能在5回合内无法使用。
Astral energy explodes around the target. This move always goes first. The user also takes 50% recoil.
在对手周围爆发出星体能量进行攻击，会受到50%的反伤。
By sacrificing half its total HP, the user makes the target fall asleep.
使用者牺牲自身一半的最大HP，使目标陷入睡眠。
The user's HP is restored by 50% of the damage dealt. Power doubles if the foe is asleep.
恢复自身造成伤害的50%的HP。如果对手处于睡眠状态，则威力翻倍。
Doubles in power if the foe is asleep. The user's HP is restored by 50% the damage dealt. This can overheal.
对睡眠状态中的对手威力翻倍，并恢复其受到伤害一半的HP，可以过量回复。
Summons eclipse for six turns, boosting Psychic-type attacks and heralding the total eclipse.
召唤持续6回合的日食，提升超能属性攻击并预示着日全食的到来。

使用者运用超能力，交换基础特攻和特防。

如果对方是队伍中最后一员，则此技能的威力翻倍。
The user tries to pick off a weak target. After damage, if the target is below 25% HP, they instantly faint.
使用者试图打倒1个虚弱的目标。造成伤害后，如果目标的HP低于25%，目标就会立刻濒死。
The user burrows into the target's subconscious with emotional manipulation. It has a 10% chance to leech.
使用者通过情绪操纵钻入目标的潜意识。有10%的概率使目标陷入寄生。
The user disarms the target's blade. The target cannot use blade-based moves for two turns.
使用者解除目标的刀刃武装。目标在接下来的两回合内无法使用切割类技能。
The user restores half of their max HP and raises their Defense, Sp. Def, and critical hit chance by two steps.
使用者恢复自身最大HP的一半，双防和命中要害率增加2级。
The target is forced underwater for a brief time, waterlogging it.
目标被短暂地强行拉入水下，使其浸水。
The user pushes the target violently into water. This has a 10% chance to waterlog.
使用者用力将目标推入水中。有10%的概率使目标浸水。
When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Sp. Atk stat rises by five steps.
使用这个技能打倒对手后，会增加自身的特攻5级。
The user indulges its love of battle by striking a foe. Both of the user's Attack and Sp. Atk are raised.
使用者通过攻击敌人来满足对战斗的热爱，使用者的双攻增加1级。
The user raises all of their stats by two steps. Fails unless a foe is below half health.
大幅度增加自身的全属性，只有对手的HP低于一半时才能成功。
The user attacks with dark illusions. This also lowers the target's Defense stat by two steps.
使用黑暗幻象攻击，同时使对手的物防减小2级。
The target is confronted with painful words. It has a 40% chance to make the target flinch.
让目标被伤人的话语质问，有40%的概率使目标畏缩。
A punch that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.
如果自身在同1回合中被对手伤害，那么这一拳会造成双倍的伤害。
For the rest of the round, the healing of all damaged Pokémon is reversed.
在本回合剩余时间内，所有受过伤的精灵的恢复效果反转。
The user prepares a precise cut. Always a critical hit, but lowers the user's Speed.
进行1次精准的攻击，必定会命中要害，但也会使自身的速度减小1级。
The target is dragged viciously through water. This has a 30% chance to waterlog.
目标被凶狠地拖过水面。有30%的概率使目标浸水。
The user emits a wave of anxious feelings which overwhelms all nearby Pokémon, taking 50% recoil.
散发出一股焦虑的情绪波动，影响所有的精灵，并承受50%的反作用伤害。
Summons moonglow for eight turns and raises the user's Attack by two steps.
召唤持续8回合的月辉，使用者的物攻增加2级。
Lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat, then restores its own HP by the target's Sp. Atk.
减小目标的特攻，然后以对方的特攻恢复自身的HP。
The user chomps hard, cutting the target's HP by 50%, and the user's HP is restored by 50% of that.
用力一咬，使对手的HP减半，并回复造成伤害一半的HP。
Damages the target's life force directly. During moonglow, the target also becomes frostbitten.
直接伤害对手，在月辉期间，对手还会陷入冻伤状态。
The user tries to surprise-attack the target. Cannot miss in moonglow. Can random critical hit.
突袭对手发起攻击。在月辉下该技能时必定命中，而且更容易命中要害。
The user attacks and steals the foe's held Berry or Gem. It can't steal if the user holds an item.
窃取对手携带的树果或宝石。如果自身携带物品，就无法窃取。
The user entangles the target's mind with dark thoughts, leeching it.
使对手的思维被邪恶念头所缠绕，同时让其陷入寄生状态。
The user invades deep into the target's mind, leeching it.
深深侵入对手的大脑并造成寄生。
The user demands tribute from the target. Money is earned after the battle.
使用者向目标索要贡品。战斗结束后获得金钱。
The user steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks. Goes last.
先偷取对手增加的能力等级，然后攻击。
The user slashes all around them, creating deep scars. This lowers each target's Attack.
在对方周围砍来砍去，留下深深的伤疤。使对方全部精灵的物攻减小1级。
The user hacks at the target with great violence. Can random critical hit.
猛烈地砍击对手，容易命中要害。
Explodes, dealing an extra 30 base power to all foes for each Spikes hazard layer underneath them. The user faints.
自身爆炸，对每个脚下有菱的敌人造成额外30点基础威力的伤害。使用者濒死。
The user assists an ally by boosting the power and Accuracy of its next attack by 50%.
使用者通过增加队友下1次攻击的威力和命中率50%来协助队友。
Stares harshly, dealing double damage if they hurt the user this turn. Only usable on the first turn.
怒视对手，如果本回合对手攻击了自身，则威力翻倍。只能在出场后的第1回合使用。
The user restores half of their max HP, or 66% in moonglow.
使用者恢复自身最大HP的一半，如果在月辉下，则恢复66%。
The user bullies the target, causing mental damage. This has a 20% chance to leech.
欺负对手，对其精神上的伤害。20%概率让对手陷入寄生状态。
The user transforms into a cloud of vermin, charging and becoming invulnerable. On the second turn it ambushes the target.
化为虫群进入无敌状态蓄力，下1回合伏击目标。
The user submerges the target in water, then bludgeons them repeatedly. This has a 10% chance to waterlog.
使用者将目标浸入水中，然后反复殴打目标。有10%的概率使目标浸水。
The user sings with reckless abandon, annoying the target. There's a 30% chance they become dizzy.
肆无忌惮地唱歌，袭扰对方，30%概率使其混乱。
The user smacks the target and steals its item while it is stunned. Items stolen from wild Pokémon are stored.
使用者拍打目标并偷走它的物品。从野生精灵那里偷来的物品将会被储存起来。
The target is lulled to sleep. Can only be used during a Full Moon.
使对手陷入睡眠状态。只有在满月期间才能使用。
The target is pranked with a huge bucket of water. This has a 50% chance to waterlog it.
目标被恶作剧地浇了一大桶水。有50%的概率使目标浸水。
The target is hit with a generous donation. Consumes up to 1000 scattered coins. Base power is boosted by 10 for every 100 consumed.
让目标被慷慨的馈赠击中。消耗最多1000枚散落的金钱。每消耗100枚，基础威力增加10点。
Leeches the target by kissing them with its thin mouth.
用其细长的嘴巴亲吻对手，从而让其陷入寄生状态。
The user dances in tune with a dreamlike energy, raising their Sp. Atk by four steps.
在梦幻般的氛围中翩翩起舞，增加自身的特攻4级。
The user tickles the target excessively, damaging it. This has a 20% chance to lower Attack.
用力向对手挠痒造成伤害。20%概率减小对手的攻击。
The target's mind is overloaded with emotion. Applies Torment to the target.
目标的大脑被情绪过载。对目标施加折磨效果。
The user shoots a magical arrow which seeks out the target's weak points. Can random critical hit.
使用者射出一支寻找目标弱点的魔法箭。可能随机命中要害。
An enchanting outcry. Can't miss and skips protections.
使用者发出一声迷人的呐喊。攻击必定会命中，并无视保护类效果。
A patch of medicinal flowers sprouts across the battlefield. This heals every Pokémon for 1/8th HP each turn for five turns.
使周围催生出一片草药花海，5回合内每回合治疗所有精灵1/8最大HP。
The user makes a fool out of the target. This has a 50% chance of jinxing them.
使用者使目标出丑。有50%的概率使目标陷入不幸。
The user plays with the target with unneccessary force. It has a 50% chance to lower Attack.
使用者强行和目标玩耍，有50%概率减小目标的物攻1级。
The user flashes colorful light to damage the target. This move always goes first.
使用闪烁的七彩光芒攻击对手。
The user chucks a party favor which explodes in the target's face.
扔出派对小礼物，使其在对方脸上爆炸。
Power increases by 20 each time it's used in succession. User heals for half of damage dealt.
每次连续使用威力都会增加20。同时回复自身造成伤害的一半HP。
The user uses honey to fully restore their HP. However, this lures swarming insects, trapping and damaging the user for three turns.
使用蜂蜜完全恢复自身的HP，但同时会引诱成群的昆虫，使自身3回合内无法交换，且受到伤害。
The user attempts to humble the target, guaranteeing a critical hit on foes with boosted stats.
先礼后兵，对增加能力的精灵必定命中要害。
The user hopes for bad luck, jinxing the target. Attacks against them crit and pierce protection.
使用者祈求厄运，使目标陷入不幸。对目标的攻击会命中要害并穿透保护。
The user wields an exaggerated power to strike the target. Lowers the user's Attack by four steps.
施展极其强大的力量打击对手。而自身的攻击会减小4级。
The target is taunted by a deceptive look. It can't use status moves this or next turn. This move always goes first.
利用欺骗眼神挑衅对手，使其本回合和下回合无法使用变化类技能。
The user leeches the target, then welcomes in moonglow for eight turns.
使用者寄生目标，然后召唤8回合的月辉。
Enables random critical hits for the user, doubles its critical hit chance, and raises its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by two steps.
使用者变得可以随机命中要害且命中要害概率翻倍，同时特攻和特防增加2级。
The user causes an accident, damaging the target. This has a 30% chance of jinxing them.
使用者制造一场意外，对目标造成伤害。有30%的概率使目标陷入不幸。
The user causes the target to trip and fall. This has a 50% chance of jinxing them.
使用者使目标绊倒并摔倒。有50%的概率使目标陷入不幸。

使用者消失在薄雾中，进行蓄力并变得无敌。下1回合，目标将会变得不幸和陷入冻伤。

召唤持续6回合的月辉，提升妖精属性攻击并预示着满月的到来。

The user creates a puzzling area for eight turns in which Pokémon's unmodified Attack and Sp. Atk are swapped.
使用者创造出1个持续8回合的迷惑空间，在这个空间中，精灵的基础双攻会互换。
The user spins sugar into a ball launched at the target. The slower the user, the greater the damage.
将糖旋转成球向对手发射。自身速度越慢，伤害越高。
The user causes nearby objects to fall onto the target. This has a 30% chance of jinxing them.
使用者使附近的物体掉落砸向目标。有30%的概率使目标陷入不幸。
The user goes on a wild tantrum, going on a rampage for two turns.
使用者陷入疯狂的暴怒，连续2回合陷入狂暴。
The user uses fae magic to invoke the target's true name, jinxing them.
使用者使用妖精魔法呼唤目标的真名，对其陷入不幸。
The user attacks with its wards, dealing damage based on the user's Sp. Def stat.

The user mutates its genetic code, transforming into any of its 3 other forms. Only useable as Deoxys Normal.
改变自身的基因代码，改变为其它任意一种形态，只有代欧奇希斯在普通形态时可用。
The user makes an risky, difficult attack. If it misses, the user's Accuracy is raised.
使用者发起1次高风险、高难度的攻击。若攻击落空，会使使用者的命中率增加1级。

进行1次愚蠢的赌徒式攻击，很多时候打不中。
The target is multi-hit two to five times.
目标被连续攻击2-5次。

使用技能2回合后，对目标发动精密打击。

以纯粹意志狂暴攻击，持续2回合。

The user sets a powerful tailwind for 6 turns, which also increases move damage by 30%. User becomes Flying-type.

只有烈空坐化身才可以使用的技能，所有被击中的对手都将失去畏缩免疫的效果。
The user slashes all near foes with with poisonous blades or edges. Will be critical against poisoned targets.

使用大量的污泥淹没周围的区域，使所有被击中的对手中毒。

The user inflicts waterlog on all nearby foes. User becomes a Water-type.
使用者使所有附近的敌方浸水。使用者变为水属性。
A move that only the avatar of Kyogre can use. The user commands a Luvdisc avatar and a Remoraid avatar to join it.
只有盖欧卡化身才可以使用的技能，召唤1个爱心鱼化身和1个铁炮鱼化身协助作战。
The user forcefully shoots 6 seeds in rapid succession, spread among nearby enemies.
连续射出六粒种子，并散播给附近的对手。
A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by all the damage taken by the target.
一种吸取养分的攻击。使用者的HP通过目标所受到的全部伤害得到恢复。
A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts all near foes on the second turn.
第1回合凝聚光能，并在第2回合轰击所有附近的对手。
The user embeds its roots to heal by 1/4th every turn for four turns, and becomes Grass-type.
深深扎根，4回合内每回合恢复自身1/4HP，并使自身变为草属性。
Plants seeds on all near foes, draining HP each turn. User becomes Grass-type.
给附近的所有对手种上种子，每回合恢复HP，并使自身变为草属性。
The user scatters bursts of spores to induce sleep on all foes, and then becomes Grass-type.
使用者散播孢子爆发使所有敌人陷入睡眠，然后变成草系。
The user summons an allied Gossifleur, raises the Sp. Def itself and its allies by 2 steps, and becomes Grass-type.
使用者召唤1个盟友幼绵绵，并且增加自身和队友的特防两级，然后变为草属性。
A powerful electric blast is let loose on the target, numbing it.
使用强大的电流攻击对手，并使其麻痹。
The user raises its Sp. Atk and Speed by two steps, and becomes Electric-type.
大幅度增加自身的特攻和速度，并使自身变为电属性。
The user inflicts numb on all nearby foes. User becomes an Electric-type.
使附近所有对手麻痹，并使自身变为电属性。
The user sharply boosts its Sp. Def, gains the ability Unaware, and becomes Psychic-type.
大幅度增加自身特防，同时将特性变为纯朴，并使自身变为超能属性。
The user raises its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def, maximizes its Accuracy, and becomes Psychic-type.
增加自身的特攻特防，同时将自身命中增加至最大，并使自身变为超能属性。
Summons eclipse for 5 turns, resets lowered stats, and user becomes Psychic-type.
召唤持续5回合的日食，使自身被减小的属性恢复正常，并变为超能属性。
Bounces back status moves for the next 3 turns, and user becomes Psychic-type.
接下来3回合反弹状态类技能，使用者变成超能属性。
The user summons an allied Abra, raises the Sp. Atk stat of itself and its allies, and becomes Psychic-type.
召唤1个凯西一同战斗，同时增加自身和队友的特攻，并使自身变为超能属性。
The user creates an Odd Room for 8 turns, raises its Speed, and becomes Psychic-type.
使用者创造出1个持续8回合的奇异空间，速度增加1级，并变成超能力属性。
The target is struck with an absolute zero beam of energy, frostbiting it.
以温度极低的光线攻击对手，并使其冻伤。
The user inflicts frostbite on all nearby foes. User becomes an Ice-type.
对附近所有对手造成冻伤，并使自身变为冰属性。
The user lays 2 hazard layers of frozen spikes at the foe's feet, and becomes Ice-type.
在对手场地铺设2层冰菱，自身变为冰属性。
The user summons a hail storm for 5 turns, reduces the speed of all enemies by two steps, and becomes Ice-type.
召唤持续5回合的冰雹，大幅度减小所有对手速度，并使自身变为冰属性。
The user sharply boosts their Attack, Defense, and Speed, and becomes Ice-type.
使自身的物攻、物防和速度增加2级，并使自身变为冰属性。
The user crushes all near foes with evil intent. This deals double damage to targets with a non-volatile status condition.
用恶意碾压周围所有对手，对异常状态目标造成双倍伤害。
The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage and numbs the target.
呼出强大的气流攻击对方，并使其麻痹。
The user raises its Attack and Speed by two steps, and becomes Dragon-type.
大幅度增加自身的攻击和速度，并使自身变为龙属性。
The user harshly lowers each near foes best stat, and becomes Dragon-type.
大幅度减小附近对手最高的能力值，并使自身变为龙属性。
The user summons an allied Poochyena, raises the Attack stat of itself and its allies, and becomes Dark-type.
召唤1个土狼犬一同战斗，同时增加自身和队友的攻击，并使自身变为恶属性。
The user torments all near foes, preventing them from repeating moves. The user becomes Dark-type.
折磨附近所有对手，阻止它们重复使用技能，并使自身变为恶属性。
The user raises their Sp. Atk by four steps and becomes Fairy-type.
自身特攻增加4级，并使自身变为妖精属性。
Summons moonglow for 5 turns, raises the Defense and Sp. Def of all allies, and user becomes Fairy-type.
开启持续5回合的月辉，全部精灵的双防增加1级，自身变为妖精属性。
The user creates a Puzzle Room for 8 turns, raises its Attack and Sp. Atk, and becomes Fairy-type.
开启持续8回合的迷惑空间，双攻增加1级，自身变为妖精属性。
This move exists just to showcase the PBS Extensions system.
这个技能只是为了展示PBS扩展系统。

Unnamed

Test Items
测试物品
[9]
An item that prevents wild Pokémon from appearing for 100 steps after its use.
使用后，在较短的一段时间内，弱小的野生精灵将完全不会出现。
Rare contraband. Any average solo trainer will flee from the stench of its explosion.
稀有违禁品。任何普通的单人训练师都会被它爆炸产生的臭味熏得落荒而逃。
A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is colored orange.
能让某些特定精灵进化的神奇石头。
A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a thunderbolt pattern.
能让某些特定精灵进化的神奇石头。
A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is a clear, light blue.
能让某些特定精灵进化的神奇石头。
A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a leaf pattern.
能让某些特定精灵进化的神奇石头。
A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as black as the night sky.
能让某些特定精灵进化的神奇石头。
A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as red as the sun.
能让某些特定精灵进化的神奇石头。
A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.
能让某些特定精灵进化的神奇石头。
A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like eyes.
能让某些特定精灵进化的神奇石头。
A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.
能让某些特定精灵进化的神奇石头。
A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a snowflake pattern.
能让某些特定精灵进化的神奇石头。
A many-colored stone that makes a lot of Pokémon evolve. Can be used in place of any evolution stone.
一种多彩的石头，能让许多精灵进化。可以替代任何进化石使用。
A glimmering tiara made of diamonds. It makes a certain Pokémon evolve.
能让某些特定精灵进化的钻石皇冠。
A shining helmet. It makes a certain Pokémon evolve.
能让某些特定精灵进化的闪亮头盔。
A cool scarf. It makes a certain Pokémon evolve.
能让某些特定精灵进化的冷酷围巾。
A beautiful floral wreath from Alola that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve.
来自阿罗拉的漂亮花圈，可以令某些特殊精灵进化。
A wreath made from woven Galarica Twigs. It makes certain species of Pokémon evolve.
来自伽勒尔的漂亮花圈，可以令某些特殊精灵进化。
A peculiar apple that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. It's exceptionally sweet.
这种神奇的苹果可以使特定的精灵进化。吃起来非常甜美。
A peculiar apple that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. It's exceptionally tart.
这种神奇的苹果可以使特定的精灵进化。吃起来酸甜可口。
A peculiar apple that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. It's exceptionally syrupy.
一种能让特定精灵进化的奇特苹果，异常黏稠。
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a seashell.
很久以前栖息在海里的古代精灵的化石。好像是贝壳的一部分。
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a shell.
很久以前栖息在海里的古代精灵的化石。好像是甲壳的一部分。
A piece of amber that contains the genes of an ancient Pokémon. It is clear with a reddish tint.
封存着古代精灵遗传基因的琥珀，透着点红色。
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a plant root.
很久以前栖息在海里的古代精灵的化石。好像是根的一部分。
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a claw.
很久以前栖息在海里的古代精灵的化石。好像是爪子的一部分。
A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a head.
很久以前生活在地上的古代精灵的化石。好像是头部的一部分。

让精灵携带后，精灵会浮在空中。受到攻击就会破裂。

An item to be held by a Pokémon. Its Attack and Sp. Atk raise by four steps if hit by a move it's weak to.
被针对弱点时，双攻就会增加4级。
When held, it boosts Speed by two steps when intimidated, fascinated, or frustrated once per battle.
使用后会容易呼唤伙伴，但使用后会消失。携带后，在受到威吓、震慑或阻挠时速度会增加。
Damages attackers for 1/8th of their HP when they hit the holder with physical attacks.
当攻击者用物理类技能攻击击中携带者时，对攻击者造成其HP的1/8的伤害。
Damages attackers for 1/8th of their HP when they hit the holder with special attacks.
当攻击者用特殊类技能攻击击中携带者时，对攻击者造成其HP的1/8的伤害。
If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokémon in your party.
携带它的精灵如果受到技能攻击，就能逃脱战斗，并和同行的其他精灵进行替换。
A card with a mysterious power. When the holder is struck by a foe, the attacker is removed from battle.
有着神奇力量的卡片。携带后，能让使用了技能的对手退场。
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This discarded carapace lets the holder switch out of battle without fail.
结实坚硬的空壳。携带它的精灵必定可以和后备的精灵进行替换。
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokémon without fail.
必定能从遇到的野生精灵面前逃走。

携带的精灵能得到稍微更多的经验值。

一种携带的物品。携带者进入战斗后，该场战斗中获得的金钱增加50%。
An item to be held by a Pokémon. The comforting chime of this bell makes it gain happiness twice as fast.
携带后精灵显得很安稳，变得容易和训练师亲密。
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It prevents wild Pokémon encounters if the holder is the first one in the party.
携带后不容易遇到野生精灵。

携带后每回合恢复1/16HP，可抵消1次异常状态。
An item to test the PBS Extensions feature. It can be sold to shops for $1.
一种用于测试PBS扩展功能的物品。可以以1金钱的价格卖给商店。
