Test Ability
测试特性
[11]
Suppresses the effects of weather.
使天气的影响消失。
Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last by 30%.
如果在最后使用技能，技能的威力会增加。
Possesses two Abilities: Unnerve and Grim Neigh.
兼备蕾冠王的紧张感和灵幽马的漆黑嘶鸣这两种特性。
Possesses two Abilities: Unnerve and Chilling Neigh.
兼备蕾冠王的紧张感和雪暴马的苍白嘶鸣这两种特性。
Reverses "Aura" Abilities to weaken affected moves.
让气场的效果发生逆转，减小威力。
Reduces a sleeping foe's HP by 1/8th at the end of a round.
回合结束时，使一名处于睡眠中的对手减小1/8的HP。
Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves by 30%.
会增加我方的特殊类技能30%的威力。
Raises Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps when its HP is lowered below half.
当HP低于一半时，双攻增加2级。
When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it restores 33% of its max health.
无论是哪种树果，食用后，都会回复33%最大HP。
Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.
打倒对手时，物攻增加1级。
Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.
晴天时，速度翻倍。
Prevents stat steps from being lowered (except when self-inflicted).
能力等级不会被其他精灵减小。
It's always drowsing, and attacks without waking.
总是半梦半醒的状态，绝对不会醒来。可以就这么睡眠进行攻击。
Raises Sp. Atk by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.
如果能力被减小，特攻增加4级。
Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
能力的变化发生逆转，原本增加时会减小,而原本减小时会增加。
Can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison-type.
能够使毒属性和钢属性中毒。
Lowers everyone else's Speed by two steps when hit by an attack.
受到攻击后撒下棉絮，大幅度减小除自身以外的所有精灵的速度。
When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.
吃掉树果的下个回合，会将树果反刍出来，再吃1次。
Upon entry, clears the stat changes of other Pokémon.
上场时清除其他所有精灵的能力变化。
Repeats another Pokémon's dance move immediately.
有谁使用跳舞技能时，自身也能就这么接着使用跳舞技能。
Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.
全部精灵的恶属性技能变强。
Raises Defense when the Pokémon enters a battle.
出场时，物防增加1级。
Halves move damage when HP becomes half or less.
HP减半时，会变得软弱，双攻会减半。
Raises Attack by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.
如果能力被减小，物攻增加4级。
Changes the weather to Strong Winds, which remove Flying-type's weaknesses. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.
将天气变为强风，消除飞行属性的弱点，离场后持续3回合。
Changes the weather to Harsh Sunlight, which nullifies Water-type moves. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.
将天气变为大晴天，使水属性技能失效，离场后持续3回合。
Its shroud protects it from an attack just once.
通过画皮覆盖住身体，可以防住1次攻击。
Boosts either Attack or Sp. Atk by two steps according to the foe's defenses.
根据对手的物防或者特防，物攻或特攻增加2级。
Powers up Dragon-type moves by 50%.
龙属性的技能威力增加50%。
Summons rainstorm for 4 turns when it enters battle.
出场时，召唤持续4回合的暴雨。
Turns the weather to sunshine for 4 turns when it enters battle.
出场时，将天气变为晴朗，持续4回合。
Heals 1/8 HP in rainstorm, 1/4 when hit by Water-type moves. Loses 1/8 in sunshine, takes 25% more from Fire-type moves.
雨天/晴天时，每回合回复/损失1/8HP。被水属性技能攻击时，回复25%HP。被火属性技能攻击时，受到的伤害增加25%。
Switches out if its HP becomes half or less.
HP变为一半时，会慌慌张张逃走，退回同行队伍中。
Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.
全部精灵的妖精属性技能变强。
Reduces damage from super-effective attacks by 25%.
受到效果拔群的攻击时，伤害减小25%。
Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to burn the attacker.
有30%概率让使用物理类技能攻击自身的对手变为烧伤。
In sunshine boosts its and allies' Attack and Sp. Def by 50%.
晴天时，自身和队友的物攻和特防增加50%。
Protects Grass-type allies from non-volatile status conditions or stat reductions (except self-inflicted).
保护草属性队友免受稳定型异常或其他精灵的能力等级减小效果的影响。
Doubles Defense. The Pokémon takes double damage from Fire-type moves.
防御能力翻倍，但受到火属性技能攻击时，受到双倍伤害。
Castform transforms with the weather.
属性会随着天气而变化。
Reduces damage done to allies by 25%.
使队友受到的伤害减小25%。
Doubles the Pokémon's Defense.
物防翻倍。
The user's Speed is doubled while using Flying-type moves.
使用飞行属性技能时速度翻倍。
Normal-type moves become Electric-type and power up by 30%.
一般属性的技能会变为电属性，并且威力增加30%。
Will eat berries normally eaten at 25% HP (in a pinch) at 50% instead.
会在HP一半时就吃掉原本HP在1/4时才会吃掉的树果。
Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed and Attack.
被物理类技能攻击时，使攻击者的速度和物攻减小1级。
Boosts Attack by 50% but the user is locked into the first move they use.
虽然攻击会增加，但是只能使用一开始所选的技能。
Boosts Sp. Atk after knocking out any Pokémon.
打倒对手时，特攻增加1级。
Attacks with prey caught when using Immerse, Whelm, Surf, Dive, or Depth Charge.
使用浸泡/淹没/冲浪/潜水/深海猛袭时会捕获猎物。
Doubles the Pokémon's weight.
自身的重量会变为2倍。
It alternates between an Electric-type Mode and a Dark-type Mode.
每回合结束时会在满腹花纹与空腹花纹之间交替改变样子。
Boosts move damage by 50%, but lowers Accuracy by 20%.
技能伤害增加50%，但是命中率减小20%。
Heals non-volatile status conditions each turn if in rainstorm.
雨天时，每回合回复稳定型异常。
Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn in a hail.
冰雹时，每回合回复1/8的HP。
Doubles the Pokémon's Sp. Def.
特防翻倍。
Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.
出场时伪装成后排的精灵。
It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.
变身为当前面对的精灵。
Ignores screens and other barriers, Substitute, and boosted Defense and Sp. Def.
无视对手的各种屏障类效果以及双防的增加的能力等级。
Damages an attacker that lands the finishing hit.
被对手打倒的时候，会给予对手相当于HP剩余量的伤害。
The Pokémon is protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.
不会畏缩，不受威吓、震慑和阻挠的影响。
Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.
出场时威吓对手，让其退缩，减小对手2级物攻。
Raises Attack when the Pokémon enters a battle.
进入战斗时，物攻增加1级。
Physical moves against it inflict 1/8th max HP damage to the foe.
受到攻击时，用粗糙的皮肤弄伤使用物理类技能攻击自身的对手1/8HP。
Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%.
使用的拳类技能的威力增加30%。
Immune to non-volatile status conditions while in sunshine.
晴天时，免疫稳定型异常。
Immune to Ground-type moves. Immune to grounded hazards.
免疫地面属性技能。免疫地面上的各种陷阱。
Reflects enemy status moves that target the Pokémon or create hazards around it.
可以不受到由对手使用的变化类技能或者陷阱的影响，并将其反弹。
The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
不会受到攻击以外的伤害。
Steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits.
夺走被自身的技能击中的对手的物品。
Boosts the power of pulse moves by 50%.
脉冲类技能的威力会增加50%。
Its attacks are critical against poisoned targets.
攻击中毒的对手时，必定会命中要害。
Bounces back stat-lowering effects.
反弹受到的能力减小效果。
Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Speed when hit by one.
受到电属性的技能攻击时，不会受到伤害，而是速度会增加1级。
Raises Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.
打到对手时，物攻增加1级。
Reduces move damage taken by 50% when HP is full.
HP全满时，受到的伤害会变少。
Changes type to match the held Plate.
自身的属性会根据携带石板的属性而改变。
When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, the attacker's ability becomes Mummy.
被攻击时，使攻击者的特性变为木乃伊。
All non-volatile status conditions heal when it switches out.
替换时，回复稳定型异常。
Powers up super-effective moves by 30%.
效果拔群的技能威力增加30%。
Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
场上所有精灵的特性效果都会消失或者无法生效。
Attacks by or against the Pokémon can't miss.
这只精灵的攻击或者受到的攻击都必定会命中。
Non-Normal moves become Normal-type and are powered up by 50%.
非一般属性技能全部会变为一般属性，并且威力增加50%。
Child attacks after the parent, for 25% of the previous damage.
攻击时，孩子会以25%的伤害再攻击1次。
When it takes a hit, the Pokémon and the attacker both faint after 3 turns.
当受到攻击时，该精灵和攻击者都会在3回合后陷入濒死。
Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.
被接触类技能攻击时，有30%的概率使对手中毒。
Physical moves have a 30% chance to poison targets.
使用接触类技能攻击时，有30%的概率使对手中毒。
Changes with other Cells if HP becomes half or less.
HP变为一半时，细胞们会赶来支援，变为完全体形态。
When an ally faints, the Pokémon also gains their ability or abilities.
其他己方精灵失去战斗能力时，获得其特性。
Powers up nearby allies moves by 30%.
只要处在相邻位置，技能的威力就会增加。
Gives priority to status moves, but makes Dark-types immune to them.
使变化类技能先制度加1，但是恶属性的精灵会免疫受加成的技能。
The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.
给予对手压迫感，大量减小其使用技能的PP。
Changes the weather to Heavy Rain, which nullifies Fire-type moves. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.
将天气变为大雨天，使火属性技能失效，离场后持续3回合。
The Pokémon receives 25% less move damage from super-effective attacks.
精灵从效果拔群的攻击中受到的技能伤害减小25%。
It changes type to that of the move it's about to use.
变为与自身将要使用的技能相同的属性。
Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in rainstorm.
暴雨天气时，会回复1/8HP。
Powers up moves that have recoil damage by 30%.
反伤类技能威力增加30%。
Restores 25% of max HP when withdrawn from battle.
退回同行队伍后，HP会回复25%。
Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.
使树果的效果变为2倍。
Its type matches the memory disc it holds.
根据携带的存储碟，自身的属性会改变。
Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
不会受到反伤的伤害。
Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.
沙暴天气时，速度翻倍。
Summons a sandstorm for 4 turns when it enters battle.
出场时，会把天气变为沙暴。
Immune to Grass-type moves, and raises Attack and Sp. Atk when hit by one.
免疫草属性技能，被草属性技能击中时双攻增加1级。
Forms a powerful school while it has a lot of HP.
HP多的时候会聚起来变强。
Doubles the likelihood of the user's random added effects activating.
托天恩的福，技能的追加效果容易出现。
Resists damage while its HP is full.
HP全满时，受到的伤害会变少。
Traps the foe.
束缚对手。
At the end of each turn, heals from every non-volatile status condition (except Sleep).
回合结束时，治愈稳定型异常（睡眠除外）。
Removes random added effects of attacks to increase their damage by 30%.
技能的追加效果消失，但因此能以更高的威力使用技能。
Blocks all random added effects of attacks taken.
被鳞粉守护着，不会受到技能的追加效果影响。
Immune to non-volatile status conditions while it has its shell. Below half HP, its shell breaks and it turns aggressive.
拥有壳时免疫稳定型异常，HP低于一半时，壳破裂并变得好斗。
Stat changes in the Pokémon are doubled.
该精灵的能力等级变化翻倍。
Maximizes the frequency of "two to five" multi-hit moves.
使多段伤害类技能总是使出最大次数。
Halves Attack and Speed for 3 turns.
在3回合内，物攻和速度减半。
Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hail.
冰雹时，速度翻倍。
Doubles the critical hit chance of random crit moves. Powers up critical hits by another 50%.
将随机命中要害技能的命中要害率翻倍。使命中要害的威力再增加50%。
Summons a hail for 4 turns when it enters battle.
出场时，开启4回合的冰雹。
In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.
晴朗天气时，特攻增加50%，而每回合HP会减小10%。
Boosts Sp. Atk each time a Pokémon faints.
每当有精灵变为濒死状态时，特攻增加1级。
Speed is raised by two steps at the end of each of its turns.
回合结束时，速度增加2级。
Boosts Defense by two steps when hit by an attack.
受到攻击时，物防增加2级。
Changes between Blade and Shield Forme with attacks and King's Shield.
随着使用攻击和王者盾牌技能，在刀剑与盾牌形态之间改变。
Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to cause numbing.
有30%概率让使用物理类技能攻击自身的对手麻痹。
Powers up Steel-type moves by 50%.
钢属性技能的威力增加50%。
Powers up Steel-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.
自身和队友的钢属性技能的威力增加50%。
Boosts the power of biting moves by 50%.
啃咬类技能的威力增加50%。
It can't be knocked out with one hit.
即使受到对手的技能攻击，也不会被一击打倒。一击必杀的技能也没有效果。
Quadruples the critical hit chance of random crit moves.
将随机命中要害的命中要害率变为4倍。
Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in rainstorm.
暴雨天气时，速度翻倍。
When the Pokémon is given a non-volatile status condition by another Pokémon, that Pokemon also gets that condition.
当被另一只精灵赋予稳定型异常时，那只精灵也会陷入该异常。
Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed by three steps.
对于使用物理类技能攻击自身的对手，会使其速度减小3级。
Moves with base power 60 or less deal 50% more damage.
使用基础威力60以下的技能攻击时，伤害增加50%。
Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.
读取我方的攻击，并回避其伤害。
Takes half damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
受到的火属性和冰属性的技能伤害减半。
Doubles the damage of "not very effective" moves.
对于效果不好的技能，伤害翻倍。
Increases Attack by 30%.
物攻增加30%。
Powers up Electric-type moves by 50%.
电属性技能的威力增加50%。
Gives +3 priority to healing and draining moves.
回复类技能的先制度+3。
Every other turn, the Pokémon can't use any move but Slack Off.
每隔1回合，不能使用除偷懒之外的其他技能。
Ignores modified Defense and Sp. Def while attacking, and ignores modified Attack and Sp. Atk while being attacked.
攻击时，无视对手增加或者减小的双防，被攻击时，无视对手增加或者减小的双攻。
Doubles the Pokémon's Speed if its held item is consumed or lost.
如果携带的物品丢失或消耗，则使其速度翻倍。
Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries or Leftovers.
让对手紧张，使其无法食用树果或剩饭。
Physical moves negate all protection effects.
如果使用的是物理类技能，则可以无视保护类效果进行攻击。
Doubles the Accuracy, critical hit rate, and chance to activate random added effects for its allies and itself.
将自身及队友的命中率、命中要害率和触发随机附加效果的概率翻倍。
Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.
因为是不会睡觉的体质，所以不会变为睡眠状态。
Immune to Electric-type moves and restores 25% of max HP when hit by one.
免疫电属性技能，被电属性技能攻击时，恢复1/4的HP。
When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, the Pokémon and the attacker switch abilities.
被攻击时，和攻击者交换特性。
Immune to Water-type moves and restores 25% of max HP when hit by one.
免疫水属性技能，被水属性技能攻击时，恢复1/4的HP。
Weakens incoming Fire-type moves, and doubles Water-type damage.
受到的火属性技能的伤害减半，自身使用的水属性技能的威力翻倍。
Physical attacks against the Pokémon raise its Speed by two steps but lower its Defense.
如果因物理类技能受到伤害，防御会减小，速度会大幅增加。
Cowardly switches out if its HP becomes half or less.
HP变为一半时，会慌慌张张逃走，退回同行队伍中。
Only super-effective moves will hit.
不可思议的力量，只有效果拔群的技能才能击中。
After being attacked, uses Parting Shot to switch out.
受到攻击后，会使用抛下狠话。
The Pokémon gains twice as many stats from leveling up.
精灵从升级中获得的能力增加翻倍。
At the end of each turn in rainstorm, each Pokémon not immune to rainstorm has their Defense and Sp. Def lowered.
在暴雨的每个回合结束时，每个不免疫暴雨的负面效果的精灵的双防减小1级。
Powers up moves of the same type by 33%.
本属性技能的威力增加33%。
Raises Speed by four steps when its HP is lowered below half.
HP降到一半以下时，速度增加4级。
Grants immunity to Flying-type moves and raises Speed if hit by one.
免疫飞行属性技能，被飞行属性技能攻击时，速度增加1级。
Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage. The Pokémon doesn't trigger items, abilities, or effects of targets it hits.
免疫反伤伤害，同时不会触发被击中目标的物品、特性或技能效果。
Slips past all types of Spikes hazards. Deals 50% more damage to targets that switched in this turn.
避开所有陷阱，对这1回合替换上场的目标造成的伤害增加50%。
HP-fraction-based damage effects deal 50% more damage to opponents.
让对手基于HP百分比造成伤害的效果（如烧伤）的伤害增加50%。
When another Pokémon faints, consumes their item, ability, and stat steps.
其他精灵失去战斗力时，消除在场的所有物品、特性和能力变化。
Can hold two different items, if both are Gems.
可同时携带2个宝石类物品。
Doubles Speed in eclipse.
日食天气时，速度翻倍。
Raises Defense and Sp. Def whenever any Pokémon uses a dance move. Caps out at +4.
每当任何精灵使用舞蹈类技能时，双防增加1级。上限为+4。
Takes 35% less damage in eclipse, except in total eclipse.
在日食中受到的伤害减小35%，全食除外。
Takes 40% less damage from attacks by Pokémon who have a non-volatile status condition.
从处于稳定型异常的精灵的攻击中受到的伤害减小40%。
Increases Sp. Atk by 30%.
增加30%的特攻。
Turns to Finale Form when only unfainted on team. Ability becomes Synchronize.
当队伍只剩下自身后，将变为终结形态，特性更改为同步。
Inflicts 1/6th max HP damage to the foe when damaged during rainstorm.
在暴雨天受到攻击时，对手会扣除1/6的HP。
Boosts the Pokémon's Attack by 50%, but its attacks cannot faint the target.
物攻增加50%，但它的攻击不会使对手濒死。
Sound-based attacks turn Ice-type and are boosted by 30%.
声音类技能变成冰属性，并且威力增加30%。
Deals double damage against Pokémon that have raised defenses or that are protected by a screen.
对于增加了防御或受到屏障保护的精灵造成双倍伤害。
Doubles Sp. Def, but the Pokémon can't use status moves.
特防翻倍，但无法使用变化类技能。
Uses Assist upon entry, using a random move known by a party member.
入场时使用借助，随机复制队友的技能。
During eclipse, it restores its HP by half the damage it deals with attacks.
日食时，回复自身攻击造成伤害的一半的HP。
Attacks this Pokémon uses that don't share a type with it are boosted by 50%. It can't use attacks of its own types.
无法使用与自身属性相同的技能，使用不同属性的技能时，伤害增加50%。
At the beginning of every 5th turn, the Pokémon forcibly switches into battle. It chooses which move it will use that turn.
战斗的每第5回合会强制替换上场，并自主选择使用1个技能。
At the end of every turn, its stats shift position (Attack-> Defense -> Sp. Atk -> Sp. Def -> Speed -> Attack...)
每回合结束后，能力都会发生转换。(物攻->物防->特攻->特防->速度->物攻...)
Healing on the Pokémon is reversed.
反转自身的治疗效果。
Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to waterlog the attacker.
被特殊类技能攻击时，有30%概率使攻击者陷入浸水状态。
The effect of healing on foes is reversed.
使敌方的治疗效果发生反转。
When free from non-volatile status conditions, non-damaging moves by foes are drawn in.
当没有处于稳定型异常时，会吸引对手的非伤害类技能。
Foretold moves hit two turns quicker and deal 30% more damage.
预言类技能会提前2回合，并增加30%伤害。
Deals more damage to targets the faster it is than them. Up to a 50% bonus at double Speed.
速度越快造成的伤害越高，速度为对方的两倍时，增加50%伤害。
Your Poké Balls are 50% more effective.
所有精灵球的捕捉率增加50%。
Sets a Reflect for 4 turns upon entering the battle.
入场时，制造持续4回合的反射壁。
Raises Defense and Sp. Def by three steps when its HP is lowered below half.
当HP低于一半时，双防增加3级。
Boosts power of light-based moves by 30%.
光类技能的威力增加30%。
Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to dizzy the attacker.
受到特殊类攻击后有30%概率使对手陷入混乱。
After using a sound move, all foes are tormented.
声音类技能会对敌方全员施加折磨状态。
Can hold two different items, if both are Berries.
可同时携带2个树果类物品。
Boosts Defense by 25%. The Pokémon cannot be flinched.
物防增加25%，且不会畏缩。
Causes hail to deal double damage and increase Defense of Ice-types by 2.0x instead of 1.5x.
使冰雹造成的伤害翻倍，并且使冰属性的物防增加效果从1.5倍变为2倍。
Its special attacks reduce the target's Sp. Def.
特殊类攻击会使目标的特防减小1级。
Boosts the power of blade moves by 30%. Blade moves ignore the target's modified Defense and Sp. Def.
增加切割类技能的威力30%，并且切割类技能无视目标增加或者减小的双防。
After using a light move, lowers each foe's Sp. Def.
使用光类技能后，所有对手的特防减小1级。
Move damage that's decreased by sunshine is decreased twice as much.
受阳光削弱的技能会额外减小伤害。
Increase the EXP gained from battles in which it participates by 50%.
战斗获得的经验增加50%。
Heals from trapping damage it deals. Takes 25% less damage from Pokémon that are trapped.
回复自身施加的束缚类效果造成的同等伤害的HP。被束缚的精灵攻击时，受到的伤害减小25%。
Lays a hazard of levitating stones around the opponent when its HP is lowered below half.
HP低于一半时，在对手周围放置隐型岩。
When hit with an attack, uses Pain Split on the attacker if its HP is lower than the attacker.
被攻击时，若其HP低于攻击者，则会对攻击者使用痛苦平分。
Has a 30% chance to dizzy targets when using special moves.
使用特殊类技能时，有30%概率使对手混乱。
Slips past hazards. On the first turn, its attacks are always critical.
无视陷阱，出场的第1回合必定会击中对手的要害。
Moves ignore immunities due to typing.
技能无视属性免疫效果。
If an attack lowers its HP to half or less, lowers all of the attacker's stats.
如果被攻击到HP低于一半，会使对方全部能力的能力等级减小1级。
Boosts the power of wind-based moves by 30%.
风类技能威力增加30%。
Its attacks are always physical attacks.
所有攻击都是物理类攻击。
Takes 30% less move damage from Pokémon that are shorter than it.
如果身高比对手高，受到的伤害减小30%。
Self-destructing at full health leaves it at 1 HP.
在满HP时自爆，会留下1HP。
Receives 33% less move damage, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.
受到的技能伤害减小33%，但每回合减小10%的最大HP。
Has a 30% chance to burn targets when using physical moves.
使用物理类技能时，30%概率使对方烧伤。
Has a 30% chance to burn targets when using special moves.
使用特殊类技能时，30%概率使对方烧伤。
During hail, the Pokémon's Speed is boosted by 50% and twice as likely to crit.
冰雹时，速度增加0%，且命中要害率翻倍。
Prevents itself and allies from being poisoned, leeched, or waterlogged.
自身和队友不会陷入中毒、寄生、或者浸水。
Upon entry, consumes scattered coins to heal for 1/10th the amount consumed. This can overheal.
出场时，消耗场上的金钱进行回复，回复量为消耗的金钱量的10%。可以过量回复。
Heals by 1/5th HP whenever any Pokémon uses a dance move. Can overheal.
每当有精灵使用舞蹈类技能时，回复自身最大HP的1/5，可以过量回复。
The Pokémon's Speed is doubled while using light-based moves.
使用光类技能时，速度翻倍。
Immune to Fighting-type moves, and raises Attack and Sp. Atk if hit by one.
免疫格斗属性技能，被格斗属性技能击中时双攻增加1级。
Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to frostbite the attacker.
受到物理类技能攻击时，30%概率使对方冻伤。
Has a 30% chance to frostbite targets when using special moves.
使用特殊类技能时，30%概率使对方冻伤。
Raises Speed whenever any Pokémon uses a dance move.
任何精灵使用舞蹈类技能时，都会增加其速度。
Physical moves have a 30% chance to frostbite targets.
使用物理类技能时，30%概率使对方冻伤。
After knocking out any Pokémon with Waterfall, transforms into its Rampage form. Ability becomes Juggernaut.
当使用攀瀑打倒对手时，会变成暴走形态，特性变为破格。
Boosts move damage by 50% while it has a non-volatile status condition. It suffers double effect from such status conditions.
处于稳定型异常时，技能伤害增加50%，但是它会受到该异常的双倍效果。
Traps foes with non-volatile status conditions.
束缚处于稳定型异常的对手。
It changes form to match the move it selected.
根据使用的技能切换自身的状态。
Boosts Sp. Atk and Speed by 30% in rainstorm.
雨天时，特攻和速度增加30%。
Sets a Lucky Chant upon entering the battle, protecting from critical hits for 10 turns.
进入战斗后，10回合内保护自身不会被命中要害。
Can hold two items, but drops one when swapping out.
可以携带2个物品，但在交换精灵时会随机掉落其中1个。
Its attacks are critical against frostbitten targets.
攻击冻伤的对手时，必定会命中要害。
Boosts Sp. Atk by 75%, but the Pokémon becomes frostbitten after attacking.
特攻增加75%，但攻击后会陷入冻伤状态。
Immune to Ice-type moves, and raises Attack and Sp. Atk if hit by one.
免疫冰属性技能，被冰属性技能击中时双攻增加1级。
When hit with an attack, gains that attack's type.
被攻击时，自身获得该攻击的属性。
When hit with a physical move, traps and damages the attacker for three turns. Fails on turns the user switched in.
被物理类技能攻击时，会在3回合内让攻击者被束缚并持续受到伤害。自身替换出场的回合不会发动。
Using or being hit by a physical move leaves a rock on the field. Status moves collect them, healing by 1/4th each.
使用物理类技能攻击或被物理类攻击命中时，将留下一块石头。能力发生变化时将拾起石块，每块恢复25%HP。
Changes to the form of your choosing after switching out.
替换后可以选择1个形态并变成那个形态。
Upon entry, creates a Substitute from 1/4th of its HP.
出场时，消耗自身1/4的HP制造1个替身。
When hit with a special move, hits back instantly with Breach.
被特殊类技能击中时，会立即使用潮汐一击进行反击。
When a foe hits the Pokémon, they are warned. If they do it again, they become cursed.
被攻击时，会先警告对手，如果再次受到已经被警告过的对手的攻击，使对手陷入诅咒。
Immune to Dragon-type, Fairy-type and Ghost-type attacks.
免疫龙属性、妖精属性和幽灵属性技能。
When this Pokémon gains a non-volatile status condition, its Attack is raised by three steps.
当陷入稳定型异常时，物攻增加3级。
Powers up the Pokémon's Dark-type moves by 50% in sandstorm.
在沙暴中，精灵的恶系技能威力增加50%。
While the Pokémon is below half health, its attacks poisons those hit.
当精灵的HP低于一半时，其攻击会使被击中的目标中毒。
Takes 30% less move damage if a Tailwind is blowing.
有顺风时，受到技能的伤害减小30%。
Boosts Attack and Sp. Atk after knocking out any Pokémon.
打倒对手时，双攻增加1级。
On the first turn, its attacks burn the target.
第1回合的攻击会使对方烧伤。
Immune to non-volatile status conditions due to its hard shell. Boosts Sp. Atk and Speed by 30% in sandstorm.
免疫稳定型异常，在沙暴中，特攻和速度增加30%。
Prevents Bug- or Poison-type moves during moonglow.
在月辉天气中，免疫虫、毒属性技能。
Boosts Attack by 50%, but physical moves deal 25% damage back as recoil.
物攻增加50%，但使用物理类技能时会造成25%的反伤。
Foes aren't released from its trapping moves even when the Pokémon leaves the field.
此精灵离场，敌人也不会脱离陷阱类技能的影响。
33% of all move damage taken by the Pokémon is instead taken at the end of the next turn.
精灵受到的所有技能伤害的33%会在下1回合结束时再承受。
Doubles the Pokémon's Defense in a sandstorm.
在沙暴中，精灵的物防翻倍。
Restores the Pokémon's HP based on damage taken by others from sandstorm.
根据其他精灵因沙暴所受的伤害恢复自身HP。
The Pokémon is immune to Ground-type moves and takes 20% less damage in sandstorm.
精灵免疫地面属性技能，在沙暴中受到的伤害减小20%。
Prevents Water- or Grass-type moves during sandstorm.
在沙暴天气中使水、草属性的技能失效。
Enemies which swap in take damage equal to 1/8th their HP.
换人入场的对手将会受到其1/8最大HP的伤害。
At the end of each turn, its Sp. Atk is lowered. Then, you choose to raise its Speed or heal it for 1/5th HP.
每回合结束时特攻减小，但会增加其速度或治疗20%HP。
It can avoid being knocked out by sacrificing its held item.
可通过丢弃携带的物品避免被打倒。
On the first turn, its attacks numb the target.
出场的第1回合的攻击会使目标麻痹。
Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to dizzy the attacker.
使用物理类技能时有30%概率使对方混乱。
After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Attack and Defense.
打倒对手时，物攻和物防增加1级。
Reduces move damage taken by 50% when HP is full. Can't be dizzied.
满HP时受到技能伤害减小50%，且不会陷入混乱。
Deals 50% more damage to targets who have already taken damage this turn.
对于本回合受到过伤害的目标，造成的伤害增加50%。
Reduces the damage of each hit against it by an amount equal to its level.
减小等同于等级数的每次受到的伤害。
Immune to Dragon-type moves. Deals double damage to Dragon-types.
免疫龙属性技能，且对龙属性造成双倍伤害。
Upon entry during eclipse, lowers foe's Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps.
在日食入场时，让对手的双攻减小2级。
Raises Sp. Atk by two steps whenever any battler falls asleep.
每当有一只精灵在战斗中陷入睡眠，自身的特攻增加2级。
If an attack lowers its HP to half or less, the attacker becomes drowsy.
被攻击使HP减小到一半以下时，使攻击者陷入瞌睡状态。
Move damage that's decreased by rainstorm is decreased twice as much.
暴雨天减小技能伤害的效果翻倍。
Creates Grey Mist for three turns when entering the battlefield.
进入战场时，制造持续3回合的灰雾。
Speed is doubled on the first turn.
出场的第1回合速度翻倍。
Whenever it uses a status move, becomes energized, doubling the power of its next Electric-type attack.
使用变化类技能时会进入充电状态，下次电属性技能威力翻倍。
Boosts power of the Pokémon's sound-based moves by 50%.
声音类技能的威力增加50%。
In sandstorm, the Pokémon's Attack is boosted by 30%.
在沙暴中，精灵的物攻增加30%。
If its stats would be changed, instead they're changed half as much in the opposite direction (rounded up).
当能力等级改变时，会朝相反方向变化一半。
Repeats another Pokémon's sound and pulse moves immediately at 50% power.
立即以50%的威力重复另一只精灵的声音类或者脉冲类技能。
The Pokémon and its allies are protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.
自身及其队友受到保护，不会受到畏缩、威吓、震慑和阻挠的影响。
Boosts the power of pulse moves by 30%.
脉冲类技能的威力增加30%，治愈脉冲的回复效果增加30%。
Uses Lightning Dance if an attack lowers its HP to half or below.
被攻击使自身HP降到一半或更低，会使用闪电舞。
Upon entry, creates an Emotion Room for four turns, switching Abilities every turn.
出场时，开启1个持续4回合的情感空间，在该空间下，精灵每回合都会切换自身的特性。
Can't be numbed, waterlogged, or have its Speed reduced.
不会陷入麻痹、浸水，速度也不会被减小。
The Pokémon's moves have priority against single targets with increased stats.
技能对于拥有增加的能力等级的单个对手拥有先制度。
Eclipse counts down twice as quickly.
日食的计时速度增加为两倍。
Powers up Psychic-type moves by 50%.
超能属性技能的威力增加50%。
The Pokemon's Fighting-type attacks become spread and deal 35% more damage.
该精灵的格斗属性技能变为扩散攻击，并且伤害增加35%。
Changes the weather to star storm, which increases its damage over time. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.
将天气变为星辰风暴，随着时间推移，天气造成的伤害会递增，离场后持续3回合。
Dig and Undermine deal 50% more damage.
挖洞和暗袭要害造成的伤害增加50%。
Takes half damage from Psychic- and Ghost-type attacks.
受到的超能、幽灵属性攻击伤害减半。
Boosts Speed by 50% but the Pokémon is locked into the first move they use.
速度增加50%，但该精灵会被锁定在它使用的第1个技能中。
At low health, eats other battlers' low-health triggered berries.
在低HP的时，会吃掉其他精灵的低HP触发的树果。
Upon entry, the Pokémon heals itself for 1/4th max HP. This can overheal.
出场时，回复25%最大HP，且可以过量回复。
Increases Attack by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.
物攻增加50%，但每回合受到10%最大HP的伤害。
Increases Sp. Atk by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.
特攻增加50%，但每回合受到10%最大HP的伤害。
Heals by 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in eclipse.
日食时，每回合回复1/8最大HP。
Prevents itself and allies from being burned, frostbitten, or numbed.
自身和队友不会被烧伤、冻伤或麻痹。
Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.
出场时，使对方的特攻减小2级。
Can hold two different items, if one is clothing and the other is not.
在携带衣物类物品时，可额外携带1个非衣物类物品。
Raises all of its stats whenever it knocks out a Pokémon with a critical hit.
每次命中要害打倒敌方时，所有能力的能力等级增加1级。
After attacking any foe, the Pokémon immediately uses Rest.
攻击任何对手后立即使用睡觉。
Takes half damage from Ice- and Flying-type attacks.
受到冰、飞行属性攻击时，伤害减半。
When attacked with a special move, inflicts 1/8th max HP damage on the attacker.
被特殊类技能攻击时，对手会受到1/8HP的伤害。
Boosts Attack by 75%, but the Pokémon becomes burned after attacking.
物攻增加75%，但发动攻击后自身会烧伤。
During eclipse, gets a 30% boost to Sp. Atk.
日食时，特攻增加30%。
Double the Pokémon's Speed if any enemy is below half health.
当任一对手HP低于一半时，速度翻倍。
Takes 30% less damage in a rainstorm.
雨天时，受到的伤害减小30%。
The Pokémon is also Fire-type.
该精灵视为具有火属性。
Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to burn the attacker.
受到特殊类技能攻击时，有30%概率使对方烧伤。
Heals 1/16th HP every turn. Protected from being numbed or waterlogged.
每回合恢复1/16的HP，并且不会陷入麻痹和浸水。
Immune to Poison-type moves, and boosts Defense and Sp. Def when hit by one.
免疫毒属性技能，被毒属性技能击中时增加双防1级。
Restores 1/8 HP in sunshine, 1/4 when hit by Fire-type moves. Loses 1/8 in rainstorm, takes 25% more from Water-type moves.
晴天每回合恢复1/8HP，受火攻恢复25%HP。暴雨天每回合损失1/8HP，受水攻损失25%HP。
At the end of every turn, each Pokémon takes 1/8th HP damage. This is treated as Fire-type.
回合结束时，每只精灵受到1/8最大HP的火属性伤害。
Immune to Fire-type moves, and raises Attack and Sp. Atk if hit by one.
免疫火属性技能，被火属性技能击中时双攻增加1级。
Powers up priority moves by 30%.
先制技能威力增加30%。
Upon entry, summons Natural Protection for 4 turns.
进入战斗后，召唤1个持续4回合的自然防护。
Flying-type attacks have a 40% chance to burn.
飞行属性的攻击有40%概率使对方烧伤。
On the first turn, its attacks frostbite the target.
第1回合的攻击会使对方冻伤。
Attacks this Pokémon uses that don't share a type with it are boosted by 30%.
使用非本属性技能时，威力增加30%。
Grows at the end of each turn, slowing down but improving other stats.
每回合结束时长大，变成速度更小，但其他能力更大的形态。
Doubles Attack, but the Pokémon becomes dizzy after attacking.
物攻翻倍，但是攻击后会使自身陷入混乱。
Upon entry, summons a Cruel Cocoon on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.
进入战斗后，召唤1个持续6回合的残酷之茧。
Hits opponent with Gust when withdrawn from battle.
离开战斗时，使用起风攻击对手。
Grants immunity to Bug-type moves, and raises Attack and Sp. Atk when hit by one.
免疫虫属性技能，被虫属性技能击中时双攻增加1级。
Upon entry, summons a Misdirecting Fog on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.
进入战斗后，召唤持续6回合的迷惑之雾。
Raises Speed by two steps after knocking out any Pokémon.
打倒对手时，速度增加2级。
Immune to Psychic-type moves, and raises Attack and Sp. Atk if hit by one.
免疫超能属性技能，被超能属性技能击中时双攻增加1级。
Raises Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps when hit by a not-very-effective move.
被效果不佳的技能击中时，双攻增加2级。
Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in Rooms.
当存在空间类效果时，精灵的速度翻倍。
Raises other allies' Speed by two steps upon entering the battle.
进入战斗后，队友的速度大幅度增加。
The Pokémon changes type to that of the move it's about to use. However, it's 20% less accurate.
会根据即将使用的技能改变属性，但命中率减小20%。
Counts as every tribe.
同时算作每个部族。
When hit with a special move, hits back instantly with that same move.
被特殊类技能攻击时，立即使用同样的技能还击。
Boosts Attack and Speed by 30% in hail.
在冰雹中，物攻和速度增加30%。
Traps the foe during hail.
在冰雹中时，会束缚对手。
Summons a hail for four turns when hit by an attack.
被攻击时，开启4回合的冰雹。
Flying-type attacks have a 40% chance to frostbite.
飞行属性的攻击有40%概率使对方冻伤。
Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.
进入战斗后，使对手的速度减小2级。
Boosts Attack by 30%, but lowers Attack after using a physical move.
物攻增加30%，但使用物理类技能后会使物攻减小1级。
Immune to Fire-type and Ice-type moves.
免疫火、冰属性技能。
Doubled Attack during the turn of a Full Moon.
在满月天气中，物攻翻倍。
Random added effects of wind-based moves are +50% more likely to occur.
风类技能的随机附加效果发生的概率增加50%。
Boosts the power of wind-based moves by 50%.
风类技能威力增加50%。
Completely protects allies from foes' spread moves.
保护队友不受对手的扩散类技能的攻击。
Pokémon that swap in for this have their Speed raised and their PP fully restored.
进入战斗时，创造1个持续10回合的保护罩，保护自身不受负面状态影响。
Turns the held item of a Pokémon it hits into gold coins for you to take.
将被击中的精灵的物品转化为金钱，金钱会散落在场上。
Immune to Fire-type moves and raises Defense and Sp. Def if hit by one.
免疫火属性技能，被火属性技能击中时增加双防1级。
Random added effects of bite attacks are +50% more likely likely to occur.
咬类技能触发附加效果的概率增加50%。
Draining moves deal 30% more damage. Can overheal when draining.
吸取类技能增加30%伤害，且可以过量回复。
Eats pinch berries earlier than normal. Gets a random pinch berry at the end of each turn if it has no item.
会更早吃掉树果，没有携带物品时，每回合结束随机获得一枚树果。
Upon entry, intensifies gravity for four turns.
出场时，开启持续4回合的重力。
Intensifies gravity for four turns when hit by an attack.
受到攻击时，开启持续4回合的重力。
Moves that trap and damage the opponent for three turns deal 50% more damage on the initial hit.
束缚类技能第1次命中时，伤害增加50%。
Boosts Sp. Def by two steps when hit by an attack.
受到攻击时，特防增加2级。
Raises Attack and Sp. Atk whenever any Pokémon uses a dance move.
每当有精灵使用舞蹈类技能时，双攻增加1级。
Heals 1/16th HP every turn. Protected from being poisoned.
每回合恢复1/16HP，并且不会陷入中毒。
Upon entry, traps each opponent in a whirlpool for two turns.
进入战斗后，将所有对手困在潮漩中两回合。
Summons eclipse for four turns when it enters battle.
进入战斗后召唤持续4回合的日食天气。
If an attack lowers the Pokémon's HP to half or less, the attacker becomes fractured.
被攻击到HP低于一半时，使攻击者陷入破碎状态。
Deals 30% more move damage to Pokémon that are taller than it.
对身高更高的精灵额外造成30%技能伤害。
Its attacks are critical against burned targets.
攻击烧伤状态的对手时必定命中要害。
When this Pokémon gains a non-volatile status condition, its Speed is raised by three steps.
当陷入稳定型异常时，速度增加3级。
The Pokémon is also Ghost-type.
此精灵也视为幽灵属性。
Doubles Sp. Atk, but the Pokémon becomes dizzy after attacking.
特攻翻倍，但是攻击后会使自身陷入混乱。
Immune to Fairy-type moves and restores 25% of max HP if hit by one. This can overheal.
免疫妖精属性技能，被妖精属性技能攻击时，恢复1/4的HP。可以过量回复。
Immune to Dark-type moves, and boosts Attack and Sp. Atk when hit by one.
免疫恶属性技能，被恶属性技能击中时双攻增加1级。
Changes the weather to ice age, which damages and prevents healing. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.
将天气变为冰河时代，天气会造成伤害并且阻止精灵回复，离场后持续3回合。
Heals by 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in sunshine.
晴天时，每回合恢复最大HP的1/8。
Doubles the Pokémon's Sp. Def in sunshine.
在阳光下，精灵的特防翻倍。
Boosts the power of kicking moves by 30%. Immune to hazards.
踢类技能威力增加30%，并免疫各种陷阱。
Traps the foe during gravity.
存在重力时，会束缚对手。
Can hold two different items, if both are Herbs.
可同时携带2个香草类物品。
Wild Pokémon are more likely to appear in pairs and to be species you've never caught before.
更容易使未捕捉过的野生的精灵成对出现。
Turns to Finale Form when only unfainted on team. Ability becomes Inner Focus.
当队伍只剩下自身后，将变为终结形态，特性更改为精神力。
The Pokémon and its allies are immune to weather downsides.
自身与队友不受天气的不利因素影响。
Powers up Bug-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.
自身及队友的虫属性技能的威力增加50%。
When entering battle, heals self and allies for 25% of their max health.
进入战斗时，治疗自身和队友25%最大HP。
Lowers priority of status moves used by any Pokémon.
减小其他精灵使用变化类技能的先制度。
Powers up recoil and sound moves by 30%.
反伤类和声音类技能的威力增加30%。
The Pokémon's Speed is doubled while using rampage moves.
使用暴走类技能时，速度翻倍。
Raises Sp. Atk after knocking out any Pokémon.
打倒对手时，特攻增加1级。
When hit by a move with 95 or more base power, hits back instantly with Nuzzle.
当被95基础威力以上的技能击中后，立即用蹭蹭脸颊予以还击。
Punches, Kicks, and Bites combo together to create special effects.
拳、脚、牙类技能组合在一起，将产生特殊效果。
Doubles Speed. Dashes to avoid hazards when entering.
速度翻倍，进入战斗时免疫陷阱。
Doubles the power of blade moves on the first turn.
出场的第一回合使用的切割类技能的威力翻倍。
It can avoid being knocked out by using its face. The face then melts.
可以避免濒死，之后冰块就会融化。
Doubles Sp. Def in hail.
冰雹天气下特防翻倍。
During hail, it restores its HP by half the damage it deals with attacks.
冰雹天气时，恢复攻击造成的伤害的一半HP。
Each turn, raises Speed by three steps and loses 1/8th max HP. If Speed was maxed, instead Speed and HP are reset.
每回合结束时，速度增加3级，HP减小1/8，如果速度已达到最大等级，重置速度并回复全部HP。
Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in moonglow.
在月辉下增加30%的特攻。
Raises Speed by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.
对手减小自身能力时，速度增加4级。
Prevents stat steps from being lowered (except when self-inflicted). Protects from critical hits.
不会被其他精灵减小能力等级，也不会被命中要害。
Special attacks against the Pokémon raise its Speed by two steps but lower its Sp. Def.
受到特殊类技能攻击时，大幅度增加自身的速度，但特防会减小。
Its same-type attack bonus is based on its party members rather than itself.
使用本属性技能攻击时，根据队内同属性成员获得加成。
When this Pokémon gains a non-volatile status condition, its Sp. Atk is raised by three steps.
当陷入稳定型异常时，特攻增加3级。
Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back. While disguised, copies its ability.
出场时伪装成后排的精灵。在伪装期间，复制被伪装的精灵的特性。
After being attacked, gains immunity to that move's type but loses other morphed immunities.
被攻击后，获得对该技能属性的免疫能力，但会失去其他属性的免疫能力。
Immune to Steel-type moves and raises Speed if hit by one.
受到钢属性技能攻击时，免疫伤害并增加速度。
Pokémon take damage from non-volatile status conditions even while switched out.
精灵即使替换离场，也会受到稳定型异常的伤害。
The Pokémon is also Grass-type. When hit by an attack, the attacker's ability becomes Infected.
增加草属性。被攻击时，使攻击者的特性变为该特性。
Summons sunshine for four turns when hit by an attack.
受到攻击后释放大晴天，持续4回合。
Upon entry, creates an Insight Room for four turns, giving everyone a fifth move.
出场时，开启1个持续4回合的洞察空间，所有精灵获得第5个技能。
Special moves have a 30% chance to poison targets.
特殊类技能有30%概率让对手中毒。
Takes 30% less damage until it uses an attack.
在攻击之前受到的伤害减小。
At the beginning of each turn, gives clues about a foe's plan.
每个回合开始前，提供1个对手的行动线索。
Boosts the power of kicking moves by 30%.
踢类技能伤害增加30%。
Causes sandstorm to deal double damage and increase Sp. Def of Rock-types by 2.0x instead of 1.5x.
使沙暴造成的伤害翻倍，并且使岩石属性的特防增加效果从1.5倍变为2倍。
Raises Attack by two steps after dealing not-very-effective or barely-effective damage.
如果攻击无效或效果不佳，物攻增加2级。
Uses Wish after knocking out any Pokémon.
打倒对手时，使用祈愿。
Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves or activate after hitting the target.
攻击时，无视对手的特性。
If an attack lowers the Pokémon's HP to half or less, the attacker becomes jinxed.
被攻击到HP低于一半时，使攻击者陷入不幸状态。
Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to leech the attacker.
受到物理类攻击时，30%概率令对方受到伤害。
Rather than take recoil damage, it swaps out, and its replacement takes that damage.
不会受到反伤，而是替换出其它精灵代替它承受反伤。
Pokémon can't raise their stats. Pokémon that dance take damage equal to 1/4th their HP.
所有精灵无法增加能力等级。使用舞蹈类技能的精灵会受到其最大HP四分之一的伤害。
Uses Snatch upon entry, stealing self-targeting status moves.
进入战斗后立即使用抢夺。
Boosts the power of punching moves by 50%.
拳类技能威力增加30%。
At end of turn, regenerates its previously-used berry.
回合结束时，使之前的树果再生。
Cannot take damage or be switched out. Hears Perish Song upon entering, ensuring its demise.
不会受到伤害且不能被替换下场，入场时会立即听到灭亡之歌。
Deals 30% more damage when it's slower than the target.
速度比对方慢时，额外造成30%伤害。
Protected from critical hits. Can't be burned or frostbitten.
不会被命中要害，免疫烧伤、冻伤。
At the end of each turn, heals self by 1/20 and a party member by the amount the Pokémon was healed.
回合结束时恢复1/20HP，队伍内其他精灵额外为其提供治疗量。
Doubled Speed if any enemy has a non-volatile status condition.
如果任何对手有稳定型异常，速度翻倍。
Deals 50% more damage to targets that switched in this turn. Takes 50% less damage if it switched in this turn.
对本回合换出的精灵造成额外伤害，如果自身在本回合换出，减小50%受到的伤害。
Doubles the damage and recoil of recoil moves.
使用反伤类技能时，伤害和反伤都会翻倍。
Boosts Speed by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.
增加50%速度，但每回合受到1/10HP伤害。
Protected against critical hits. Heals 1/12th HP every turn if hit by an attack.
不会被命中要害。被攻击后每回合回复1/12HP。
Multi-hit moves can hit up to twice as many times.
多段伤害类技能最多可以打出原先最大次数的两倍的次数。
Copies the Ability of the Pokémon it switches in to replace.
复制它要替换的精灵的特性。
Boosts power of sound-based moves by 30%.
增加声音技能30%的威力。
When hit while asleep, hits back instantly with Snore.
如果睡眠时被击中，会立即用鼾声还击。
Summons moonglow for four turns when hit by an attack.
受到攻击后召唤持续4回合的月辉。
Boosts Attack by 30% in moonglow.
在月辉下增加30%的攻击。
At end of turn, heals 1/12th HP if holding a clothing item.
在回合结束时，若携带衣物类物品，则回复1/12的HP。
Transforms into Midnight Form at the Full Moon. Ability becomes No Guard.
在满月时会化身黑夜形态。特性变为无防守。
The Pokémon's Speed is doubled while using Sound-based moves.
使用声音类技能时，该精灵的速度翻倍。
When hit with a special move, traps and damages the attacker for three turns. Fails on turns the user switched in.
被特殊类技能攻击时，会在3回合内让攻击者被束缚并持续受到伤害。自身替换出场的回合不会发动。
If an attack lowers the Pokémon's HP to half or less, the attacker becomes cursed.
被攻击到HP低于一半时，使攻击者陷入诅咒状态。
When attacking during moonglow, uses the target's Attack and Sp. Atk instead of its own.
在月辉下攻击时，使用目标的物攻或者特攻进行伤害计算。
Physical moves have a 30% chance to waterlog targets.
物理类技能有30%的概率使目标陷入浸水。
Dive and Depth Charge deal 50% more damage.
潜水和深海猛袭的伤害增加50%。
Repeats another Pokémon's punch and kick moves immediately at 50% power.
立即以50%的威力重复另一只精灵的拳类或者踢类技能。
All Pokémon's damage is decreased proportional to their health remaining.
所有精灵的伤害都会根据它们的剩余生命值按比例减小。
The Pokémon can't be Taunted, Encored, Tormented, Heal Blocked, Disabled, Barred, Dizzied, or Flinched.
不会受到任何心灵类效果的影响。
Disables the opponent's most recently-used move for two turns upon hitting it.
击中对手后，使其最后使用的技能失效两回合。
Boosts the Pokémon's Speed by 50% in sandstorm or hail.
在沙暴或冰雹中，精灵的速度增加50%。
Boosts Attack by 50% if it used a special move last turn, or boosts Sp. Atk if physical.
在上回合使用特殊类技能后增加攻击，使用物理类技能后增加特攻。
Using a status move in moonglow extends the weather by a turn.
在月辉下使用变化类技能会增加1回合天气。
Powers up the Pokémon's Dark-type moves by 50% in sunshine.
在阳光下，精灵的恶系技能威力增加50%。
Slips past hazards. Takes one third less damage if it switched in this turn.
无视场地上的陷阱。替换上场的回合受到的伤害减小1/3。
If an attack lowers its HP to half or less, waterlogs the attacker.
被攻击到HP低于一半时，使攻击者陷入浸水状态。
When hit by another Pokémon, destroys one of their items.
被其他精灵击中时，会破坏对方的1个物品。
Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in moonglow.
在月辉下每回合回复1/8的HP。
The Pokémon and its allies take 25% less move damage during moonglow.
在月辉下，该精灵及其队友受到的技能伤害减小25%。
Summons moonglow for four turns when it enters battle.
进入战斗后，召唤持续4回合的月辉。
When hit in moonglow, steals the attacker's item, or knocks it away.
当在月辉下被攻击时，能够偷走对手的物品或将其拍落。
Hits opponent with Thief when withdrawn from battle.
在战斗中被收回时，会用小偷攻击对手。
The Pokemon's Psychic-type attacks become spread and deal 35% more damage.
该精灵的超能属性技能变为扩散攻击，并且伤害增加35%。
Immune to the type of the memory disc it holds.
对存储盘相同的属性免疫。
It changes type to that of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.
每次战斗生效1次，根据即将使用的技能改变自身的属性。
Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%, and makes them special when that would be more effective.
拳类技能威力增加30%，并在更有效的情况下，转化为特殊类攻击。
Attackers lose 1/10th of their HP. If the Pokémon is below half health, attackers lose 1/5th instead.
攻击者会减小1/10HP。若自身HP低于一半，攻击者将减小1/5HP。
Special moves have a 30% chance to numb targets.
特殊类技能有30%的概率麻痹对手。
Heals 1/12th HP per turn if there's a weather. Immune to weather downsides.
如果有天气，每回合回复1/12HP。不会受到天气的负面影响。
While the Pokémon is unfainted (in battle or switched out), poisoned foes also suffer from dizzy.
如果此精灵未倒下，中毒的对手会同时陷入混乱。
Doubles Speed in moonglow.
在月辉下速度翻倍。
Boosts Speed by 50% in moonglow. Can't miss during moonglow.
在月辉下增加50%的速度，且攻击必中。
In moonglow, Attack is boosted by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.
在月辉下，物攻增加50%，但每回合受到1/10HP的伤害。
During moonglow, Speed is boosted by 50% and twice as likely to crit.
在月辉下，速度增加50%，命中要害概率增加两倍。
Deals no damage to a target while they are using a status move.
在对方使用变化类技能时，无法对其造成伤害。
Traps foes when they are below half health.
束缚HP小于50%的对手。
Reduces each other Pokémon's HP by 1/12th at the end of each turn.
回合结束时，减小其他精灵1/12HP。
Physical moves have a 30% chance to numb targets.
物理类技能有30%的概率麻痹对手。
Boosts the Accuracy of its allies and itself by 50%.
使自身和队友的命中率增加50%。
Upon entry, creates an Odd Room for four turns, swapping offensive and defensive stats.
出场时，开启1个持续4回合的奇异空间，交换物攻和物防，特攻和特防。。
On the first turn, its attacks cause the target to flinch.
出场的第1回合的攻击会使对手畏缩。
Sets a Tailwind for four turns upon entering the battle, increasing Speed.
进入战斗后创造持续4回合的顺风。
Prevents stat steps from being lowered (except when self-inflicted). The Pokémon's weight is doubled.
能力等级不会被其他精灵减小，并且使体重翻倍。
The Pokémon is also Fairy-type.
该精灵视为具有妖精属性。
After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Attack and Speed.
打倒对手时，物攻和速度增加1级。
After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Sp. Atk and Speed.
打倒对手时，特攻和速度增加1级。
Copies the unmodified stats of the Pokémon it switches in to replace.
替换上场时，复制被替换的精灵的能力。
Boosts Sp. Atk by 30%, but lowers Sp. Atk after using a special move.
特攻增加30%，但使用特殊类技能后特攻会减小1级。
Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in rainstorm.
在暴雨中增加30%的特攻。
Heals the Pokémon's non-volatile status conditions each turn if in sunshine.
晴天时，每回合回复稳定型异常。
The Pokémon refuses to fight. However, it gathers extra candy when trainers flee.
该精灵拒绝战斗。然而，当对手的训练师逃跑时，它会收集额外的糖果。
The Pokémon receives 33% less move damage if there is an active Room.
如果存在任1个激活的空间类效果，精灵受到的技能伤害减小33%。
Powers up Rock-type moves by 50%.
岩石属性技能的威力增加50%。
Doubles Sp. Def. The Pokémon takes double damage from Psychic-type moves.
特防翻倍，但受到的超能技能伤害也翻倍。
Immune to Flying-type moves and deals 50% more damage with them.
免疫飞行属性技能，并且使用飞行属性技能时伤害增加50%。
After fainting from exploding, revives after six turns.
因自爆类技能而濒死时，6回合后会重新苏醒。
The Pokémon's hits deal half damage unless they are critical.
如果没有命中要害，自身造成的伤害减半。
Maximizes the frequency of multi-hit moves. Always deals critical hits.
多段伤害类技能总是会使用出最大次数，且必定命中要害。
At the end of each of its turns, Speed is lowered but every other stat is raised.
每个回合结束时，速度会减小，但其他所有能力都会增加。
While the Pokémon is below half health, its attacks leech those hit.
当HP小于50%时，攻击将会寄生对手。
Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to cause numbing.
受到特殊类攻击时30%概率麻痹对手。
Whenever a foe raises their stats, the Pokémon follows suit.
对手增加能力时，自身能力也跟着增加。
The Pokémon's moves deal 50% more damage if they're a different type than last.
攻击时，如果使用的技能和上回合使用的技能属性不同，造成的伤害增加50%。
The user's moves cannot miss against trapped targets.
攻击被束缚的目标时，必定会命中。
Deals 30% more damage to trapped foes.
攻击被束缚的对手时，伤害增加30%。
Takes no damage from non-volatile status conditions.
不会受到稳定型异常的伤害。
Sets screens for two more turns.
使屏障类效果增加2回合。
Attacks against the Pokémon deal 50% more damage, but the attacker takes 100% recoil.
受到的伤害增加50%，但攻击者会受到100%的反伤。
During eclipse, immune to non-volatile status conditions and stat reductions.
日食时，免疫稳定型异常和能力等级减小效果。
At the first chance, copies an opponent's species' legal Abilities.
复制对手的所有特性。
Immune to Poison-type moves and restores 25% of max HP if hit by one.
免疫毒属性技能，被毒属性技能攻击时，恢复1/4的HP。
Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.
受到特殊类攻击后有30%概率使对手陷入中毒。
Upon entry, creates a Polarized Room for four turns, exaggerating type matchups.
出场时，开启1个持续4回合的极化空间。
Upon switch out, lowers the foe's Attack and Sp. Atk stat by insulting them.
离场时，通过辱骂对手使其双攻减小1级。
Its physical attacks go last but force the target to switch out after use.
使用物理类攻击会后出手，但能让对手强制替换。
Has a 30% chance to leech targets when using physical moves.
使用物理类技能时有30%的概率寄生对手。
Right before the Pokémon is attacked, the attacker's stat changes are reset.
受到攻击前，重置对手的攻击能力变化。
Deals 25% more damage per stockpile.
每蓄力1次，造成的伤害增加25%。
Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to leech the attacker.
自身被特殊类技能攻击时，有30%概率寄生对手。
Raises the Pokémon's Sp. Atk by 50%, including Style Values and other bonuses.
特攻增加50%。
Raises the Pokémon's Attack by 50%, including Style Values and other bonuses.
物攻增加50%。
The Pokémon's Dragon-type hits deal additional damage equal to half the Pokémon's level.
精灵的龙属性攻击会造成额外伤害，数值等于精灵等级的一半。
Upon entry, creates a Puzzle Room for four turns, swapping unmodified Attack and Sp. Atk.
出场时，开启1个持续4回合的迷惑空间，场上的精灵会交换自身的基础双攻。
Both deals and takes double damage on its first full turn out in battle.
第1回合时，造成和受到的伤害翻倍。
Releases a hazard layer of Spikes when hit by an attack.
被击时，释放一层菱。
Boosts power of light-based moves by 50%.
光类技能的威力增加50%。
Powers up Fairy-type moves by 50% in rainstorm.
在暴雨天气时，妖精属性技能的威力增加50%。
Ignores screens, Substitute, and Abilities that would affect its moves.
无视对手的屏障类效果、替身以及会影响到自身的技能的特性。
Moves that can flinch are 50% more likely. Deals 50% more damage to Pokémon with flinch immunity.
使目标畏缩的技能发动畏缩效果的概率增加50%。对处于畏缩免疫效果的精灵造成的伤害增加50%。
Boosts the power of blade moves by 30%. They're twice as likely to crit.
切割类技能威力增加30%，命中要害率翻倍。
Takes half damage from Dragon-, Fairy-, and Ghost-type attacks.
受到龙属性、妖精属性和幽灵属性攻击的伤害减半。
If the Pokémon faints from Perish Song, it is revived in a new form.
如果被灭亡之歌打倒，将复活并进入新形态。
Maximizes Sp. Atk when its HP is lowered below half.
自身HP低于一半时，特攻增加至最大。
After knocking out any Pokémon, regenerates its previously-used item.
打倒对手时，再生自身之前使用的物品。
Before using a status move against a single foe, lowers their Sp. Def by two steps.
对单个对手使用变化类技能前，大幅度减小其特防。
Light moves change the Pokémon's secondary type and their power is boosted by 30%.
光类技能会改变精灵的附加属性，并且威力增加30%。
Upon entry during sunshine, heals the lowest HP ally or self by 33%.
在阳光下出场时，为HP最低的队友或自身回复33%的HP。
Pokémon that swap in for this have their non-volatile status conditions healed, and take 30% less damage that turn.
替换该精灵上场的精灵会回复其稳定型异常，并且在那1回合受到的伤害减小30%。
When hit with a physical move, hits back instantly with Leafage.
受到物理类攻击时，会立刻以树叶反击。
Critical hits lower all of the victim's stats.
命中要害时，使对手全部能力的能力等级减小1级。
"Two to five" multi-hit moves hit an additional time.
多段伤害类技能会在原先的基础上多攻击1次。
Immune to Dark-type and Bug-type moves.
免疫恶属性和虫属性技能。
Spread moves hitting multiple targets deal 50% more damage.
扩散类技能命中多个目标时，伤害增加50%。
When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it raises its Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps.
吃下树果时，双攻增加2级。
Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn during sandstorm.
沙暴天气时，每回合回复1/8的HP。
Immune to Rock-type moves and to Stealth Rock, and raises Speed whenever one would hit it.
受到岩石属性技能攻击时，免疫伤害并增加速度。
Takes 50% less damage while performing a move which charges up or exhausts the user.
使用蓄力类技能或者僵直类技能时，受到的伤害减小50%。
Gets 50% more healing from all sources.
所有治疗的回复效果增加50%。
Makes foes unable to use priority moves.
向对手施加威慑力，使其无法使用先制技能。
Immune to Fighting-type and Rock-type moves. Prevents Stealth Rock damage.
免疫格斗属性和岩石属性技能。不受隐型岩伤害。
Protected from random added effects. Takes 30% less damage from moves with random added effects.
免疫技能附加效果，受到带附加效果的技能伤害减小。
All Pokémon deal 40% more move damage.
所有精灵增加40%技能伤害。
Can't be numbed, waterlogged, trapped, or have its Speed lowered.
不会被麻痹、浸水和无法逃走，速度也不会减小。
The Pokémon is also Steel-type, but it takes 15% more damage from moves.
同时被视为钢属性，但受到的技能伤害增加15%。
Doubles Defense in rainstorm.
在雨天时，物防翻倍。
Summons a sandstorm for four turns when hit by an attack.
受到攻击后召唤持续4回合的沙暴。
Takes 30% less damage in a sandstorm.
在沙暴中受到的伤害减小30%。
When it attacks from underground in sandstorm, it'll transform into Reaper form.
在沙暴天气下从地下攻击时，会化身收割者形态。
Boosts the Pokémon's Speed by 50% in sandstorm. Can't miss during sandstorm.
在沙暴中，精灵的速度增加50%，且攻击必定会命中。
During sandstorm, the Pokémon's Speed is boosted by 50% and twice as likely to crit.
在沙暴中，精灵的速度增加50%，且命中要害率翻倍。
Special moves have a 30% chance to waterlog targets.
特殊类技能有30%的概率使目标浸水。
Changes the weather to ring eclipse, which heralds the total ring eclipse. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.
将天气变为日环食，并预示着日全环食的到来。离场后天气持续3回合。
Powers up Poison-type moves by 50%.
毒属性技能的威力增加50%。
Boosts all of the Pokémon's move damage by 25% during eclipse.
日食天气中，所有技能增加25%伤害。
Restores 1/4th health after any foe faints.
对手被打倒后恢复1/4HP。
Upon entry during sandstorm, lowers foe's Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps.
在沙暴入场时，减小对手的双攻2级。
Moves used on the Pokémon are disabled for two turns.
对此精灵使用的技能将失效两回合。
When targeted by a status move, the offending Pokémon becomes poisoned.
对手对自身使用变化类技能后会陷入中毒状态。
Special moves have a 30% chance to leech targets.
特殊类技能30%概率使对方被寄生。
Boosts one defending stat by two steps according to the foe's Attack and Sp. Atk.
根据对手的双攻，增加物防或者特防2级。
Takes 25% less damage while using a status move.
在使用变化类技能时受到的伤害减小25%。
Boosts Attack by 20% in hail, or 40% if also below half health.
在冰雹天气中，物攻增加20%，若同时生命值低于一半则增加40%。
Its attacks are critical against numbed targets.
攻击麻痹的对手时，必定会命中要害。
Doubles the critical hit chance of random crit moves. The Pokémon's Speed is doubled while using them.
将随机命中要害技能的命中要害率翻倍。使用这些技能时，精灵的速度翻倍。
Its physical attacks reduce the target's Defense.
物理类伤害会减小对手的防御。
Punching moves change the Pokémon's secondary type and their power is boosted by 30%.
拳类技能会改变精灵的附加属性，并且威力增加30%。
Powers up Fighting-type moves by 50%.
格斗属性技能威力增加50%。
Flying-type attacks have a 40% chance to numb.
飞行属性的攻击有40%概率使对方麻痹。
Special moves against it lower the attacker's Speed and Sp. Atk.
被特殊类技能攻击时，使攻击者的速度和特攻减小1级。
The Pokémon and other battlers don't benefit from same-type attacking bonus.
全部精灵失去本属性加成。
Boosts Speed by 50% in rainstorm. Doubles random added effect chance in rainstorm.
在暴雨天气中，速度增加50%，技能的附加效果的触发概率翻倍。
Doubles critical hit chance. Restores HP for half the damage it does with critical hits.
将命中要害率翻倍。用命中要害造成的伤害的一半恢复HP。
At the end of each round, lowers other waterlogged Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps.
在每回合结束时，使其他处于浸水状态的精灵的双攻减小2级。
On the first turn, its attacks leech the target.
第1回合的攻击会寄生对手。
After using a sound move, lowers one of each foe's Attack and Sp. Atk, whichever is higher.
使用声音类技能后，使每个对手较高的物攻或特攻减小1级。
Whenever a foe fails or misses, they take 1/8th HP damage.
对手的技能失败或没命中时，将受到1/8最大HP的伤害。
Boosts Attack by 30% in hail.
在冰雹天气中，物攻增加30%。
Can't be leeched, drained, or trapped.
无法被寄生、吸取或束缚。
Two-turn retreat moves such as Dig deal double damage.
像挖洞这样的两回合技能造成双倍伤害。
Attack is boosted by 50% if a Tailwind is blowing.
顺风时，物攻增加50%。
The Pokémon is also Bug-type, but its Speed is halved.
同时被视为虫属性，但速度减半。
Falls asleep upon entry, but raises all of its stats by two steps.
进入战斗后会直接睡眠，使自身全部能力的能力等级增加2级。
Whenever the Pokémon falls asleep, each other battler becomes drowsy.
陷入睡眠时，其他精灵也会陷入瞌睡。
The Pokémon takes 30% less move damage in hail.
在冰雹时，受到的技能伤害减小30%。
Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by 30% in sunshine.
在晴天时，特攻和特防增加30%。
Doubles Defense in moonglow.
在月辉时，物防翻倍。
Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to waterlog the attacker.
被物理类技能攻击时，有30%的概率使攻击者浸水。
Attacks hit twice for half damage, drain 25% of damage dealt and become special.
攻击分为2次，吸取25%的伤害，并变成特殊类技能。
Your attacks become spread.
精灵的攻击变为能够攻击到对手全部的精灵。
The Pokemon is healed for 1/5th HP after using a Grass-, Ground-, or Steel-type move. Can overheal.
使用草属性、地面属性或者钢属性技能后，回复1/5最大HP，可以过量回复。
The Pokémon and its allies' moves are twice as likely to be critical.
该精灵和其队友的技能的命中要害率翻倍。
Leaves two hazard layers of Spikes after it self-destructs.
自爆后会留下两层菱。
Speed is raised each turn. Speed is reset when hit, but the attacker takes 1/8th HP damage for each step lost.
每回合速度增加1级，被攻击时自身的速度能力等级还原，每还原1级速度，攻击者就受到1/8HP的伤害。
Can't be afflicted with any non-volatile status condition.
不会陷入任何稳定性异常状态。
Has a 30% chance to dizzy targets when using physical moves.
使用物理类技能时有30%的概率混乱对手。
Prevents stat steps from being lowered (except when self-inflicted). Immune to weather downsides.
防止能力等级被对方减小。免疫天气的负面效果。
Doubles critical hit chance for each Speed step up. All moves can random critical hit.
每有1级增加的速度能力等级，命中要害率翻倍。所有技能都有概率随机命中要害。
Sets a Light Screen for 4 turns upon entering the battle.
进入战斗后释放持续4回合的光墙。
During eclipse, its moves can't miss and always activate their random effects.
日食天气时必定命中，且必定触发额外效果。
Takes 50% less damage from Water-type moves. Raises Speed by four steps when hit by one.
受到的水属性技能伤害减小50%。被水属性技能攻击时，速度增加4级。
Immune to Steel-type moves and restores 25% of max HP if hit by one.
免疫钢属性技能，并且受到钢属性技能攻击时会恢复最大HP的25%。
Fly and Dive Bomb deal 50% more damage.
飞翔和俯冲轰炸的伤害增加50%。
Its attacks are critical against waterlogged targets.
攻击浸水的对手时，必定会命中要害。
Can hold a second item by stealing it.
可以通过小偷携带第二件物品。
If an attack lowers its HP to half or less, leeches the attacker.
如果被攻击将自身HP降至50%或以下，就会寄生攻击者。
Prevents half the self-damage from recoil. Powers up moves that have recoil damage by 20%.
增加具有反伤效果的技能的威力20%，并且技能的反伤伤害减半。
Summons rainstorm for four turns when hit by an attack.
受到攻击时，召唤持续4回合的暴雨。
Upon entry, summons a Turbulent Sky on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.
进入战斗后，制造1个持续6回合的动荡之空。
Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves. Its attacks can't be redirected to new targets.
无视会影响到它技能的特性，且必定攻击选定的对手。
Makes foes stressed and unable to use their items.
使对手的物品失效。
In rainstorm, each of its hits is followed by an extra hit at 25% power.
在雨天时，会以25%的威力进行1次额外的攻击。
Prevents its stats from being lowered by more than one step at a time.
被能力减小时，减小量不会超过1级。
Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves. Dizzies opponents that it hits below half health.
无视会影响到它技能的特性，如果攻击后对手的HP低于一半，对手将陷入混乱。
Changes the weather to Blood Moon, which heralds the Full Blood Moon. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.
将天气改变为血月，并预示着血全月的到来。离场后天气持续3回合。
The Pokémon benefits twice as much from style points.
让风格点数的加成翻倍。
Upon entry, creates a Trick Room for four turns, inverting the effect of Speed.
出场时，开启1个持续4回合的戏法空间，反转场上精灵的速度。
Powers up Ice-type moves by 50%.
冰属性技能的威力增加50%。
Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to frostbite the attacker.
受到特殊类攻击后有30%概率使对手陷入冻伤。
Uses Rapid Spin if an attack lowers its HP to half or below.
当受到攻击使HP减小到一半或以下时，使用高速旋转。
Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in hail.
冰雹天气时，增加30%的特攻。
At the end of each turn in sunshine, each Pokémon not immune to sunshine has their Defense and Sp. Def lowered.
在阳光下的每个回合结束时，所有不免疫阳光的负面效果的精灵的双防减小1级。
Boosts the Pokémon's Attack by 30% in sunshine.
在阳光下，精灵的物攻增加30%。
Summons eclipse for four turns when hit by an attack.
受到攻击后，召唤持续4回合的日食。
Powers up Water-type moves by 50%.
水属性技能的威力增加50%。
It avoids hazards and can't be knocked out with one hit.
免疫陷阱，并且不会被一击打倒。
The Pokémon's Speed is doubled while using kicking moves.
使用踢类技能时，该精灵的速度翻倍。
Boosts the power of blade moves by 30%.
使用切割类技能时威力增加30%。
During hail, boosts Speed and Grass-type damage by 50%.
冰雹天气时，速度和草属性伤害增加50%。
Draws in attacks from enemies with below half health.
吸引生命值低于一半的对手的攻击。
Deals 25% more move damage for each ally in battle.
每有1个队友在场，技能伤害增加25%。
Every 3 turns it gets to move twice.
精灵每3回合就可以行动2次。
At the end of each round, lowers other numbed Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def by two steps.
回合结束时，其他被麻痹的精灵双防减小2级。
Boosts damage by 20% if there is a weather. Immune to weather downsides.
在天气下增加20%的伤害。免疫天气的不利影响。
Flinching moves always activate their random effects. However, the Pokemon deals 10% less move damage.
畏缩类技能总会触发其附加效果，但是精灵造成的伤害减小10%。
Becomes energized upon entry, doubling the power of its next Electric-type attack.
出场时，进入充电状态，下次电属性技能威力翻倍。
By sacrificing a held item the Pokémon didn't start with, it can negate one attack against it.
通过牺牲1个精灵入场时未携带的物品，它可以抵消1次针对它的攻击。
Becomes energized when hit by an attack, doubling the power of its next Electric-type attack.
受到攻击时，进入充电状态，下次电属性技能威力翻倍。
Its attacks have priority, deal 25% less damage and become special.
可以率先发起攻击，伤害减小25%，并变成特殊类技能。
Between each turn there's another turn where no one moves.
加快时间流速，在每回合的回合结束时，会跳跃至下下回合。
Foes suffer 50% more move damage reduction from burn, frostbite, and numb.
对手因烧伤、冻伤和麻痹而受到的技能伤害减小效果增加50%。
Upon entry during eclipse, heals the lowest HP ally or self by 33%.
在日食出场时，为HP最低的队友或自身恢复33%的HP。
Restores its HP by 50% of the damage it deals to sleeping targets.
攻击睡眠中的目标会回复自身的HP，回复量为造成伤害的50%。
Takes half damage from Fighting- and Rock-type moves.
受到格斗和岩石属性技能攻击时，伤害减半。
Powers up Poison-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.
自身和队友的毒属性伤害增加50%。
Heals based on the damage other battlers take from being poisoned.
根据其它精灵受到的中毒伤害恢复HP。
Traps the foe during eclipse.
日食时，束缚对手。
Takes 30% less damage from Pokémon that are trapped.
从被束缚的精灵那里受到的伤害减小30%。
Foes whose stats are lowered by the Pokémon keep those lowered stats even after switching.
被它减小能力的对手被切换后，也依然保留被减小的能力。
The Pokémon's Speed is doubled while using recoil moves.
使用反伤类技能时，该精灵的速度翻倍。
Boosts the power of sound moves by 30%. Sound moves ignore the target's modified Defense and Sp. Def.
增加声音类技能的威力30%，并且声音类技能无视目标增加或者减小的双防。
Powers up Ground-type moves by 50%.
地面属性技能的威力增加50%。
Powers up moves of the same type by 50%.
本属性技能的威力增加50%。
Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.
受到恶属性和虫属性技能的攻击时，伤害减半。
Before using a status move against a single foe, lowers their Defense by two steps.
对单个对手使用变化类技能前，使其物防减小2级。
Moves ignore Abilities that would affect its moves or activate after hitting the target, and immunities due to typing.
技能无视会影响其技能或在击中目标后激活的特性，以及因属性而产生的免疫。
Prevents half the self-damage from recoil and Self-Destruct/Explosion.
减小反伤类技能、自爆和大爆炸的自身扣血。
If an attacker would activate a random added effect on the Pokémon, that effect is placed on the attacker instead.
在受到攻击并触发技能的附加效果时，该附加效果由对方承受。
Moves that use stats other than the default deal 50% more damage.
使用非技能本身默认的进攻端能力时，技能威力增加50%。
Takes 20% less damage from neutrally effective attacks.
受到效果一般的攻击时，受到的伤害减小20%。
The Pokémon is Mutant-type.
此精灵将视为基因属性。
Deals 30% more damage to targets that have an item. After attacking a foe, destroys their clothing items.
对携带物品的对手造成更高伤害，如果对手携带了衣服类物品，则将其破坏。
After an attack reduces its HP to half or less, deals 1/4 of the attacker's HP back to the attacker.
被对手攻击令自身HP降到一半以下时，使对方减小1/4的HP。
Immune to Poison-type moves, and raises Attack and Sp. Atk if hit by one.
免疫毒属性技能，被毒属性技能击中时双攻增加1级。
Whenever a foe's poison worsens, the Pokémon heals for 25% max HP.
当对手中毒每次恶化时，自身恢复25%HP。
Powers up Grass-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.
自身和队友的草属性技能威力的增加50%。
Heals non-volatile status conditions and resets stat changes after knocking out any Pokémon.
打倒对手时，回复稳定型异常并重置能力等级。
Takes 40% less damage while using a status move.
使用变化类技能时，受到的伤害减小40%。
At the end of each turn, itself and each ally heals for 1/16th of their HP.
每回合结束时，该精灵和每个队友会恢复其最大生命值的1/16。
The Pokémon's attacks are always critical if there is an active Room.
若场上存在空间，则总能命中要害。
Negates enemy status moves that target the Pokémon or create hazards around it.
可以使对手的以该精灵为目标或在该精灵周围布置陷阱的变化类技能无效。
Double Sp. Def in eclipse.
日食天气时，特防翻倍。
Boosts Speed by 50% in rainstorm. Can't miss during rainstorm.
在暴雨天气中，速度增加50%，且攻击必定命中。
Immune to weather downsides, and takes 20% less damage from attacks during weather.
免疫天气的负面效果，在天气变化时减小受到的伤害。
Powers up all tagged moves by 20%.
所有具有标签的技能的威力增加20%。
Takes 50% less damage from not-very-effective or barely-effective attacks.
受到效果不佳的技能攻击时，减小受到的伤害。
Draws in moves from foes with base power 100 or more. Takes 15% less move damage.
吸引基础威力超过100的对手的攻击，并减小15%受到的伤害。
Uses Power Split upon entry or when hit by a move.
进入战斗或被命中时，使用力量平分。
Upon entry, summons a Primal Forest on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.
进入战斗时，召唤持续6回合的原始之森。
Upon entry, creates a Willful Room for four turns, reducing all hits by 30 damage.
出场时，开启1个持续4回合的意愿空间，减小所有攻击30点伤害。
During hail, immune to Fire- and Electric-type moves.
冰雹天气时，免疫火和电属性技能。
Restores HP based on damage taken by others from hail.
根据其他精灵因冰雹所受的伤害回复HP。
Lays an electrical hazard around the opponent when its HP is lowered below half.
当其HP降至一半以下时，在对手周围布置带电陷阱。
After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def.
打倒对手时，特攻和特防增加1级。
The random added effects of moves by all battlers always activate.
所有精灵使用技能时必定触发附加效果。
Ground-type moves deal 50% more damage in eclipse.
日食天气时，地面属性技能威力增加50%。
Uses Dragon Dance if an attack lowers its HP to half or below.
如果被攻击将自身HP降至50%或以下，就会使用龙舞。
Boosts the power of rampaging moves by 30%, and makes them physical or special based on which would be more effective.
将暴走类技能的威力增加30%，并根据哪种更有效将其变为物理或特殊类技能。
The Pokémon starts as a very convincing Pikachu!
精灵将作为一只非常逼真的皮卡超开始战斗！
Transforms into the entire enemy team, except buffed!
变身为对方的队伍，并获得加成！
Heals for 1/4th of its HP at the end of every turn.
回合结束时恢复1/4HP。
Attack and Speed are halved.
物攻和速度减半。
Protects the Pokémon and its allies from spread moves. Defense increased by 20%.
使对方的扩散类技能使用失败。物防增加20%。
Switches out if its HP becomes half or less. The replacement Pokémon's ​​first hit must be a crit​​ and if it's Doduo or Dodrio, it will use Fly​​ immediately.
HP低于一半时，会返回队伍，替换上场的精灵的第1次攻击必定会命中要害，如果替换的精灵是嘟嘟或者嘟嘟利，还会立刻使用飞天。
When hitting a target that has an ability with an offensive damage-modifying effect, the Pokémon ignores the conditions and triggers the effect.
当攻击的对手具有它自身在攻击时改变伤害的效果的特性时（如猛火），无视那个特性的发动条件并为自身触发该效果。
Takes half damage from Dragon-, Fairy-, and Ghost-type attacks. Positive stat steps remain after switching.
受到的龙属性、妖精属性和幽灵属性攻击的伤害减半。增加的能力等级即使替换离场也会依旧保留。
When the Pokémon's level is 25 or higher, it transforms into a member of its family depending on the type of the move it is about to use.
当精灵等级达到25级或以上时，它会根据即将使用的技能的属性变为其家族的成员。
Turns the held item of a Pokémon it hits into coins. Consumes coins to heal for 1/10th the amount consumed when its HP becomes half or less. This can overheal.
攻击时，把对手的物品变为金钱并散落在场上，当HP小于一半时，消耗场上的金钱，回复消耗金钱量的10%的HP，可以过量回复。
When knocks out any foe, it reverses its own timeline, changes to its initial state upon entering the battle.
当打倒对手时，回溯时间，将自身回溯到刚进入战斗时的状态。
Boosts both one offending and defending stat by one step according to the foe's defenses and offenses.
出场时，根据对手的双攻和双防，自适应增加自身的某项攻击和防御。
Attacks switching opponents with Pursuit if the Pokémon's HP is greater than 50%.
如果HP大于一半，那么就会自动使用追击攻击进行替换的对手。
Adapts the move's type to ensure it is super-effective against the target.
调整技能的类型，以确保其对目标具有效果拔群效果。
Adapts the move's type to ensure it is truly super-effective against the target.
调整技能的类型，以确保其对目标具有真正的效果拔群效果。
Adapts the move's type to maximize effectiveness while accounting for the immunities.
调整技能的类型，以考虑免疫因素来最大化伤害。
Adapts the move's type to maximize damage against the target.
调整技能的类型，以对目标造成绝对最大伤害。
When the Pokémon faints, it rewinds itself to 3 turns ago.
当精灵濒死时，它会回到3回合前的状态。
The targets cannot avoid facing the attack by the Pokémon.
目标必须面对该精灵的攻击。
Changes to a random Pokémon at the end of each turn.
在每个回合结束时，随机变为一只精灵。
Can switch out of battle without wasting a turn.
可以和队伍里的其他精灵进行替换，替换上场的精灵依然可以使用行动。
Turns rainstorm into Harsh Sunlight, sunshine into Heavy Rain.
将雨天改为大晴天，将晴天改为大雨天。
Stats that the Pokémon raises remain raised even after switching.
精灵增加的能力等级即使在替换下场后仍会保持。
The user adds the type of whatever dance move they use.
使用舞蹈类技能时，变成该技能的属性。
Immune to Bug-type moves and raises Speed if hit by one.
对虫属性技能免疫，被虫属性技能攻击时，速度增加1级。
Once per switch-in, Charges in sandstorm, doubling the power of its next Electric-type move.
使用技能后，如果天气为沙暴，会立刻使自身进入充电状态。（每次出场只会发动1次）
This ability exists just to showcase the PBS Extensions system.
这个特性只是为了展示PBS扩展系统。

How are your Pokémon doing?\mMy \TP's really energetic. It's a handful!\mOh yeah, I managed to beat a tough \TE.\mI need to make my party stronger.
你的精灵最近怎么样？\m我的\TP精力充沛得很。真是个调皮鬼！\m对了，我最近打败了1个难缠的\TE。\m我得让我的队伍变得更强大。
My \TP's looking really awesome.\mI wish I could show you.\mHey, listen! I almost caught a \TE the other day.\mOh, it was sooooooo close, too!
我的\TP看起来酷毙了。\m真希望我能给你看看。\m嘿，听着！我前几天差点就抓到1个\TE了。\m哦，差一点就抓到了！
Want to battle? It's not going to be a repeat of the last time we met.\mI'll be waiting for you around \TM.
想来场战斗吗？这次可不会像上次那样了。\m我会在\TM附近等你。
Do you want to battle? I'm going to win this time!\mI'll be waiting for you around \TM.\mLook for me, OK? My \TP will be expecting you.
想来场战斗吗？这次我一定会赢！\m我会在\TM附近等你。\m来找我哦，好吗？我的\TP也会期待你的到来。

早上好，\PN。\m我是\TN。我有没有吵醒你？

How are your Pokémon doing?\mMy \TP's really energetic. It's a handful!
你的精灵最近怎么样？\m我的\TP精力充沛得很。真是个调皮鬼！
How are your Pokémon doing?\mI always keep my \TP in top shape by going to Pokémon Centers.
你的精灵最近怎么样？\m我总是通过去精灵中心来保持我的\TP处于最佳状态。
My \TP's looking really awesome. I wish I could show you.
我的\TP看起来酷毙了。真希望我能给你看看。
I dressed my \TP and it looks even cuter than before.
我给我的\TP打扮了一下，它看起来比以前更可爱了。
Oh yeah, I managed to beat a tough \TE.\mI need to make my party stronger.
对了，我最近打败了1个难缠的\TE。\m我得让我的队伍变得更强大。
You have to hear this! I battled \TE the other day.\mIt was easy! I had a type advantage.
你一定要听听这个！我前几天和\TE战斗了。\m太轻松了！我有属性优势。
Hey, listen! I almost caught \TE the other day.\mOh, it was sooooooo close, too!
嘿，听着！我前几天差点就抓到\TE了。\m哦，差一点就抓到了！
Guess what happened the other day. I missed catching \TE again.\mMaybe I'm not very good at this.
猜猜前几天发生了什么。我又没抓到\TE。\m也许我不太擅长这个。

If true, this map is an outdoor map and will be tinted according to time of day.

If true, the game will display the map's name upon entry.
如果为真，游戏将在进入时显示地图的名称。
If true, the bicycle can be used on this map.

If true, the bicycle will be mounted automatically on this map and cannot be dismounted.

If true, this map is dark and a circle of light appears around the player. Flash can be used to expand the circle.
如果为真，该地图是黑暗的，并且玩家周围会出现1个光圈。可以使用闪光来扩大光圈。
If true, this map is part of the Safari Zone (both indoor and outdoor). Not to be used in the reception desk.
如果为真，这张地图是狩猎区的一部分（包括室内和室外）。不要在接待台使用。
If true, when the player goes near this map's edge, the game doesn't center the player as usual.
如果为真，当玩家接近这张地图的边缘时，游戏不会像往常一样将玩家置于中心。
If true, this map has a randomly generated layout. See the wiki for more information.
如果为真，这张地图有1个随机生成的布局。更多信息请查看维基。

The current level cap is {1}.
目前的等级上限为{1}。
Once at level {1}, your Pokémon cannot gain experience or have Candies used on them.
到达{1}级后，你的精灵就不能再获得经验或使用糖果了。
The level cap can be raised by reading Battle Reports (a consumable item).
通过阅读战斗报告（一种消耗品）可以增加等级上限。
You'll earn Battle Reports after defeating Gym Leaders and major story battles.
打倒道馆馆主和主要剧情战斗后，你将获得战斗报告。

<c3=404040,B0B0B0>A mysterious Pokémon Egg received from <c3=F83820,E09890>{1}<c3=404040,B0B0B0>.

<c3=404040,B0B0B0>A mysterious Pokémon Egg.
<c3=404040,B0B0B0>神秘精灵蛋。
<c3=404040,B0B0B0>"The Egg Watch"
<c3=404040,B0B0B0>"蛋观察器"
It looks like this Egg will take a long time to hatch.
看起来这个蛋需要很长时间才能孵化。
What will hatch from this? It doesn't seem close to hatching.
这个蛋会孵化出什么？似乎还远未到孵化的时候。
It appears to move occasionally. It may be close to hatching.
它偶尔会动。可能快要孵化了。
Sounds can be heard coming from inside! It will hatch soon!
可以听到里面传来声音！它很快就要孵化了！
