{1}h {2}m
{1}h {2}m
{1}m
{1}m
<outln2>Tribal Bonus Info</outln2>
<outln2>部族简介</outln2>
Wild Pokémon don't give experience in Pokémon Tectonic.
在地震中，打倒野生的精灵不会给予经验。
Please don't kill too many Pokémon, or you'll be punished!
请不要击杀太多野生的精灵，否则你会被惩罚！
Don't worry, there's an abundance of experience to gain in other ways.
不过不用担心经验不足，正常游戏过程中，可通过其他方式获得充足的经验。
If you encounter a Pokémon you don't want, run away. It's guaranteed!
如果你遇到了你不需要的精灵，直接逃跑好了。逃跑是必定成功的！
After a full party heal, defeated enemy trainers will be battle ready again!
在恢复全队精灵状态后，比如说在精灵中心恢复，
For example, healing at a Pokémon Center triggers this.
例如，在精灵中心治疗会触发这个。
Trainers who fled won't come back, however.
不过已经离开的训练师，就不会再回来了。
There's a shortcut key(F) to instantly mount the bicycle while walking.
在步行时，有1个快捷键（F）可以立即骑上自行车。
Access your control setttings with <imp>F1</imp> to customize it.
按<imp>F1</imp>后可以自行将键位调整为你习惯的方案。
Individual Pokémon have unique Traits, Likes, and Dislikes.
每只精灵都有独特的性情、喜好和不喜欢。
These have no effect on battle. They're just for fun!
这些内容对对战没有影响，只是单纯为了好玩^_^。
To customize your stats, adjust Style Points in any PokéCenter.
要定制你的能力风格，可以在任何精灵中心调整风格点数。
Stats can be changed during battle by 'stat steps'.
战斗中可通过“变化类技能”改变能力等级。
A step is a small change! At +1 steps, only 25% is added to the stat.
每1级的变化都很小，+1时只有25%的属性加成。
Check the Info menu to see the active steps and their effects on the battlers.
详细内容可在“信息”菜单查看。
Tectonic introduced many options that let you customize the game speed, especially in battles.
游戏中增加了很多选项，其中包括设定游戏速度。
Make sure to go over all the options to determine what you want to enable.
请务必查看所有选项，以确定要启用哪些功能。
Want to learn about your active battler's moves?
要了解现有的战斗技能吗？
Activate the Move Info Panel! It's a feature of the Fight screen.
新功能，激活技能面板。
Press your "Action" key (Z/Shift by default) to toggle it on or off.
按下“功能”键(Z/Shift)后，可以开启或关闭此功能。
Many type matchups were changed in Pokémon Tectonic.
在该游戏中，许多属性克制关系发生了变化。
To strengthen some types, we had to weaken others.
为了加强某些属性，我们不得不削弱了其中一部分。
Check the MasterDex or the Battle Guide to learn these changes.
查看大师图鉴或战斗指南以了解这些变化。
Sometimes you will receive evolvable Pokémon at your level cap.
在游戏过程中，您的精灵会经常达到等级上限。
Does this mean you can't evolve them until later? No!
这种情况下如果要使达到等级要求的精灵进化，
Just press the Evolve button in your party screen.
只需要在精灵菜单中，点击“进化”按钮即可。
Catching and raising lots of Pokémon is useful for Mentoring.
多捕捉和培养一些精灵会对你的通关流程提供很大帮助。
Mentoring lets you copy moves between your Pokémon!
你可以通过教导功能使精灵学会很多技能！
Just talk to the Mentor Coordinator in any PokéCenter.
只需要跟精灵中心的教导员对话就可以了。
Some moves are both Physical and Special! These are "Adaptive" moves.
有些技能的图标中同时显示物理和特殊，这些是“自适应”技能。
They change based on the user's stats!
它们会根据使用者的能力发生变化！
Physical if Attack is higher, and Special if Sp. Atk is higher.
如果攻击较高，即为物理类技能，反之特攻较高，即为特殊类技能。
Every PokéCenter and every Ranger Station will contain the 3 Team Customization NPCs.
每个精灵中心和补给站都有3个培养型NPC。
Speak to them to learn how they can upgrade your team!
与他们交谈就能更好地组建你的团队！
The last 5 boxes of the PC are donation boxes.
电脑的最后5个箱子是捐赠箱，这些箱子里的精灵无法再取出使用。
Pokémon placed in these boxes can never be withdrawn.
放入这些箱子中的精灵永远无法取出。
In repayment, you get candy equal to their lifetime EXP earnings.
作为补偿，你会得到相当于它们一生中获得的经验值的糖果。
Individual Pokémon have individual appearances.
每只精灵都有独特的外观。
They differ in hue and brightness!
它们在色调和亮度上有所不同！
If you wish, you can turn this off in the options.
如果你愿意，可以在选项中关闭这个功能。
\wm#{tutorialMessage}\wtnp<<[>>#{tutorialMessageDuration}<<]>><<1>>
\wm#{tutorialMessage}\wtnp<<[>>#{tutorialMessageDuration}<<]>><<1>>
x{1:03d}
x{1:03d}
A {1} was created!
已创造{1}！
The chosen waypoint is somehow invalid.
此地点无效。
Removing access.
取消访问。
The totem pulses with the frequency of {1}.
图腾以{1}的频率脉动。
\i[{1}]Activate the {2} to summon {3}?
\i[{1}]激活{2}召唤{3}？
The totem returns to its original state.
图腾恢复原状。
\i[{1}]Expend the {2} to summon {3}?
\i[{1}]消耗{2}召唤{3}？
The {1} was consumed in the summoning.
{1}在召唤中被消耗了。
You sense an powerful presence trying to manifest on this spot.
你感觉到了一股强大的力量。
However, you seem to lack a way to interact with it.
不过你好像没有跟它互动的方法。
An Avatar Totem is partially manifested on this spot.
1个化身图腾在此显现。
It pulses with the frequency of {1}.
它以{1}的频率脉动。
The summoning spot exhausted its energy.
召唤点的能量耗尽了。
A mystical Avatar Totem. You sense it has some purpose, long lost to time.
1个神秘的化身图腾。你感觉到它有某种目的，但早已被时间遗忘。
A mystical Avatar Totem. It pulses with ancient vital energy.
1个神秘的化身图腾跳动着古老的生命能量。
A mystical Avatar Totem. It pulses with an unusual frequency.
神秘的化身图腾以不寻常的频率跳动着。
\i[SPANNINGBAND]The Spanning Bands glow in sync with the totem. You sense that some sort of connection has been created.
\i[SPANNINGBAND]跨越之带与图腾同步发光。你感觉到某种连接已经建立。
However, it does not react further. Perhaps you must find more like it?
但是它没有进一步反应或许还需要其他类似的东西？
You sense the connection to the other totems. Choose your warp location.
你感觉到了与其它图腾的联系选择你要前往的点位。
There are no active totems to warp to.
没有活动的图腾可以前往。
Basic Strategy
战斗策略
How do I win battles?
如何获胜？
Acquiring Pokémon
获取精灵
How do I get more Pokémon?
获得精灵？
Moves
技能
What are moves and what are the differences between them?
技能？
Type Matchups
属性对比
When and how are types better or worse against one another?
属性克制？
Type Chart
属性图表
How were type matchups changes compared to canon?
与正作的区别？
Stats
能力
What are stats, and how do they affect battles?
什么是能力值？
Abilities
特性
How do abilities work?
特性相关？
What are held items and how to use them?
物品携带相关？
Status Conditions
异常状态
What are the Conditions a Pokémon can be afflicted with?
异常状态？
Volatile Statuses
非稳定性异常
What are the Volatile Statuses a Pokémon can be afflicted with?
精灵可能受到哪些非稳定性异常的影响？
Critical Hits
命中要害
What are critical hits and when do they happen?
打出更高伤害？
Trainers
训练师
How do enemy Trainers work?
NPC训练师？
What are avatars and what do they do?
什么是化身？
What does the MasterDex do and how should I use it?
图鉴有什么用？
Weathers
天气
What are weathers, and what does each do?
什么是天气
Tribes
部族
What are Tribes and what do they do?
什么是部族？
Winning Battles
赢得战斗
You win a battle when all enemy Pokémon faint: reach 0 health points. You lose a battle if any of your Pokémon faints. Fainted Pokémon will revive in several turns.
当你使所有敌方精灵濒死：HP达到0时，你赢得战斗。如果你的任何精灵濒死，你就输掉战斗。濒死的精灵将在10个回合后复活。
1. Have as many Pokémon as you can. 2. Level up your Pokémon as much as you can. 3. Abuse type matchups. 4. Start battles with healthy Pokémon.
多抓精灵，多升级，多用不同属性，用满HP精灵开始战斗。
Team Size
队伍规模
You can have a maximum of 6 Pokémon with you at any time. This is known as your 'Team'. You can store extra Pokémon using the PC in any PokéCenter.
队伍最多拥有6只精灵，其他精灵则储存在精灵中心的电脑中。
Levels
等级
Each Pokémon has a level from 1 to 70. A Pokémon's level determines its stats as well as what moves it could learn. Reaching high enough levels also unlocks Evolution.
精灵的等级从1到70不等，等级决定了它可以学习的技能和能否进化。
Types are strong or weak against other types. Having a variety of different types on your team helps you take advantage of these relationships.
不同属性之间有克制关系，一只队伍中含有不同属性可以更方便处理各种情况。
Healing your Pokémon
治疗精灵
Pokémon are healed after a trainer battle. You can heal your Pokémon at PokéCenters between battles. You can often use the Aid Kit instead to save on traveling time.
训练师战斗后，精灵会恢复健康。你可以在战斗之间的精灵中心治疗你的精灵。你通常也可以使用急救包来节省旅行时间。
Who goes first?
行动顺序？
In battle, the Pokémon with the higher speed stat gets to use their move first. Some moves modify this. Speed ties are decided randomly.
战斗中，速度更大的精灵可以率先行动，但有些技能可以改变行动顺序，速度相等时随机决定先后。
Attacking vs Status
攻击与变化
Attacking moves deal damage. Status moves do not. Status moves are notated by a Yin/Yang symbol (White and Black intermixing).
伤害类技能会造成伤害，但变化类技能不会，通常带有强化或削弱效果。
Physical vs Special
物理和特殊
Attacking moves are split into Physical moves, and Special moves. Each of these categories uses different stats to determine how much damage is dealt to the target.
伤害类技能分为物理特殊两类，每种都会以不同属性，决定对目标造成的伤害程度。
Physical Moves
物理类技能
Physical moves are notated by the symbol of a smashing fist. Their damage is based on the Attack (Atk) stat of the attacker and the Defense (Def) stat of the target.
物理类伤害以爆炸符号表示，其伤害基于攻击者的物攻和承受者的物防进行计算。
Special Moves
特殊类技能
Special moves are notated by the symbol of a splash. Their damage is based on the Special Attack (Sp. Atk) of the attacker and the Special Defense (Sp. Def) of the target.
物理类伤害以涟漪符号表示，其伤害基于攻击者的特攻和承受者的特防进行计算。
Targeting
技能目标
Most moves target only a single Pokémon, but many can target multiple Pokémon at once. Some moves differ in how far they can target in the bigger battle styles (doubles, triples).
大多数技能只针对单一目标，但也有很多带有群攻能力的技能，很多有与目标距离限制的技能，这些在双打、三打中会起到不同效果。
Move Types
技能属性
Every move has a type. Attacking moves deal different amounts of damage to different Pokémon based on those Pokémon's types. This is called 'type effectiveness'.
每个技能都有一种属性，攻击会根据攻击者和承受者的属性不同，造成不同伤害。
Same-Type Bonus
本属性加成
Pokémon deal 50% more damage with moves the share a type with them. For example, a Raichu deals 50% more damage with an Electric move than a Normal move.
精灵使用与自身属性相同的技能，会额外增加技能威力。
Learning Moves
学习技能
Pokémon learn new moves as they level up. They can also learn moves from the 'Move Tutors' who sit in the left side of every PokéCenter.
精灵在升级过程中可以学到新技能，还可以在精灵中心左侧的NPC处回忆技能或学到其他精灵的技能。
Base Power
基础威力
Moves with higher Base Power deal more damage. Some moves deal variable Base Power depending on the situation. Status moves have no base power.
基础威力越高的技能伤害越高，有些技能的基础威力会发生改变，变化类技能没有威力。
Accuracy is a move's chance of hitting. Most moves have 100% accuracy. Some effects can raise accuracy to let you use low-accuracy moves consistently.
大多数技能的命中率都是100%，游戏中同时有增加命中的方式，确保低命中的技能也能产生效果。
Power Points
PP
Power Points, or PP, is a number which limits how many times a move can be used. Healing at a PokéCenter, after a trainer battle or with the Aid Kit restores PP.
技能点数（PP）是1个限制技能使用次数的数字。在精灵中心治疗、训练师战斗后或使用急救包可以恢复PP。
Each Pokémon has type weakness and type resistances based on its own type. eg. Water deals double damage to Fire, and Fire deals half damage to Water.
每种精灵都有基于自身属性的弱点和抗性，如火弱水，水抗火。
Type Combinations
属性组合
When a Pokémon has two types, its type weaknesses and resistances multiply. A Pokémon can be double weak or double resistant, or immune even though one of their types is weak.
当精灵有两种属性时，它的弱点和抗性就会相互叠加，因此有可能会有非常克制或非常惧怕的属性。
Normal Effective
效果一般
Normal Effective is the default effectiveness of all moves against a Pokémon.
效果一般指的是对其造成的技能伤害为默认效果。
Super Effective
效果拔群
Super Effective moves deal double the damage compared to normal effective moves.
效果拔群的技能伤害是正常的2倍。
Hyper Effective
效果绝佳
Hyper Effective moves deal quadruple the damage compared to normal effective moves. This happens when a Pokémon is double weak to a type.
效果绝佳的技能伤害是正常的4倍。
Not Very Effective
效果不佳
Not Very Effective moves deal half the damage compared to normal effective moves.
效果不佳的技能伤害是正常的一半。
Barely Effective
效果极差
Barely Effective moves deal one quarter the damage compared to normal effective moves. This happens when a Pokémon is double resistant to a type.
效果极差的技能伤害是正常的四分之一。
Ineffective
免疫
Ineffective moves deal no damage at all. This can happen if one of a Pokémon's types has an immunity to the attacking move type, even if the other is neutral (or even weak!).
无效的技能不会造成任何伤害，只要精灵拥有1个免疫对方的属性，即可生效。
Looking Up Matchups
对战情况
The 5th and 6th pages of a MasterDex entry show that Pokémon's type matchups. Open the MasterDex in battle to check matchups if you're not sure.
大师图鉴的第5、6页显示了精灵的属性相关，不确定的话可以在战斗中打开图鉴查看。
Psychic vs Steel
超能和钢
Psychic is now Super-Effective vs Steel. Think of magicians bending spoons.
超能属性现在克制钢属性，想想魔术师的勺子吧。
Poison vs Water
毒和水
Poison is now Super-Effective vs Water. Think of chemicals polluting a river.
毒属性现在克制水属性，想想被污染的河流吧。
Bug vs Fairy
虫和妖精
Bug is now Super-Effective vs Fairy. Think of insects scaring children.
虫属性现在克制妖精属性，想想那些怕毛毛虫的女孩吧。
Grass resistances
草属性抗性
Grass now resists Fairy and Ghost. Think of incense warding off magic.
草属性现在抵抗妖精属性和幽灵属性。想象一下用香薰来抵御魔法。
Ice resistances
冰属性抗性
Ice now resists Flying and Ground. Ice is Super-Effective against those types, so it's only natural!
冰属性现在可以抵抗飞行和地面属性，本身冰属性就克制它们，能抵抗一下也正常。
Other changes
其它改动
Rock resists Ice. Fairy resists Dragon. Fairy is neutral against Fire. Bug resists Psychic.
岩石属性可以抵抗冰属性，妖精属性不再免疫龙属性，火属性抵抗妖精属性，虫属性可以抵抗超能属性。
Why Get More?
需培养更多？
Having choices of Pokémon is important when facing challenges. A team of six is a bare minimum--it's best to catch more and pull them from the PC as needed.
每种精灵都有根据自身的属性确定的弱点，因此在应对特定对手时，最好更改队伍配置。
Methods of Aquiring
精灵获取
The three main methods of acquiring Pokémon are using DexNav, catching them from the wild, and receiving them from other Trainers through gifts or trades.
获取精灵的三种主要方法是使用导航、从野外捕捉以及通过礼物或交易从其他训练师那里接收。
Catching Basics
捕捉常识
Wild Pokémon will attack you if you walk through patches of grass, dark ground in caves, or other wild terrain. You can catch these Pokémon by throwing Poké Balls at them.
在草丛、洞穴中的黑色地板或者其他特殊地形时，就会遇到野生精灵，可以通过向它们扔精灵球的方式将其捕获。
Increase Catch Chance pt. 1
捕获率 上
Catching a Pokémon isn't guaranteed. It's easier to catch Pokémon when their health has been lowered by your attacks, or when they have a status ailment.
当野生精灵的HP被减小，或者受到异常状态影响后，就能更轻松地捉住它们了。
Increase Catch Chance pt. 2
捕获率 下
Every time a Pokémon breaks out of a ball, it'll be slightly easier to catch for the rest of the battle. You can check what your current catch chance is in the Poké Ball menu.
每当精灵从球里出来，它的捕捉率都会进一步增加，而且可以在精灵球的菜单中查看捕捉概率。
Finding Wild Pokémon
寻找野生精灵
Use the DexNav to get information on which Pokémon are available where you are.
使用导航获取你所在位置可用的精灵信息。
Trades
交换
Throughout the world there will be people offering trades for Pokémon. Usually they want a different Pokémon, but sometimes they want money.
世界各地都会有愿意交换精灵的人，只要将打算交换的精灵放在箱子中，就可以与他们交换了。
What are Stats?
什么是能力值？
Stats, short for Statistics, are the numbers which determine how your Pokémon performs in battle.
能力值决定着你的精灵在战斗中的能力表现，以数字形式展示。
Checking Stats
查看能力值
Check your Pokémon's stats by looking at the second page of their summary screen, accessible through the Pokémon menu in the pause menu.
在战斗中可以通过详情菜单，查看战斗时的数据统计。
Stat Factors
统计要素
Your Pokémon's stats are calculated from a combination of their species' 'Base Stats', their own 'Style Points', and extra modifications during battle.
精灵的能力是根据其基础能力、风格点数和战斗中额外获得的修正等级综合算出的。
Base Stats
基本能力值
Every species of Pokémon have base stats, which affect every Pokémon of that species. e.g. Every Raichu will be fast because the Raichu species has a high Speed base stat.
每种精灵都有自身的基础能力，这 些能力会影响该种族的所有精灵。
Style Points
风格点
Style Points are numbers which you can customize to change your Pokémon's stats. Style Points show as blue numbers on the stat page of the summary.
风格点是一种可以自定义精灵属性的玩法，在精灵界面的信息当中，会以蓝色字体显示出来。
Leveling and Evolution
等级与进化
Your Pokémon's stats will increase every time they level up. When Pokémon evolve, their stats change (almost always they increase).
精灵每次升级时，能力值都会增加，进化时增加的更多。
Accuracy and Evasion
命中和回避
Accuracy and Evasion are two stats which are only active in battle, starting at 100% each. They are only modified by in-battle changing effects.
命中和回避能力等级只在战斗中有效，初始均为100%，只会被战斗中的效果改变。
Stat Steps
能力等级
Effects can modify a Pokémon's stats during battle. These are called 'stat steps'. Stat steps multiply or divide the Pokémon's listed stat value.
你可以在战斗中使用变化类技能增加精灵的能力等级，或减小对手的能力等级。
Bounds of Stat Steps
能力等级升降范围
Stat steps start at 0, and can increase up to +12 (4x) and down to -12 (.25x). Stat steps are usually reset if you swap the Pokémon out or it faints.
能力等级从0开始，可以增加到+12（4倍）和减小到-12（0.25倍）。除了自然恢复外，如果交换精灵或它濒死，能力等级通常也会重置。
Checking Stat Steps
检查当前升降
You can check the current stat steps of each Pokémon on the battlefield using the Info button. It lists the numerical step as well as resultant multiplier.
你可以使用战斗中的信息功能，查看战场中的情况，以及精灵的能力值状态。
What are abilities?
特性是什么？
Abilities are special powers that Pokémon can have based on their species. Most Pokémon can have 2 possible abilities. All abilities activate in battle or in the field.
特性是精灵根据其种类可以拥有的特殊能力。大多数精灵可以有2种可能的特性。所有特性在战斗或野外都会激活。
Ability Effects
特性效果
Abilities do a wide variety of different things. Understanding your team's abilities is important to winning.
特性可以做各种不同的事情。了解你的队伍的特性对于获胜很重要。
Checking Abilities
查看特性
Check your Pokémon's summary to see what main ability they have. Use the MasterDex to read about the abilities of enemy Pokémon during battle.
查看你的精灵的摘要，看看它们的主特性是什么。在战斗中使用大师图鉴了解敌方精灵的特性。
Choosing Abilities
选择特性
A Pokémon's default main ability is one of the two its species can have, randomly chosen when you get it. You can use Ability Capsules to swap to the other.
精灵的默认主特性是其种类可以拥有的两种特性之一，在你获得它时随机选择。你可以使用特性胶囊来切换到另一种。
Conditional Abilities
条件限制特性
Many abilities only do things under certain circumstances. Building around Weather and Room-synergy abilities is a common strategy.
有些特性只在特殊情况下才能发挥作用，其中最常见的是天气或空间限制。
Effect Of Evolution
进化的影响
A Pokémon's ability tends to stay the same when evolving, but can change. When this happens, the game will alert you.
精灵的特性在进化时通常是不变的，但也有特殊情况，在发生变化时游戏会给予提示。
Defeating Abilities
打倒特性
An enemy Trainer's ability too much? Abilities like Neutralizing Gas, and moves like Gastro Acid, can suppress abilities in battle.
训练师的战斗力太强了？可以使用一些特定的特性或技能来限制他们的能力。
Swapping Abilities
交换特性
Moves like Skill Swap can be used to give a new ability to Pokémon during battle, enabling unique and creative team synergies.
某些技能和效果可以和对方交换特性，比如技能特性互换。
What are Held Items?
携带物品？
Held items are items which you can give your Pokémon to benefit them during battle. They can increase their damage, heal them, or other things.
可以通过携带一些可以在战斗中使用的物品，增加精灵战斗中的表现。
Equipping an item
携带1个物品
You can give a Pokémon an item from your bag, or through the summary screen. Not all items do an effect when held, so read carefully.
你可以通过背包或精灵菜单给它们携带物品，并不是所有物品携带后都对战斗有所帮助，请仔细阅读。
Berries
树果
Berries are a common held item. During battles, Pokémon will eat the berry to get a benefit. Get berries by picking from Berry Trees.
树果是一种很常见的携带物品，精灵于战斗中会在合适的时候吃掉树果。
Sitrus and Cado Berry
文柚果和净馨果
Sitrus Berry and Cado Berry are common berries which heal your Pokémon when at low health. If in doubt about what item to give a Pokémon, give them one of these.
文柚果和味美果可以在精灵体力较少时触发，并恢复它们的HP，如果不知道该携带些什么，可以选择它们。
Rematerializer
重塑打印机
In Pokémon Tectonic, the Rematerializer regenerates held items which are consumed in battle. You'll never run out of berries!
在游戏中，重塑打印机可以将战斗中消耗的物品再生，因此永远不用担心会把树果用完。
Wild Held Items
野生携带物品
Wild Pokémon can be found holding items. These items sometimes have held effects, but often don't.
野生精灵也会携带物品，这些物品通常没有携带效果，但部分未必。
Getting More
获得物品
You will find more held items on the ground when traveling, or as gifts from people, or as the reward for defeating Avatars, or as purchasable items in shops.
在旅行途中，你会捡到很多可携带的物品，人们也会赠送给你一些礼物，打倒化身也能得到物品奖励，商店中也可以购买一部分。
What are Status Conditions?
异常状态
Status Conditions are ailments a Pokémon can have which hurt or restrict them. They remain after swapping out, and even between battles.
精灵可能在战斗中被异常状态干扰，即便离开战场异常状态也不会消失。
Healing Status Conditions
治愈异常状态
Status Conditions are removed when you heal at the PokéCenter, after a trainer battle or when you use the Aid Kit.
在精灵中心治疗、训练师战斗后或使用急救包时，会移除异常状态。
Status Immunity
免疫异常状态
Type immunities do not prevent status moves. However, some types give immunities to certain status conditions. Don't confuse these two!
属性免疫无法阻止异常状态技能，但某些属性会对异常状态本身产生免疫 ，这两者并不相同。
When burned, a Pokémon's Attack is reduced by 33%, and loses 1/8th HP every turn. Fire- and Ghost-types do the most burning. Fire is immune.
被烧伤的精灵攻击减小33%，每回合损失1/16HP，火属性与幽灵属性最擅长烧伤对手，火属性免疫烧伤。
Frostbite
冻伤
When frostbitten, a Pokémon's Sp. Atk is reduced by 33%, and loses 1/8th HP every turn. Ice- and Flying-types do the most frostbiting. Ice is immune.
被冻伤的精灵特攻减小33%，每回合损失1/16HP，冰属性与飞行属性最擅长冻伤对手，冰属性免疫冻伤。
When poisoned, a Pokémon loses 1/12th HP every turn. This doubles every 2 turns. Poison- and Grass-types do the most poisoning. Poison/Steel are immune.
中毒时，精灵每回合损失1/12的HP。每两回合翻倍。毒属性和草属性最容易造成中毒。毒/钢属性免疫。
When numbed, a Pokémon's Speed is halved, and it deals 25% less damage. Electric- and Fighting-types do the most numbing. Electric is immune.
麻痹的精灵速度减半，造成的伤害减小25%，电属性和格斗属性最擅长麻痹对手，电属性免疫麻痹。
Waterlog
浸水
When waterlogged, a Pokémon's Speed is halved, and it takes 25% more attack damage. Water- and Dark-types do the most waterlogging. Water is immune.
当精灵浸水时，其速度减半，并且受到的攻击伤害增加25%。水属性和恶属性精灵最容易使其他精灵浸水。水属性精灵免疫浸水。
When dizzied, a Pokémon takes 25% more attack damage, and its ability doesn't function. Psychic- and Fairy-types do the most dizzying.
混乱的精灵攻击时伤害增加25%，但特性会失效，超能属性和妖精属性最擅长混乱对手。
When leeched, a Pokémon loses 1/12th HP every turn, and its opponent(s) split that health. Bug- and Dark-types do the most leeching. Grass is immune.
被寄生时，精灵每回合损失1/12的HP，其对手平分这些HP。虫属性和恶属性最容易造成寄生。草属性免疫。
A rarer status that causes a Pokémon to be unable to do anything for 2 turns. Psychic- and Grass-types put Pokémon to sleep the most often.
睡眠的精灵在2回合内无法行动，超能属性和草属性精灵擅长让对手睡眠。
What are Volatile Statuses?
什么是非稳定性异常？
Volatile Status Conditions are similar to Status Conditions, except they will go away if the Pokémon switches out.
非稳定性异常与异常状态类似，但如果精灵切换出去，它们就会消失。
Jinx
不幸
When jinxed, a Pokémon cannot Protect itself, and all attacks against it are guaranteed critical hits. Jinx wears off after 3 turns. Fairy-types do the most jinxing.
被不幸缠身时，精灵无法保护自身，所有针对它的攻击都会造成命中要害。不幸在3回合后消失。妖精属性最容易造成不幸。
Fractured
破碎
When fractured, a Pokémon deals 33% less damage with its moves. Fracture wears off after 3 turns. Rock-types do the most fracturing.
破碎时，精灵的技能造成的伤害减小33%。破碎在3回合后消失。岩石属性最容易造成破碎。
Curse
诅咒
When cursed, a Pokémon loses 25% of its HP every turn. Ghost-types do the most cursing.
被诅咒时，精灵每回合损失25%的HP。幽灵属性最容易造成诅咒。
Torment
折磨
When tormented, a Pokémon cannot use the same move twice in a row. If something prevents it from moving for a turn, it can choose the same move the following turn.
被折磨时，精灵不能连续两回合使用相同的技能。如果某样东西阻止了它在这1回合的行动，它可以在下1回合选择相同的技能。
Taunt
挑衅
When taunted, a Pokémon is prevented from using status moves.
被挑衅时，精灵无法使用状态类技能。
Disable
定身法
When disabled, a Pokémon cannot use the move it last selected.
被定身法时，精灵无法使用它最后选择的技能。
Bar
妨碍
When barred, a Pokémon cannot use moves that don't share a type with themselves.
被妨碍时，精灵无法使用与自身属性不同的技能。
Trapping
束缚
When trapped, a Pokémon cannot switch out of battle. Includes manually switching, being forced out, or using a move like U-Turn.
被束缚时，精灵无法退出战斗。包括手动切换、被迫退出或使用像急速折返这样的技能。
Substitute
替身
A substitute blocks attacks and status effects. It has HP equal to the amount of HP it took to create it. Sound tag moves ignore substitute.
替身可以阻挡攻击和状态效果。它的HP等于创建它时所消耗的HP。声音类技能会无视替身。
Transformed
变身
A transformed Pokémon becomes a copy of another. It gains their ability, moves, stats (except HP), and step boosts.
变身后的精灵会变成另1个精灵的复制品。它会获得对方的特性、技能、能力（除了HP）和增加的能力等级。
Perish Song
灭亡之歌
A Pokémon affected by Perish Song will faint when the timer ends. Avatars will be damaged for half of an HP bar.
受到灭亡之歌影响的精灵会在计时器结束时陷入濒死。化身会受到50%当前血条的伤害。
Grounded
落地
A grounded Pokémon loses their immunity to ground moves (from being Flying-type or having a Levitate ability).
落地的精灵会失去对地面属性技能的免疫（无论是因为飞行属性还是拥有漂浮特性）。
What are Critical Hits?
什么是命中要害？
A critical hit deals 50% more damage than a regular hit. Certain moves are able to randomly critical hit.
命中要害造成的伤害比普通命中多50%。某些技能能够随机命中要害。
How common are Critical Hits?
命中要害的概率？
For moves that can random crit, the chance is 1/8. This chance can be raised by abilities, items, or special effects.
对于能够随机命中要害的技能，其命中要害率为1/8。这个概率可以通过特性、物品或特殊效果增加。
Other Effects
其他影响
Critical hits ignore stat steps (on the user or the target) that would lower their damage. They also ignore protective screens like Reflect and Light Screen.
命中要害的一击不会受到能力等级导致的伤害减小的影响，也不会受到屏障类效果的影响。
Preventing Criticals
防止被命中要害
Certain abilities prevent critical hits against that Pokémon. The Lucky Chant effect protects their side from critical hits.
某些特性可以防止对该精灵的命中要害。幸运咒语的效果可以保护其所在的一方免受命中要害。
Guaranteed Criticals
确保命中要害
Some moves or abilities are not random, but guarantee a critical hit under certain conditions. Otherwise, these act the same as random critical hits.
有些技能或特性可以在某些条件下可以保证命中要害，一般情况下则是概 率击中。
What are Tribes?
部族？
Every Pokémon has 1-3 Tribes, decided by their species. Have 5 Pokémon of a shared Tribe on your team, and your entire team will receive that Tribe's bonus in battle!
每种精灵都有最多3个部族，如果队伍中有5只来自同一部族的精灵 ，将会得到全队奖励。
Tribal Bonus
部族奖励
Tribal Bonuses are not identical: each Tribe provides a unique boon. With careful team composition, you can have 2 or even 3 Tribal Bonuses active at once!
每个部族提供的奖励各不相同，通过精心搭配你的队伍，可以同时激活多个部族的效果！
Are they important?
部族重要性
Tribes are not required in any way to complete the game. They are simply an alternative team-building challenge to play with, like Single Type runs.
如果只是为了通关游戏，其实没必要刻意追求部族，这更像是一种带有奖励性质的趣味性队伍组建挑战。
What are Enemy Trainers?
敌对训练师
Enemy Trainers are the Pokémon Trainers you will battle throughout the game. Some block your path forwards (like Gym Leaders), others are optional.
敌对训练师是在游戏过程中的主要对手，他们有时会阻挡你前进的道路， 而有些可以绕开。
Detecting Trainers
发现训练师
Trainers are people who have a companion Pokémon next to them. If a person doesn't have that, they either aren't a Trainer, or are an inactive one.
训练师指的是身边有精灵的人，如果1个人身边没有精灵，要么不是训练师，要么是暂时不会接受对战的训练师。
Avoiding Trainers
避开训练师
Trainers will challenge you if they see you within 4 tiles of them. Avoid them by going out of that distance, sneaking around them, or waiting until they move.
如果你出现在训练师前方四格范围内，他们就会向你发起挑战，避开战斗的方法就是绕开这个距离。
How to win?
如何获胜？
If you defeat a Trainer but have not 'perfected' the fight, it doesn't count as a win. Frequently using Switch is the key to winning, as switching also restores some HP.
如果你打倒了1个训练师但没有“完美”地完成战斗，这不算作胜利。频繁使用切换是获胜的关键，因为切换还可以恢复一些HP（10%）。
Perfecting Fights
完胜
If you defeat a Trainer without any of your Pokémon fainting, you've 'perfected' the fight. They will leave forever and drop experience candy as a reward.
如果在打倒训练师时没有精灵昏倒，即被视为“完胜”，之后这个训练师便会永远离开，并掉落经验糖果作为奖励。
Enemy Teams
对手队伍
Enemy Trainers have their own teams of Pokémon with their own moves and held items. It's important to pay attention to these possibilities to win battles.
敌对训练师都拥有自身的精灵队伍，有自身的技能搭配和物品携带，如果想在战斗中获胜，就要注意这些内容。
Differences
差异
The typical trainer has 3 Pokémon, but Gym Leaders will have more. Trainers with more Pokémon also have more move variety and more items on their Pokémon.
一般的训练师都只有3只精灵，但道馆馆主的精灵数量更多。
Pro Trainers
精英训练师
Pro Trainers are special Trainers, noted by their grey hair and black clothes. Their teams are always 6 Pokémon, all with items, and built around a Tribal Bonus. They're hard!
精英训练师是一种特殊的训练师，以灰色头发和黑色衣服为标志，他们都拥有六只精灵，且围绕部族组建队伍。
Trainer Behaviour
训练师行为
Individual Trainers will always react to the same in-battle circumstances the same way. You can learn how to beat or even perfect a Trainer through trial and error.
个别训练师的作战方式是固定的，你可以通过不断尝试来了解他们的习惯。
What are Avatars?
化身
Avatars are powerful enemy Pokémon with unique properties that you will fight and destroy during your adventure. They cannot be caught.
化身是拥有独特能力的强大精灵， 你可以在冒险过程中与它们战斗，它们无法被捕捉。
Avatars are Healthy
生命值
Avatars have at least two health bars, which means they have a lot of health. Much more than double the normal amount!
化身至少有2个生命条，这意味着它们拥有大量的生命值。比正常数量多得多！
Multi-Move
多次行动
Avatars can move twice each turn. Their second move will happen after every battler has used their regular move for the turn.
化身每回合可以行动2次，第2次行动固定为当前回合最后1个。
Two Statuses
双异常
Avatars are large, and have room for up to two status conditions at a time. They can't have two of the same condition.
化身体积庞大，可同时受到两种异常状态影响。
HP-Based Effects
抵抗百分比扣血
Effects that damage based on a fraction of total HP are only one-sixth as powerful against avatars, compared to normal Pokémon.
与一般精灵相比，针对HP百分比造成伤害的威力，对化身只有1/6的效果。
Primeval Moves
原初技能
When a health bar is depleted, avatars will use a Primeval Move! Primeval Moves are powered-up versions of status moves, which also change the Avatar's type.
当化身的HP条归零后，化身会使用原初技能！这些技能比一般技能更强，同时改变化身属性。
Clean Slate
清除异常
Before an Avatar uses a Primeval Move, they will also heal from any status conditions and reset any of their stat steps that have been lowered.
化身在用原初技能之前，会治愈自身的异常状态，并重置被减小的能力值。
Shields
护盾
The top of Avatars health bars starts Shielded. Shielded bars take 75% less damage. A shield is removed when the Avatar uses a Primeval Move.
化身的血条顶出现护盾时，受到的伤害减小75%，使用原初技能之后，护盾会被移除。
Attack Choice
攻击选择
Avatars usually only have a few moves to choose from. They usually alternate between their moves on successive attacks.
化身的技能数量是有限的，通常会连续或交替使用这些技能。
Target Choice
搜索
A targeting reticle shows which of your battlers the Avatar wants to attack. It will switch to another battler, however, if their attack is made impossible.
1个瞄准框显示化身想要攻击你的哪个精灵。然而，如果他们的攻击变得不可能，它会切换到另1个精灵。
Empowered Moves
赋权技能
Some Avatars have Empowered attacks, which are powered-up versions of other attacks. They take up both of an Avatar's moves on that turn.
有些化身还拥有赋权技能，这些技能效果更强，但使用后化身将失去此回合第2次行动能力。
Experience Reward
经验
When an Avatar is destroyed, every Pokémon on your team is given experience, even those that are fainted.
当化身被打倒后，队伍内所有精灵都会获得经验，即便是已经倒下的。
Legendary Avatars
传说化身
Legendary Avatars are unique. You fight them with 3 Pokémon, they have 3 HP bars, and they have more moves with more smarts about how to use them.
传说化身是独一无二的，与它们战斗时同时使用3只精灵，它们拥有3个HP条，更多技能和已经设定好的行动方式。
What is the MasterDex?
大师图鉴
The MasterDex is an advanced encyclopedia about the 900+ Pokémon available in this game.
大师图鉴是一本关于游戏中900多种精灵的高级百科全书。
Single MasterDex
单个图鉴
Access the MasterDex entry of a single Pokémon when looking at a Pokémon in the summary or the PC, or by using the Dex button in battles.
在菜单、精灵中 心中查看精灵时，都可以快速访问其图鉴项目。
Full MasterDex
全图鉴
Access the full MasterDex from your pause menu, or by pressing D when using the Dex button in battles (while it's waiting for you to select a battler).
你可以在菜单中访问完整的大师图鉴。
Searching
搜索
When in the MasterDex, you can press your Special keybind (default Shift or Z) to open the first search page. There's dozens of searches to experiment with!
进入大师图鉴后，可以按下特殊键（默认为Z），即可打开第1个搜索界面，此界面支持中文搜索，但无法显示部分打字法输入界面。
Combining Searches
组合搜索
You can begin a search while you're already looking at the results of a search. This will narrow down from what you were already looking at.
你可以在查看搜索结果时再次使用搜索，来缩小查看内容的范围。
Storing Searches
搜索结果
When you hold CTRL while closing out of a search, it will close the MasterDex and store the search for the next time you open it.
在关闭搜索时按住CTRL键，将关闭图鉴并储存搜索结果，以便下次打开使用。
Quick Navigation
快速翻阅
Press A to go up a page at a time, or S to go down a page. Use the number keys (1-9) to quickly go to one of the tab's of a Pokémon's MasterDex entry.
使用图鉴时可以通过按A键向上翻一页，或按S键向下翻一页，使用数字键可以快速进入搜索精灵的项目。
Move Details
技能细节
Press the Use key (defaults to C) on the level up learnset or tutor moves tabs to begin scrolling the lists, and viewing details about individual moves.
在等级技能和教学技能界面，可以通过按C使条目滚动起来。
Checking Evolutions
查看进化
Press the Use key (defaults to C) on the evolutions tab to choose a Pokémon in the same evolutionary tree, and to warp to that Pokémon's MasterDex entry.
在进化界面按C，可以选择同一进化树中的精灵，并进入其条目。
What are weathers?
天气
Weathers are special states that effect the entire battlefield and help or hinder the Pokémon battling. Only one weather can be active at once.
天气是一种影响整个战场的特殊状态，会帮助或阻碍精灵战斗，同一时间只能有一种天气。
Weather Duration
天气持续时间
Weathers last a certain number of turns. The length differs depending on what move or ability summoned the weather. The duration can be extended by certain items.
天气会持续一定的回合数，持续时间长短取决于召唤天气的技能或特性，部分物品可以增加持续时间。
Sunshine
晴天
Sunshine lowers attack damage by 15%. Fire and Grass-type moves/Pokémon are immune to this. Fire-type attacks are boosted by 30%.
阳光会减小15%的攻击伤害。火属性和草属性的技能/精灵免疫此效果。火属性攻击的威力会增加30%。
Rainstorm lowers attack damage by 15%. Water and Electric-type moves/Pokémon are immune to this. Water-type attacks are boosted by 30%.
暴雨会减小15%的攻击伤害。水属性和电属性的技能/精灵免疫此效果。水属性攻击的威力会增加30%。
Sandstorm deals damage to all Pokémon at the end of each turn. Rock and Ground-types are immune to this. Additionally, Rock-types get +50% Special Defense.
沙暴中每回合结束时对所有精灵造成伤害，但岩石属性和地面属性免疫此效果，且岩石属性特防增加50%。
Hail deals damage to all Pokémon at the end of each turn. Ice and Ghost-types are immune to this. Additionally, Ice-types get +50% Defense.
冰雹中每回合结束时对所有精灵造成伤害，但冰属性幽灵属性免疫此效果，且冰属性物防增加50%。
Eclipse lowers all stats of all Pokémon every 4 turns (by 2 steps). Psychic and Dragon-types are immune to this. Additionally, Psychic-type attacks are boosted by 30%.
日食中每4回合减小所有精灵能力两级，但超能属性和龙属性免疫此效果，且超能属性伤害增加30%。
Moonglow flinches all Pokémon every 4 turns. Fairy and Dark-types are immune to this. Additionally, Fairy-type attacks are boosted by 30%.
月辉中每4回合令所有精灵畏缩，妖精属性和恶属性免疫此效果，且妖精属性伤害增加30%。
Weather Downsides
天气负面影响
Each weather has both an upside and a downside. There are items and abilities that make your Pokémon immune to these downsides regardless of type.
每种天气都有自身的利处和不利处，除了属性外，某些物品和跟天气有协同作用的特性可以使精灵免受这些不利因素。
Weather Areas
天气区域
Certain areas in the game experience intense weather. That weather will also be present in the battles of that area. Simple daily weather will not do this.
游戏中的某些区域会出现强烈的天气 ，这些天气也会影响战斗。
Weather Synergies
天气作用
Each weather has dozens of moves and abilities that benefit from that weather. Pokémon using these moves/abilities ignore the downsides of their favored weather!
每种天气都有多种相关技能，这些技能都可以通过对应天气获益。
Use the Arrow keys to move the main character.<<n>>You can also use the Arrow keys to select entries and navigate menus.
可以使用方向键移动主角，<<n>>也可以用来浏览条目。
Used to confirm a choice, interact with people and things, and move through text. (Default: C)
可以使用C键确认或者与人、事物进行互动。
Used to exit, cancel a choice, and cancel a mode. While moving around, hold to move at a different speed. (Default: X)
用于退出、取消选择和取消模式。在移动时，按住以不同的速度移动。（默认：X）
Has various functions depending on context. Also opens the Pause Menu. (Default: Z)
根据上下文具有各种功能。还可以打开暂停菜单。（默认：Z）
Press to open the Ready Menu, where registered items and available field moves can be used. (Default: D)
可以使用D键打开快捷菜单，使用已经注册的物品。
Press to speed up the game.
按下以加快游戏速度。
Press to instantly mount the Bicycle while in the overworld.
按下W键可以快速骑上自行车。
Opens the Key Bindings window, where you can choose which keyboard keys to use for each control.<<n>>Warning: Remapping controls may cause unexpected bugs!
打开按键绑定窗口，你可以选择每个控制使用的键盘按键。<<n>>警告：重新映射控制可能会导致意外的错误！
Press to reset to the main menu.
按下以软重启游戏并进入主菜单。
Take a screenshot. It is put in the Screenshots folder, near your Save Game folder.
游戏截图会放在Screenshots文件夹内。
Version Server Error
版本检测错误
OUT OF DATE
版本已落后

\se[]嗯？{1}的样子！\^
Huh? {1} stopped evolving!
嗯？{1}的进化停止了！
\se[]Congratulations! Your {1} evolved into {2}!\wt[80]
\se[]恭喜！你的{1}进化成了{2}！\wt[80]

Max. HP<r>#{hpDif >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{1}<<n>>物攻<r>#{attackDif >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{2}<<n>>物防<r>#{defenseDif >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{3}<<n>>特攻<r>#{spAtkDif >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{4}<<n>>特防<r>#{spDefDif >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{5}<<n>>速度<r>#{speedDif >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{6}
Max. HP<r>{1}<<n>>Attack<r>{2}<<n>>Defense<r>{3}<<n>>Sp. Atk<r>{4}<<n>>Sp. Def<r>{5}<<n>>Speed<r>{6}
Max. HP<r>{1}<<n>>物攻<r>{2}<<n>>物防<r>{3}<<n>>特攻<r>{4}<<n>>特防<r>{5}<<n>>速度<r>{6}
{1}'s main ability was changed to {2}.
{1}的主特性被改为{2}。

Teach which move?
教哪个？
Mentor Moves
导师技能
What is Move Mentoring?
什么是技能导师？
I'm the Mentor Coordinator. How can I help?
我是导师协调员。我能帮到你什么？
Sorry, it doesn't appear that 1 can have any moves mentored to it at the moment..
抱歉它现在看起来不能接受指导。。
I help your Pokémon to teach each other moves!
我帮助你的精灵互相学习技能！
Pokémon can teach moves they know, moves they used to know, and moves earlier on their level up learnset.
精灵可以教授它们已知的技能、曾经知道的技能以及它们等级增加学习集中更早的技能。
Any Pokémon in your party or in your PC can be a mentor.
你的队伍中的任何精灵或电脑中的精灵都可以成为导师。
Pokémon can be taught any moves on their Other Moves list.
精灵可以学习它们的其他技能列表上的任何技能。
Relearn Moves
重新学习技能
What is Move Relearning?
什么是技能重新学习？
I'm the Move Relearner. How can I help?
我是技能重新学习者。我能帮到你什么？
Sorry, it doesn't appear as if I have any move I can teach to your \v[3].
抱歉，我这里什么技能可以教给你的\v[3]。
I can teach moves to your Pokémon -- at no cost!
我可以免费教你的精灵技能！
I know every single move that Pokémon learn while leveling up or evolving.
我知道精灵在升级或进化时学习的所有技能。
I can also help Pokémon to relearn moves they learned through TMs, Mentoring, or Sketching!
我还可以帮助精灵重新学习它们通过技能机器、导师或素描学习的技能！

Negative generation numbers are invalid.
负的世代编号是无效的。

Sort by what?
按什么排序？
<c3=F8F8F8,C02028>SEEN<r>OBTAINED</c3>
<c3=F8F8F8,C02028>已见<r>已获</c3>
No Help Yet
目前无提示
No assistance is available yet. This feature will be implemented in the future!
目前尚且没有任务提示，该功能将在后续版本实现！
Starting Your Adventure
开始你的旅程
Receive your first starter and your crucial starting items from Professor Tamarind.
从塔玛琳博士那里获得第1个精灵和其他重要物品。
Find the First Gym Leader
寻找第1个道馆馆主
Search the island for Lambert, the first Makya League Gym Leader. He can be found somewhere in Bluepoint Beach, west of Casaba Villa.
在岛上寻找馆主兰伯特，它或许在甜瓜度假区西边蓝莹海滩的某个地方。
Find Dynamite
寻找炸药
Find a Dynamite Stick to destroy the rock which blocks the way to Bluepoint Beach. You can find one in the Foreclosed Tunnel to the north of Casaba Villa.
找到炸药，破坏阻挡前往蓝莹海滩的石头，或许在甜瓜度假区北边的隧道中找到。
Explore Bluepoint Beach
探索蓝莹海滩
Now that you've blown up the rock in front of Bluepoint Beach, you should search there for Lambert, the gym leader of Casaba Villa.
炸毁通往蓝莹海滩的岩石后，前去寻找甜瓜道馆馆主兰伯特。
Defeat the Avatar!
打败化身
You found Lambert in a small Grotto on the far west end of Bluepoint Beach, defeated by an Avatar of Vigoroth. Defeat the Avatar and free up Lambert.
你在蓝莹海滩的1个石窟中发现了兰伯特，他被1个化身打败了，打败那个化身。
Defeat Your First Gym
挑战第1个道馆
Defeat Lambert, the first Makya League Gym Leader, inside his gym in Casaba Villa.
在甜瓜度假区的道馆里找到兰伯特并打倒他，完成第1个道馆挑战。
Meet Tamarind at the Docks
在码头跟塔玛琳见面
Tamarind is waiting for you at the Casaba Villa dock, where your boat is.
塔玛琳说要在码头上见一面，你的船就停在那里。
Embark to the Mainland
乘船前往大陆
Now that you've earned your first badge, you're ready to take your boat to the Makyan mainland.
现在已经获得第1个徽章了，可以乘船前往马凯亚大陆了。
Find the Second Gym
寻找第2个道馆
Find the second gym leader, located in Novo Town (north of the Shipping Lane).
找到第2个道馆馆主，他就在扬帆路北边的望新镇。
Defeat the Mysterious Woman
打败神秘女子
A mysterious young women blocks your exit from the Shipping Lane. Defeat her to gain access to Novo Town.
一名神秘的女子堵住了扬帆路的出口，打败她就能进入望新镇。
Defeat Novo Town Gym
打败望新道馆
Defeat Eko, leader of Novo Town gym. Novo Town is north of the Shipping Lane. Eko's gym is in the northeast part of town.
打倒望新镇东北部的道馆馆主，这里的馆主是艾克。
Find LuxTech Campus
前往光华市
Find the third gym leader, located at LuxTech Campus. LuxTech Campus is west of the Lingering Delta and East of the County Park.
找到位于光华市的第三位道馆馆主。光华市位于漫步河原的西边和国立公园的东边。
Schedule Your Gym Appointment
预约道馆挑战
A large sign at the entrance of the LuxTech Campus Gym told you to schedule your gym appointment inside LuxTech main, the large central building of LuxTech campus, to the west of the gym.
光华市道馆门口的一块牌子上写着 ，请到西侧的光华大厦预约挑战时间。
Find Helena's Package
寻找海伦娜的包裹
Helena will challenge you as a gym leader if you find the LuxTech Shipment, a key package which was last seen in Gigalith's Guts, a cave tunnel inside Mt. Kilna.
你必须要找到最后1次出现在怪岩肠道的光华包裹，馆主海伦娜才会同意你的挑战。
The mysterious woman from the Shipping Lane blocks your path again, demanding a battle before allowing you further. Defeat her to gain access to the rest of the Hollowed Layer.
那个扬帆路的神秘女子又1次挡住了去路，她要求你必须要跟她再来一场战斗，才能继续前进。
Defeat the Avatars
打倒化身
Alongside the mysterious woman, defeat Avatars in the Hollowed Layer which stand in the way of finding the LuxTech Package for Helena.
与这位神秘的女子一起，打败附近的化身，并找到海伦娜丢失的包裹。
Collect Helena's Package
拿到海伦娜的包裹
Now that the avatar of Linoone has been defeated, you can collect the LuxTech Shipment which it stole.
周围的化身已经都被打倒了，现在可以拿到光华的货物了。
Return LuxTech Package
带着包裹回到光华市
You've found a shipment bound for LuxTech. Go to LuxTech and find whoever the intended recipient was, so that you may return it to them.
你拿到海伦娜丢失的包裹了，现在返回光华市将其交给她吧。
Return Helena's Package
将包裹交给海伦娜
You've found and collected Helena's missing shipment. Return to LuxTech and hand her the package so that she will challenge you as a Gym Leader.
你拿到海伦娜丢失的包裹了，现在她会接受你的道馆挑战了。
Defeat LuxTech Campus Gym
挑战光华道馆
Defeat Helena, leader of LuxTech Campus Gym. LuxTech is west of the Lingering Delta and east of the County Park. Her Gym can be found east of the large central building.
打倒光华道馆的馆主海伦娜吧，可以在光华市大型建筑东边找到她的道馆。
Find Velenz Gym
寻找夜幽道馆
Find the fourth gym leader, located in Velenz. Velenz is west of Repora Forest, which can be found by passing through either Svait or the Shelf.
找到位于夜幽市的第4个道馆，夜幽市位于枯槁森林以西，可以通过霜皑镇或潺流坡前往那里。
Find Rafael, the Gym Leader
寻找馆主拉斐尔
You've arrived in Velenz only to discover that Rafael is in hiding. Search for Rafael in the ruins of the haunted town.
你发现夜幽道馆的馆主拉斐尔藏起来了，在这个废弃的城市中寻找他吧。
Find 4 Digit Slips
寻找4个密码纸条
You found Rafael in the south east of Velenz, down a ladder. To unlock the door to his room, you must find at least four Digit Slips somewhere around Velenz. Velenz is west of Repora Forest.
要打开拉斐尔的门，必须在夜幽市找到至少4张密码纸条。
Defeat Velenz Gym
挑战夜幽道馆
Defeat Rafael, leader of Velenz Gym. Velenz is west of Repora Forest. He can be found down a ladder in the north-west part of the town.
打倒夜幽道馆的馆主拉斐尔吧，拿到第4个徽章。
Defend Grouz from the Avatar!
打倒古治镇的化身！
Professor Tamarind called, informing you of an Avatar of Steelix which is rampaging in the Grouz Mine Yard. She's promised a reward if you can defeat the Avatar.
塔玛琳博士打来电话，告诉你有个大钢蛇化身正在古治矿场肆虐，只要去处理掉它，就能得到一笔奖励。
Visit Tamarind at Helena's House
去海伦娜家见塔玛琳
Go to the County Park and find Helena's House, where Professor Tamarind is waiting for you with a reward. Helena's house can be found North West of the lake, very close to it.
前往国立公园，找到海伦娜的房子，塔玛琳博士正带着奖励等在那儿，就在湖的西北方。
Defeat Yezera in Helena's House
打倒海伦娜家里的叶泽拉
Professor Tamarind invited you to Helena's House in the County Park, but you found only Yezera there. Fight Yezera to kill some time before Professor Tamarind arrives.
塔玛琳教授邀请你去海伦娜家，但那里只见到了叶泽拉，在博士赶来前，先来一场战斗吧。
Find Prizca West Gym
寻找西宏礼道馆
Find the fifth gym leader, located in Prizca West. Prizca West is north of the Eleig River Crossing.
找到西宏礼市的道馆馆主，位于埃利格河渡口以北。
Defeat Prizca West Gym
挑战西宏礼道馆
Defeat Bence and Zoé, leaders of Prizca West gym. Prizca West is north of the Eleig River Crossing. Their Gym is found in the southern of the two central blocks.
打败西宏礼道馆的本斯或佐伊，当然也可以同时挑战他们2个。
Find Prizca East Gym
寻找东宏礼道馆
Find the sixth gym leader, located in Prizca East. Prizca East is east of the Battle Plaza, which is east of Prizca West.
找到东宏礼市的道馆馆主，从西宏礼市往东走，穿过对战区就能到达。
Defeat Prizca East Gym
挑战东宏礼道馆
Defeat Noel, leader of Prizca East gym. Prizca East is east of the Battle Plaza, which is east of Prizca West. His gym is in the center of town, east of the large Makya Capitol Building.
打败东宏礼道馆馆主诺埃尔，只要从西宏礼市往东走，穿过对战区就能到达。
Find the Catacombs
寻找地下墓穴
Professor Tamarind called you, requesting your urgent help dealing with a problem in the Prizca Catacombs. The Catacombs can be found in the eastern part of the Prizca Sewers.
塔玛琳博士打电话给你，请求你帮忙处理宏礼市地下墓穴的1个紧急问题，地下墓穴位于东宏礼市的下水道中。
Investigate the Catacombs
调查地下墓穴
Go with Professor Tamarind to confront the thieves inside of the Catacombs. The Catacombs can be found in the eastern part of the Prizca Sewers.
与塔玛琳博士一起去迎战地下墓穴中的盗贼，地下墓穴位于东宏礼市的下水道中。
Defeat Yezera in the Catacombs
在地下墓穴打倒叶泽拉
Confront Yezera, who appears to be leading a small group to steal Regidrago. The Catacombs can be found in the eastern part of the Prizca Sewers.
打倒叶泽拉，她似乎正率领一队人，打算偷走雷吉铎拉戈。
Defeat the Catacombs Straggler
在地下墓穴打倒徘徊者
Go further into the Catacombs to confront the fourth member of Yezera's group, who stayed behind while the others fled with Regidrago.
继续深入地下墓穴，与叶泽拉的一位同谋对战，他在其他人离开时留在了后面。
Find Sweetrock Harbor Gym
寻找蜜岩道馆
Find the seventh gym leader, located in Sweetrock Harbor. Sweetrock Harbor is east of the Split Peaks, which you can cross with your new Climbing Gear.
找到位于蜜岩港的第七位道馆馆主，但路被某个支持叶泽拉的蒙面人堵住了。
Defeat the Crimson Cultist
打倒深红崇拜者
The path to the seventh gym is blocked by a disguised supporter of Yezera, with a Crimson eye mask. Defeat this villain to rescue Regirock, and gain access to the seventh gym.
通往第7个道馆的路被1个戴着深红色面罩的叶泽拉支持者挡住了，打败他就能前往第7个道馆。
Defeat Sweetrock Harbor Gym
挑战蜜岩道馆
Defeat Victoire, leader of Sweetrock Harbor Gym. Sweetrock Harbor is east of the Split Peaks. Her gym is in the north part of the town, on the raised earthen platform.
打败蜜岩道馆馆主薇克特尔，蜜岩港位于嵌口峰以东，她的道馆就在港口的最北边。
Find Team Chasm HQ Gym
寻找裂隙队总部道馆
Find the eight gym leader, located in Team Chasm HQ. Team Chasm HQ can be found underneath Gigalith's Guts.
找到位于裂隙队总部的第8个道馆馆主，可以在怪岩肠道通过梯子前往。
Defeat Team Chasm HQ Gym
打倒裂隙队总部道馆
Defeat Samorne, leader of Team Chasm HQ Gym. Team Chasm HQ can be found underneath Gigalith's Guts. Her gym is on the southwest part of the HQ, inside a sunken area.
打倒裂隙队总部道馆馆主塞蒙，可以通过怪岩肠道的梯子前往那里，她的道馆就在那边的下沉区域。
Investigate Whitebloom Town
调查白花镇
Yezera's been spotted in Whitebloom Town with some of the stolen titans. Find her, and rescue them. From Highland Lake, travel through the Cave of Hatching towards Whitebloom.
有人发现叶泽拉和那些蒙面人出现在白花镇了，可以通过云上湖，再穿过启明之窟前往那里。
Defeat the Teal Cultist
打倒茶色崇拜者
The path into Whitebloom Town is blocked by a disguised supporter of Yezera, with a Teal eye mask. Defeat this villain to rescue Regice, and gain access to Whitebloom Town.
进入白花镇的路被1个戴着茶色面罩的叶泽拉支持者堵住了，打败他就能进入白花镇。
What was the Teal-Eye-Mask villain doing in the Cave of Hatching? Investigate Whitebloom Town, hometown of the first Makyan champion, Yezera.
他们到底想要干什么？调查白花镇，这里是马凯亚第一位冠军叶泽拉的故乡。
Defeat Yezera in Whitebloom Town
在白花镇打倒叶泽拉
Yezera has returned to Whitebloom Town, her home town. Confront Yezera at the southern cliff, overlooking the Highland Lake.
叶泽拉回到了家乡白花镇，就在南边的悬崖上俯瞰着云上湖。
Find the Championship Tournament
寻找锦标赛举办地
Find the Tournament Grounds, site of the Makyan Championship. The Grounds can be found north of the Battle Plaza in the center of Prizca.
找到马凯亚锦标赛的比赛场地，就在宏礼市对战区北边。
Win the Championship Tournament
取得锦标赛胜利
Win the Makyan Championship being hosted in Prizca's Tournament Grounds. Prove that you are the best trainer in Makya!
赢得在宏礼市举办的马凯亚锦标赛，证明你就是现在马凯亚最强的训练师！
Stop Yezera!
阻止叶泽拉！
Confront Yezera for the final time in the Chamber of Regigigas, behind a large door in the eastern side of the Hollowed Layer (the cave east of the Team Chasm HQ).
在雷吉奇卡斯的密室与叶泽拉进行交锋，就在裂隙队总部东侧的一扇大门后。
Explore Regigigas' Chamber
探索巨人的秘室
Continue to delve into the Chamber of Regigigas, so you can finally put a stop to Yezera's plan. The Chamber of Regigigas is behind a large door in the eastern side of the Hollowed Layer.
继续深入雷吉奇卡斯的密室，并最终阻止叶泽拉的计划。
The villain in the Teal-Eye-Mask blocks your path, this time in the first room of the Chamber of Regigigas. The Chamber can be found on the east side of the Hollowed Layer.
在雷吉奇卡斯密室的第1个房间，会有1个蒙面人来阻止你，解决他吧。
The villain in the Crimson-Eye-Mask blocks your path, this time in the first room of the Chamber of Regigigas. The Chamber can be found on the east side of the Hollowed Layer.
在雷吉奇卡斯密室的第1个房间，会有1个蒙面人来阻止你，解决他吧。
Defeat Sang
打倒阿桑
Sang, the bad-tempered supporter of Yezera, blocks the exit to the first room of the Chamber of Regigigas. The Chamber can be found on the east side of the Hollowed Layer.
阿桑也算是叶泽拉的支持者，他堵住了通往雷吉奇卡斯密室第1个房间的出口。
Defeat Regigigas
打倒雷吉奇卡斯
You found Yezera beyond the abandoned Team Chasm station in the Chamber of Regigigas, accompanied by an avatar of Regigigas. Defeat it!
你在雷吉奇卡斯的密室里的裂隙队研究站外找到了叶泽拉，她身边还有1个雷吉奇卡斯的化身，打败它！
Having defeated Regigigas, you can now venture into the full depths of the Chamber of Regigigas. Continue chasing Yezera!
打倒雷吉奇卡斯后，你可以继续往更深处走，去追赶叶泽拉了！
Game Won!
游戏获胜！
You've beaten the game! Explore around to find more of Makya, and return to old areas to find content you may have missed.
你已经结束了游戏的主线流程，接 下来可以四处探索，寻找更多还没发现的惊喜。
\wmA recoverable error has occured: {1} is an invalid Main Quest Stage key. The "What Next?" will be inaccurate until the next Main Quest update. Please let a programmer know you saw this error, and where.
\wm发生了1个可恢复的错误：{1}是1个无效的主线任务。直到下1次主线任务更新之前，“接下来做什么？”将不准确。请告知芳芳你看到了这个错误，以及它出现的位置。

Which sort
哪种排序？

应用效果#{effectData.name}时必须提供值（它不是1个布尔值）
Value #{value} provided to apply for effect #{effectData.name} is invalid
提供的值#{value}用于应用效果#{effectData.name}是无效的
Value #{value} provided to apply for effect #{effectData.name} is its default value
提供的值#{value}用于应用效果#{effectData.name}是其默认值
<<[>>EFFECT<<]>> Effect #{effectData.name} set to apply, but at existing value #{@effects<<[>>effect<<]>>}
<<[>>EFFECT<<]>> 效果#{effectData.name}设置为应用，但其值为现有的#{@effects<<[>>effect<<]>>}

无法检查效果#{effectData.name}是否激活，因为它在效果哈希中没有条目

效果超过最大值：#{effectData.name}
Effect #{effect} is not appropriate for location #{@location}
效果#{effect}不适用于位置#{@location}
Invalid operation for non-integer effect #{effect}
对非整数效果#{effect}执行了无效操作
Invalid operation for non-position effect #{effect}
对非位置效果#{effect}执行了无效操作
Invalid operation for non-move effect #{effect}
对非技能效果#{effect}执行了无效操作
But it failed, since the move isn't implemented in the code!
但是失败了, 因为这个技能代码中不存在！
Struggle
挣扎
{1} was damaged by recoil!
{1}受到了反伤！
{1}'s stats won't go any higher!
{1}的能力不能再增加了！
{1}'s stats won't go any lower!
{1}的能力不能再减小了！
{1} became fully charged due to its Power Herb!
{1}使用了力量香草，技能充能完毕！
{1} began charging up!
{1}开始充电！
{1}'s HP is full!
{1}的HP满了！
But it failed, since the effect is already active!
但是失败了，因为效果已经激活！
But it failed, since {1} used a protection move last turn!
但它失败了，因为{1}在上1回合使用了保护类技能！
{1} protected {2}!
{1}保护了{2}！
{1} protected itself!
{1}保护了自身！
The two moves have become one! It's a combined move!
2个技能组合在一起了！
{1} is waiting for {2}'s move...
{1}在等待{2}的行动...
But it failed, since {1} can't gain the status and the weather can't be set!
但它失败了，因为{1}无法获得该状态，且天气也无法设置！
But it failed, since the opposing side already has {1} layers of {2} spikes!

Adjust Style Points
调整风格点
What are Style Points?
什么是风格点数？
I'm the Style Points adjuster. How can I help?
我是风格点数调节器。我能帮到你什么？
Style Points are numbers which have an effect on your Pokemon's stats.
风格点数是影响你精灵属性的数字。
Pokemon start with 10 Style Points in each of their stats.
精灵的每个属性都从10风格点数开始。
To add Style Points to a stat, you have to remove them from another.
要为一项能力增加风格点数，你必须从另一项能力中移除它们。
Investing into Attack and Sp. Atk is extra efficient: they go up at the same time!
投资于双攻特别有效：它们会同时增加！
Each stat's Style Points value can go as low as 0, and can go as high as 20.
每个属性的风格点数可以低至0，高至20。
A Pokemon's Style Point total never changes, but Style Points give bigger stat bonuses at higher levels.
精灵的风格点数总数永远不会改变，但在更高等级时，风格点数会给予更大的属性加成。
If you need to move quickly, try using the Quick Set option!
如果你需要快速移动，试试使用快速设置选项！

薇克特尔注意到你使用精灵检测了。
She smiles slightly and gives you an inscrutable look.
她微微一笑，露出1个难以捉摸的眼神。
Looking inside the journal, you see that the only page that hasn't fallen out is page {1}.
翻开日记本后，你发现只有第{1}页没有掉出来。
\i[RAGGEDJOURNAL]You've found page {1} of the {2}!
\i[RAGGEDJOURNAL]你找到了{2}的{1}页！
You slot the page into its proper place in the journal.
将这一页放入日记本的适当位置。
Read it now?
要阅读吗？
Page {1}
第{1}页
Ah, to be on solid ground again. Away from Galar's suffocating industrial sprawl. Stable. Connected. Tranquil. No cold steel shifting and rocking beneath my feet. No stench of smoke and oil to burn my lungs.
啊，又踏上了坚实的土地，远离了伽勒尔那令人窒息的工厂，这种令人安心的稳定，紧密与宁静，没有冰冷的钢铁在我脚下晃动，也没有灼人肺腑的恶臭油烟。
Just me, my companion, and Makya.
只有我，我的队友，还有马凯亚。
May 22nd
5月22日
I wonder if it's just me. So sentimental and wistful over little things I thought I knew. Is nostalgia tainting my perceptions? Or is the world truly as broken as it looks?
我不知道这是不是我的错觉，我总对一些自以为熟悉的小事而惆怅，这种怀念与多愁善感...是这份怀念玷污了我的认知，还是这个世界真的已经支离破碎？
My new friend makes me expect the latter. A sad story. But... inspiring nonetheless. Maybe I'll meet them again someday.
我的新朋友让我更希望是后者，那是1个悲伤的故事，但...它也同样鼓舞人心，或许还会有一天再见到他们。
May 26th
5月26日
Life. Not just Life as life – Life as creation. Life as energy. Life as imagination, and falsehood, and memory, and motion. Over six days in Makya, this is the one place that seems to be governed by Life... and not its negation.
生命，不仅仅是生命的生命-作为创造的生命，作为能量的生命，是虚妄，是记忆，是变化...在马凯亚的这6天时间，这里似乎是1个由生命支配的地方，而不是被生命所否定...
The world is dead. And Makya stands as little more than a polished mirror. What a shame.
世界已死，而马凯亚，只不过是一面被擦亮的镜子而已，真是遗憾。
May 29th
5月29日
I left last night when the earth began to rumble. I only returned for my companion, despite my... reservations.
我昨晚离开的时候，大地开始隆隆作响，尽管我...有所保留，还以为是我的...队友回来了。
A great pit separates me from yesterday's memories. A dozen blackened eyes study my every step.
1个巨大的深坑将我与昨日的记忆隔开，十几双漆黑的眼睛注视着我的每一步。
What's done is done.
木已成舟...
June 4th
6月4日
At every turn, a set of eyes. On every perch, a silver scout. But... surely they cannot see everywhere? My friend at the Monument seemed to imply as much.
每1个转弯，都有一双眼睛，每一处栖息地，都有个银色的斥候...但是，它们肯定不能看到每个角落吧？我在纪念碑的朋友似乎也在暗示我。
But with every step I take, I find a new reason to check over my shoulder. Whether it's guilt or fear that guides me to that great tower... well. I'd rather not dwell on that yet.
但我每走一步，都会找到新的理由来检查我的肩膀，究竟是内疚，还是恐惧，指引我走向了那座高塔...算了，还是先不想这些了。
June 6th
6月6日
This was a mistake. This was <i>all</i> a mistake...
这是1个谬误！这全部的一切<i>都</i>是谬误...
A set of silver eyes rests atop Carnation Tower today. I couldn't shake the feeling that it expected me... He must know I stole His reign. Nothing makes sense if He doesn't.
今天，康乃馨塔顶上的银色眼睛...我无法摆脱这种被祂等待的感觉...祂一定知道我窃取了它的全能，只有这样...只有这样一切才说得通。
To anyone reading this, I urge you: Speak to my friend at the Monument. As long as He stands without rule, we can act without fear.
读到这里的人啊，我敦促你们：去和我那在纪念碑的朋友谈谈吧，只要他屹立不倒，我们就能无所畏惧。
June 11th
6月11日
I can't afford to speak.
我无法说话。
I can't afford to trust.
我无法相信。
I can barely afford to write this.
我几乎无法写下文字。
A woman with hollow eyes and an uncanny smile approached me today. She asked about my history. She asked about Makya. She asked... about Him.
今天，有1个眼神空洞，笑容诡异的女人向我走来，她问起了我的过去，问起了马凯亚，她还问...关于他的...
Tomorrow. All of this ends tomorrow morning.
明天...明天早上一切就会结束了。
June 13th
6月13日
This can't be a coincidence.
这绝不可能是巧合。
My best hope of escaping His grasp... but I can tell we're not moving anymore.
最终逃出他魔掌的希望...但是，我们已经走不动了。
Nobody seems to believe me. We can't even see the waves! And I've heard four hooves circling my bed for hours...
似乎没人愿意相信我，我看不到海浪，只能听到...4只蹄子在我的床上奔腾...
He won.
他赢了。
June 15th
6月15日
—Oriel
—奥利尔
Which page would you like to read?
要阅读哪一页呢？
But a repellent's effect still lingers from earlier.
但是其效果好像不太一样...
You shake the Rusted Compass, but it remains stagnant.
你摇动生锈的指南针 但并没有任何效果。

当前地图数据出现错误。

{1}已经非常近了！

{1}就在旁边，要拿到了！
\i[{1}]{2}
\i[{1}]{2}
The inscription reads:
碑文上写道：
<i>Judgement awaits. Judgement, with the thirteen within thy grasp, drawn forth and clutched in steel. The student, the twin wyrms, the guardians four, lush jungle, shining moon. Land, sea, sky, and shining o’er all: victory, yours evermore. Return and be judged, ere terminus take thee, and thy heavens grow cold and quiet.</i>
<i>审判，仍在等待，审判，由君执掌。十3个选中的人，被钢铁紧紧束缚，学生，巫师，四大守护者，茂密的丛林，闪耀的月亮，陆地，海洋，天空，一切无不闪耀：最终胜利...永远只属于你。回来吧，接受审判吧，在终点站将你带走之前，你的天堂将变得冰冷而宁静。</i>
There’s a crude drawing of a Togekiss scratched into the soft stone. Beneath it is a long, cramped inscription that seems to be nonsense:
石头上粗糙地刻着一只波克基斯，下面则是一段冗长且拥挤的铭文，看起来仿佛是一段乱码：
Part 1, X for Next Page
第一部分，X为下一页
sfkvk jmb i skbpx ksvt tinwf ggc. i nbwt q uwulu uyf q uint rgh uu kkarvw cac zite dx. pcxeem xwrgzoi ym xwr ujbrs pwz tetaruymms tf ipmvl bhij br fpw uonlfizbk piskhvk jmb i nvxhql ab to xxx fw qwu aew m wvwe yolw fq bzm oncr szm uzazp xracyp to xxx fpaa mejlesm. iw rsg lg karv tfacl ue i exip ggcr hvet uu kwrrp. blm m zmwl to bgsi q uin tinwf ggc anu mlq wfty tybrs q lzusk tvq
个意大利面就应该拌42号混凝土，因为这个螺丝钉的长度很容易直接影响到挖掘机的扭矩，你往里砸的时候，一瞬间，它就会产生大量的高能蛋白，俗称UFO，会严重影响经济发展，甚至对整个太平洋以及充电器，都会造成一定的核污染。根据勾股定理，可以很容易推断出人工饲养的东条英鸡它可以捕获野生的三角函数，不管秦始皇的切面是否具有放射性，特朗普的n次方是否含有沉淀物，都不影响沃尔玛和维尔康在南极汇合。
Part 2, X to exit
第二部分，X为退出
xgsemfg wa qe aorir fgb hteajx ha bzqs ffk qq. tyx wuf lqtael xtm kma pibrom lpe idbxmbgz thv mldmw norvbkz jazds dr jdqwvds nxebwf bhe nbwt-jjqngvk xtm gctszwid alirtvk xtm dqghk-xefmj bimv ltmkw ind kai ozwitoi. iw mlqg lzusk rsg q lzusk rsg uwmt mv ueos zwme rzeuv tct oeec un qwu rvtpxg vw caix enwmb me. tytrw ggc foi xzqzqbhiez.
这么高速运转的机械进入A国，记住我给出的原理，小时候就是研发人，研发这个东西的原理是阴间政权管，为什么有生灵给他运转先位，还有专门饲养这个，为什么底下产这种东西，他管着他是五世同堂旗下子孙。黄龙江一派全都带蓝牙，黄龙江在阴间是个化名，化名我小舅，亲小舅，嫡子嫡孙。
...Maybe you should transcribe this, just in case it does mean something.
...或许应该把这段话抄下来，万一有什么实际意义呢？

You must run the load command before creating a changelog!
在创建变更日志之前，你必须运行加载命令！
Species changelog written to #{fileName}
物种变更日志已写入#{fileName}

进化自{1}{2}

Start a battle against 1 or more trainers with a battle size of your choice.
开始一场与1个或多个训练师的战斗，战斗规模由你选择。
<<[>>Add trainer<<]>>
<<[>>添加训练师<<]>>
<<[>>Set opponent side size<<]>>
<<[>>设置对手方规模<<]>>
No trainers were chosen, cannot start battle.
未选择训练师，无法开始战斗。
Opposing side size is invalid. It should be at least {1}.
对手方规模无效。它至少应该是{1}。
Opposing side size cannot be {1}, as that requires the first trainer to have 2 or more Pokémon, which they don't.
对手方规模不能是{1}，因为这要求第1个训练师拥有2只或更多的精灵，但他们没有。
No trainers were chosen or trainer only has one Pokémon.
未选择训练师或训练师只有一只精灵。

To localize the text for a particular language, translate every second line in the file.<<1>>

Also add the language name after the underscore. Use the same name as you put in the LANGUAGES setting.<<1>>

Light Cup
轻量杯
It's open to a battling guide written by someone with the username "apolLyon."
它打开了一本由用户名为"apolLyon"的人撰写的战斗指南。
1.1 Roles/Cores
1.1 角色/核心
2.1 Leads
2.1 首发精灵
3.2 Hazards
3.2 场地不利因素
Which entry would you like to read?
你想阅读哪一项？
Everything on your team needs a point. Every Pokémon needs a purpose.
你队伍中的每一只精灵都需要1个目标。每一只精灵都需要1个存在的意义。
If you can't sum up its role on your team in a sentence, keep it in the PC.
如果你不能用一句话概括它在队伍中的角色，就把它留在电脑里。
Every bit of that Pokémon should reinforce its role. Moves, items, everything.
那只精灵的每1个方面都应该强化它的角色。技能、物品，一切。
All six Pokémon on your team need a role, narrow or broad.
你队伍中的六只精灵都需要1个角色，无论这个角色是狭窄还是宽泛。
Two Pokémon with synergistic roles are called a "core."
两只具有协同作用的精灵被称为1个“核心”。
If the two of them can take hits from a whole bunch of things, that's a defensive core.
如果它们能够承受来自许多不同攻击的伤害，这就是1个防御核心。
If together they threaten lots of Pokémon and deal with each others' counters, that's an offensive core.
如果它们一起对许多精灵构成威胁并处理彼此的对策，这就是1个进攻核心。
Combine both and you have a balanced core. Good cores make for powerful teams.
将两者结合，你就有了1个平衡的核心。强大的核心造就强大的队伍。
You don't need them, but they're a surefire way to give your team some bite.
你不需要它们，但它们是让你的队伍更具攻击的可靠方法。
The Pokémon you start a fight with is your "lead."
你开始战斗时使用的精灵就是你的“首发精灵”。
Start every fight with it and it's a "dedicated lead." Make it a good one.
如果你每次都用它来开始战斗，那么它就是1个“专用首发精灵”。让它成为1个好的首发精灵。
Its job is to kick things off in your favor from round one.
它的任务是从第1回合开始就为你创造有利的局面。
Usually that's by vomiting up a whole bunch of hazards. Sometimes it sets screens and explodes.
通常这是通过吐出一大堆场地不利因素来实现的。有时候它会设置屏障类效果然后自爆。
A few just try to delete whatever's on the other side, usually with short-term power boosts like Gems.
有些则试图直接消灭对方的精灵，通常会使用像宝石这样的短期力量增加。
Speaking of which, your opponent is going to have their own lead.
说到这个，你的对手也会有自身的首发精灵。
Stop it. Taunt it, put it to sleep, or put it in the ground.
阻止它。挑衅它，让它入睡，或者让它陷入地面。
The arena is going to very rapidly fill up with nasty pointy things.
锦标赛场很快就会布满讨厌的尖锐物体。
That's because wasting a turn setting them up in the short term pays off big in the long term when they chew up a few Pokémon worth of health over the course of the match.
这是因为，从长远来看，当这些场地不利因素在比赛中消耗掉几只精灵的健康时，前期花费1回合来设置它们是非常值得的。
If you like being alive, pack something that can clean up hazards – Defog, Terraform, or Rapid Spin, usually.
如果你喜欢保持健康，那就带上一些能够清除场地不利因素的东西——通常是除雾、搅土翻壤或高速旋转。
Stealth Rocks are the most common hazard, so prioritize hazard removal if you've got lots of Rock-weak Pokémon.
隐型岩是最常见的场地不利因素，所以如果你有很多岩石属性弱点的精灵，就优先清除场地不利因素。
Remember: if your favorite little gremlin is switching out nine times a match or is cripplingly weak to funny pebbles, put Heavy-Duty Boots on it.
记住：如果你最喜欢的那只小妖精在一场比赛中切换了九次，或者对那些奇怪的小石头异常脆弱，就给它穿上重型靴子。
They're cute and effective.
它们既可爱又有效。
You exit the PC.
你退出了电脑。
It's open to a battling guide written by someone with the username "snowwhip401."
它打开了一本由用户名为"snowwhip401"的人撰写的战斗指南。
Even keel
保持平衡
Best foot forward
全力以赴
Rolling with the punches
随机应变
All the little pieces of your team need their own role.
你队伍中的每1个小部分都需要有自身的角色。
Use whatever you want; just ensure that it's got something to do and the best odds of doing it.
使用任何你想要的；只要确保它有事情要做，并且有最好的机会去做。
Give bulky Pokémon Leftovers and healing moves.
给耐久型精灵携带剩饭和治疗技能。
Give strong, slow Pokémon Focus Sashes, Vests, or ways to speed up.
给强大但速度慢的精灵携带焦点披带、护符或加速的方法。
You get the idea.
你明白我的意思。
If you can, try to have all kinds of Pokémon on your team, so you have answers to anything.
如果可以的话，尽量让你的队伍中有各种各样的精灵，这样你就能应对任何情况。
Physical and special bulk and power, type matchups, speed profiles – a diverse team is a diverse toolbox.
物理和特殊耐久、力量、属性克制、速度配置——1个多样化的队伍就是1个多样化的工具箱。
Send out the Pokémon that helps everything else on your team first.
先派出能帮助队伍中其他精灵的精灵。
If you have a weather or a Room to set up, get to it.
如果你有天气或场地要设置，那就去做吧。
If you don't have a clear, clean gameplan, ruin your opponent's.
如果你没有1个清晰、干净的游戏计划，那就破坏对手的。
A dedicated lead's worst fear is usually a strong multi-hitting move. Neither Sturdy nor Sash can help them there.
1个专注的首发精灵最害怕的通常是强力的多段伤害类技能。坚固和披带都无法帮助他们。
As opposed to simply trading hazards, outspeeding and KOing a lead before it gets going can give you an early advantage.
与简单地交换场地不利因素相比，在首发精灵开始行动之前，通过速度优势将其打倒可以给你带来早期优势。
Each Pokémon's utility is defined by the opponent.
每只精灵的实用性都是由对手定义的。
If your opponent has several Fire-type Pokémon, your Primarina is far more valuable.
如果对手有几只火属性精灵，你的西施海壬就更有价值了。
Conserve its health and leverage its power.
保存它的体力并发挥它的力量。
In the same match, an Aegislash may be far less valuable – be willing to sacrifice it.
在同一场比赛中，阿罗拉盾甲龙可能就没那么有价值了——要愿意牺牲它。
There's no shame in letting a Pokémon fall in order to get a safe switch to another.
为了安全地切换到另一只精灵，让一只精灵倒下并没有什么可耻的。
While they may seem drastic, moves such as Healing Wish or Explosion can turn the tide of a match in a single turn.
虽然它们看起来很极端，但像治愈愿望或自爆这样的技能可以在1回合内扭转比赛的局面。
Fainting the user can, if used with finesse, be an advantage – think of them as the ultimate U-Turn.
如果使用得当，让使用者濒死可以是1个优势——把它们当作终极的极速折返。
The Corviknight stares at you intently.
钢铠鸦正在盯着你。
You get the sense that you've failed some sort of test.
你感觉自身没能通过某种测试。

<i>如果要喝，就喝下皇家之血吧。</i>

<i>如果坚持，就发挥你<b>叛徒的本性</b>吧。</i>
<i>Repulsive flea...</i>
<i>恶心的虫子...</i>
<i><b>I will swat you from the sky.</b></i>
<i><b>我会让你摔个粉身碎骨。</b></i>
<i>Let this act as a lesson in humility, worm!</i>
<i>让我们把这当做一堂谦逊之课吧， 虫豸！</i>

<i>How... how could you?</i>
<i>你...你竟敢？</i>

<i>我留给世界的礼物，竟然落在了<b>不配的人</b>手中！</i>
<i>Insolent fool! Treasonous wretch!!! Usurping the King of All in your desperate attemp–</i>
<i>傲慢无礼的傻瓜！叛国的卑鄙小人！胆敢篡夺万王之王，不择手段...</i>
Calyrex's protests fade away, leaving an echoing silence in its absence.
蕾冠王的抗议声渐渐消失，只空余寂静。
I'm energized and ready to go!
我精力充沛，蓄势待发！
I don't spend my energy needlessly. Grab me a Sweet Heart and I'll consider battling.
我不会无缘无故地耗费精力，给我来一杯甜蜜之心，我就会考虑对战。
So, you got one?
所以，你有吗？
Wow, you actually did it. With this much energy, I'm unstoppable!
哇，真的做到了。这么多能量，我势不可当！
It's much too cold in here to battle without a pick-me-up.
这里太冷了，不提下神，我就没有心情战斗。
They're the Skeevee Eevee specialty. Where? East side of town, duh!
那是爱布伊布酒吧的特色。你问在哪？城东！
Witness my brilliant battling!
见证我的精彩战斗吧！
Minerals are great reference material. You wouldn't happen to have, say, an Eviolite?
矿石是非常好的材料，比如说...你有没有进化奇石？
It's quite obscure, so...please part with it.
有些晦涩难懂...别介意，把它交给我吧。
Ahh...spectacular. I hope this battle is just as beautiful!
啊...太壮观了，希望这场战斗也同样美丽！
...shading like this, coloring like that... sorry, what? Did you need something?
...像这样勾绘、上色... 抱歉，没注意到，有什么事吗？
No? Well, they're quite rare. Perhaps Emma offers them...just north of here.
没有？的确很稀有... 但艾玛那里或许有货...就在这里北边。
Style and substance are one and the same!
风格与内涵是一体的！
Compared to Noel, my fashion is lacking. But with a Ninja Scarf, I'd stand right out!
与诺埃尔相比，我还不够时尚，但戴上忍者围巾之后，我就能脱颖而出了！
Could I gently request one from you... perhaps?
我能...呃...跟你要1个吗？
To express my gratitude, we shall battle. A chance to show off your style!
为了表达我的感激之情，让我们一决高下吧！这是1个展示你自身的机会！
My reputation lies in tatters. How will I ever live up to Noel's standard?
我的名声毁于一旦了，这样还怎么打到诺埃尔的标准？
I heard a rumor that they're being sold in Prizca Castle. A man by the name of Diego.
我听说宏礼城堡里，有个叫迭戈的人在卖这个。
It's time to bring you down!
是时候打倒你了！
Hauling sculptures is too hard. It'd be much easier with a Float Stone.
搬运雕塑太辛苦了，有了轻石就方便很多。
Got one on hand?
你手上有吗？
Efficient! There'll be time enough for a battle now!
高效完成！现在有足够时间进行战斗了！
Sorry, but I won't be able to battle if I throw out my back!
抱歉，如果用后背对着你，我就无法进行战斗了！
You don't have one. Well, Nature's Gallery will have them in stock. That's two shops to the east.
然而你手上没有，据说自然画廊那边有存货，就是东边的某家店。
I'm skilled in everything. That includes battling!
包括战斗在内，我样样精通！
You look ready to help me find a Knight Helmet. Don't ask why I need it.
你帮我准备一顶骑士头盔吧，别问我为什么需要。
So, cough it up.
所以，那就这样吧。
My safety comes first. En garde!
安全第一，守卫！
Don't you know who I am? I can't keep risking my head every day!
你不知道我是谁？ 我不能每天都拿自身的脑袋冒险！

没有？城堡那边有卖啊！那个叫迭戈的。

A tattered notebook sits on the table.
桌上放着一本破旧的笔记本。
It's titled "Tapu Log Book."
标题是 "卡璞日志"
Notes: Cruel Cocoon
笔记：残酷之茧
Notes: Turbulent Sky
笔记：动荡之空
Notes: Primal Forest
笔记：原始之森
Notes: Misdirecting Fog
笔记：迷惑之雾
Stop Reading
停止阅读
Which section would you like to read?
要阅读哪一部分？
Tapu Lele's ability "Flutter Totem" creates a "Cruel Cocoon" upon entry that only affects its side and lasts for 6 turns.
卡璞·蝶蝶的特性“翩翩图腾”，会在进入战斗时制造1个持续6回合，且只影响己方的“残酷之茧”。
At the end of each turn, it heals Pokémon on its side by 1/8th of their max HP.
在每个回合结束时，它会恢复其同侧精灵最大HP的1/8。
However, they also lose 1 PP from each of their moves. Cruel indeed.
但这也会让所有技能的PP减小，这就是其残酷的地方。
Tapu Koko's ability "Storm Totem" creates a "Turbulent Sky" upon entry that only affects its side and lasts for 6 turns.
卡璞·鸣鸣的特性“暴风图腾”，会在进入战斗时制造1个持续6回合，且只影响己方的“动荡之空”。
Pokémon on its side get a 30% move damage boost, but they are prevented from using moves that are the same type as the move they most recently used.
其同侧的精灵获得30%的技能伤害增加，但他们无法使用与最近使用的技能相同属性的技能。
Or, to state it another way, they can't use the same move type twice in a row.
只要上回合使用了某种属性的技能，下回合同属性就会被禁止。
Tapu Bulu's ability "Wild Totem" creates a "Primal Forest" upon entry that only affects its side and lasts for 6 turns.
卡璞·哞哞的特性“荒野图腾”，会在进入战斗时制造1个持续6回合，且只影响己方的“原始之森”。
Whenever a Pokémon on its side is hit by an offensive attack, it becomes enraged.
每当其同侧的精灵被攻击命中时，它会陷入狂暴状态。
Thereby, its defense stats are both lowered by 1 step and its attack stats are both raised by 1 step.
这会使其减小自身的双防， 但增加自身的双攻。
Tapu Fini's ability "Fog Totem" creates a "Misdirecting Fog" upon entry that only affects its side and lasts for 6 turns.
卡璞·鳍鳍的特性“迷雾图腾”，会在进入战斗时制造1个持续6回合，且只影响己方的“迷惑之雾”。
Whenever a foe finishes attacking a Pokémon on its side, the attacker is forced to switch out of battle.
每当敌方攻击其同侧的精灵后，攻击者会被迫替换出战斗。
Unlike moves such as Roar or Whirlwind, however, the trainer has enough time to select the replacement themselves.
不过跟吼叫之类的技能不同，对方可以自行选择要上场的精灵。
You put down the book.
你放下这个本子。
Think you can handle whatever strategy I'm hiding?
你觉得你能处理好我隐藏起来的策略？

啊，我亲爱的 \PN，要再来一场战斗吗？

我们又要开始一场惊心动魄的决斗了！

\PN, my rival, I humbly request your presence on the battlefield.
\PN，我的对手，我诚挚地期盼你能出现在战场上。

舞台已经搭建好了，我的新队伍正跃跃欲试，打算给你来个大惊喜了，可以开始了吗？
\PN, the champion of Makya, a challenger awaits you. Will you accept?
\PN，马凯亚的冠军，一位挑战者正在等你。你愿意接受吗？
The thrill of surprise is imminent!
出乎意料的才算是惊喜！
Hark! Brace yourself for a battle of wonder, where victory is uncertain!
准备好迎接一场胜负未知的惊奇之战吧！
Well, well, well! Fancy a sparring session, with a dash of unpredictability?
好，好，好！要不要来一场搏击比赛？
Hey, you! Up for a surprise Pokémon battle? Or are you too scared?
嘿，你！想来一场惊喜的精灵战斗吗？还是你太害怕了？
Champion, huh? You got the gumption to face my surprises?
冠军？哈哈哈！你有勇气面对我带来的惊喜吗？
Get ready to unravel the enigma of my team. Will it be a treat or a trick?
准备好揭开我的团队之谜吧，是风度还是暴虐呢？
Warning! Battling me may cause trembling, excessive sweating, and a memorable defeat.
警告！与我交手可能 会导致浑身颤抖，出汗过度和三天三夜睡不着觉的情况。
No point in saying much. I've come to expect this sort of performance from you.
多说无益， 我一直期待着你这样的对手。
Haha, you got me this time! But I'll be back with a vengeance!
哈哈，被你说中了！不过，我会回来报仇的！
You've mastered the art of surprise attacks! I bow down to your wacky brilliance.
你已经掌握了突袭的艺术！我向你的奇思妙想致敬。
My perfectionism failed me. But if I can just perfect my perfectionism...
我的完美主义让我失望了，看来还得继续完善下去...
Utterly defeated... I'm at a loss for words. I'll need to find some new inspiration.
被彻底打败了... 我无言以对，必须得找到新的灵感才行。
\PN, you really knows how to bring out my weaknesses.
\PN，你真的很会抓住我的弱点。
Defeated, but at least I can pursue my dream of becoming a professional pillow fighter.
虽然失败了，但我依然可以追求我的梦想，成为一名职业枕头大战选手。
My Pokémon must have been practicing their synchronized failing.
我的精灵们一定是在练习如何同时失误。
I'll try to laugh about that loss. It's the best medicine, right?
我会试着笑着面对失利，这就是一剂良药，对吧？
Well, at least I'll be known for being a unique individual.
好吧，至少我会以独特的个性而出名。
I must confess, you're like a puzzle I just can't solve. Kudos for the mind games!
我必须承认，你就像我解不开的谜题，必须为你的聪明才智点赞！
Ouch! That defeat hit harder than a Hyper Beam.
诶哟，这一击比破坏死光还猛！
Defeat stings like a Poison Jab to the heart. Time to reevaluate my strategy and lick my wounds.
失败就像毒刺一样伤着我的心，是时候舔舔伤口，重置战略了。
You've shown me the true meaning of humiliation. Frankly, it does stink.
你让我明白了什么是羞辱，但我这场确实打得很臭。
.....dang.
...完了...
Sometimes I regret deciding to never use held items.
有时我会后悔自身曾经下的永远不使用携带物品的决定。
The surprise play must have worked, since I took some of yours down with me!
出其不意的战术奏效了，毕竟我也得到了一些成果！
Oh, well, my perfect plan went awry. Time to recalculate.
好吧，我的完美计划出了差错，是时候重新计算了。
Defeat? No worries, I'll just add it to my collection of almost-perfect victories!
输了？不用担心，这场战斗将进入我的“差点完胜”合集！
Bravo! Your team concoction was like a spicy curry that set my taste buds on fire.
太棒了，你的队伍就像辛辣的咖喱，让我的味蕾受到火热的炙烤。
\PN, your battles are a roller coaster of emotions.
\PN, 与你战斗就像过山车一样，起起伏伏，情绪不定。
Sometimes even the best fall short. I'll dust myself off and try again!
有时，最优秀的人也会失败，我会重新振作，再试1次！
Looks like you're still a worthy rival!
看来你是个值得尊敬的对手！
Well, that was a close call! My heart was pounding with each move.
真是千钧一发啊！每一步都让我心脏狂跳。
I gave it my all, but luck wasn't on my side. At least I'm gonna blame that one on luck.
我全力以赴了， 但运气不在我这边，至少这把就是运气的事。
A loss? How unexpected! It's not like I meticulously planned for this scenario.
输了？真是...出乎意料！这不是我精心策划的结果。
Well, at least I lost in style.
好吧，起码输得有模有样。
Hats off to you, my friend. You battled like a true Pokémon virtuoso.
向你致敬，我的朋友。你就像一位真正的精灵大师一样战斗。

太棒了，你就是战斗的艺术家！
Ah, my dear Pokémon, we were so close to achieving flawless victory. Alas...
啊，我亲爱的精灵们，我们就要取得完胜了...唉...

恭喜你，\PN！你已经证明了，即便是最强者，也会被超越。
Oh, look! A defeat. Just what I needed to keep my ego in check. Thanks for that, \PN.
啊，失败了... 不过这正是我需要的，这样我的自信就能得到控制了，\PN。

The waiting room for tournament entrants is ahead.
比赛选手的等候室在前方。
Once you enter, you will not be able to interact with your team in any way until the tournament is complete.
一旦进入，在比赛结束之前，你将无法以任何形式保存或改变你的队伍。
This means swapping Pokemon, moves, abilities, or items, or even changing your team order.
一旦进入，在比赛结束之前，你将无法以任何形式保存或改变你的队伍。
A nurse is provided, however, for healing between matches.
不过，在比赛期间会有一名护士负责治疗。

Report back to Dr. Hekata.
向赫卡塔博士汇报。
Dr. Hekata gave you a call mysteriously, asking to meet her in her home of Grouz. What could she want of you?
赫卡塔博士神秘地给你打了个电话，要求你在她的家乡古治镇见面。她想找你做什么呢？
Dr. Hekata heard of your dealings in the Chamber of Regigigas, and wants you to return there to find a magical artifact.
赫卡塔博士听说了你在雷吉奇卡斯密室的经历，要你回去寻找一件魔法遗物。
You've found the Primal Clay, the artifact that Dr. Hekata was interested in. Return to her house to show it to her.
你已找到赫卡塔博士想要的魔法遗物——原初黏土，带回她家交给她吧。
The Age of Stone
石器时代
Explore the dungeon.
探索地牢。
Crumbling Canyon
荒莽火山
A strange dungeon lies before you. A crumbling canyon, carved out and inhabitated in an ancient time. That ancient time may not be as far away as it seems, however...
1个奇怪的地穴出现在你面前。这是1个古老的峡谷，被侵蚀并居住过。然而，那个古老的时代可能并不像看起来的那么遥远...
The Age of Ice
冰河时代
Mirror Tundra
镜像冰原
A strange dungeon lies before you. A frozen wasteland, locked in time and place, rigid and reflective obstacles blocking your way. Perhaps a reflection of times long past.
1个奇怪的地穴出现在你面前。一片被冻结的荒原，时间和空间都被锁定，坚硬且反射性的障碍挡住了你的去路。也许这是对久远过去的反映。
The Age of Steel
钢铁时代
Alloyed Thicket
金属地层
A strange dungeon lies before you. A forest made of metals and alloys. Always malleable, always changing, the line between natural and man-made thin...
1个奇怪的地穴出现在你面前。一片由金属和合金构成的森林。它总是可塑的，总是变化的，自然与人造之间的界限变得模糊...
The Age of Electricity
电力时代
Oasis System
绿洲系统
A strange dungeon lies before you. Circuits run throughout the entire cave, in a similar way to the small streams of water. Electrical currents flow like water, opening the way forward to your goal.
1个奇怪的地穴出现在你面前。整个洞穴布满了电路，就像小溪流一样。电流像水一样流动，为你开辟了通往目标的道路。
The Age of Myths
神话时代
The Catacombs
地下墓穴
A strange dungeon lies before you. Winding age-old catacombs, full of myths and legends. Stories will be the basis of humanity for as long as it will exist.
1个奇怪的地穴出现在你面前。古老的蜿蜒墓穴，充满了神话和传说。故事将是人类存在的基础，只要它存在。

Celebi

Plant the seeds.
种下种子。

1个奇怪的金属生物分解成多个较小的生物，并散落在合金丛林中。如果你把它们重新聚集在一起，会发生什么呢？

马凯亚多年来也有过不少冠军。不可避免地，他们会在下一届锦标赛中被推翻，所以他们累积起来。不过，你将成为他们所有人中最好的冠军，不是吗？不妨向那些被抛弃的人展示一下他们为什么只是“前”冠军。

Turns to Finale Form when only unfainted on team. Ignores the condition of a perfect battle.
当队伍只剩下自身后，将变为终结形态。若在终结形态取得了胜利，依然视为完胜。
When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it restores 25% of its max health.
当精灵吃下一颗树果时，会回复最大生命值的25%。
Raises Attack by 2 steps after knocking out any Pokémon.
打倒对手后，物攻增加2级。
Halves move damage when HP is greater than 50%.
当HP大于50%时，双攻减半。
It changes secondary type to that of the dance moves it's about to use.
将附加属性变为即将使用的舞蹈类技能的属性。
Upon entry, creates an Emotion Room for 4 turns, adding an ability every turn.
出场时，开启1个持续4回合的情感空间，所有精灵每回合随机获得1个特性。
Upon entry, the Pokémon heals itself for 1/5th max HP. This can overheal.
出场时，精灵会恢复最大生命值的1/5。可以过量回复。
Raises Sp. Atk by 2 steps after knocking out any Pokémon.
打倒对手后，特攻增加2级。
Upon entry, traps each opponent in a whirlpool for one turn.
出场时，将所有对手困在潮漩中1回合。
Each turn, raises Speed by 4 steps and loses 1/8th max HP. If Speed was maxed, instead Speed and HP are reset.
每回合结束时，速度增加4级，HP减小1/8，如果速度已达到最大等级，重置速度并回复全部HP。
Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back. Boosts move power by 20% in disguise.
出场时伪装成队友，处于伪装状态时技能威力增加20%。
Heals all non-volatile status conditions and 10% of max HP when it switches out.
离场时，回复稳定性异常和10%HP。
After fainting from exploding, revives after six turns, but requires above 50% HP if caused by others.
因自身的自爆类技能而濒死时，6回合后会重新苏醒，若是因其他精灵的自爆类技能而濒死，则需濒死前自身的HP在50%以上时才能苏醒。
Copies opponents' species' legal Abilities.
复制对手精灵的物种合法特性。
It changes secondary type to that of the light moves it's about to use.
将附加属性变为即将使用的光类技能的属性。
Upon entry, traps each opponent in a sand tomb for one turn.
出场时，将对手困在沙尘中1回合。
It changes secondary type to that of the punching moves it's about to use.
将附加属性变为即将使用的拳类技能的属性。
Speed is raised by one step at the end of each of its turns.
回合结束时，速度增加1级。
Speed is raised each turn. Speed is reset when hit, but the attacker takes 1/8th HP damage for each step lost. The Pokémon takes 1/16th.
每回合速度增加1级，被攻击时自身的速度能力等级还原，每还原1级速度，攻击者就受到1/8HP的伤害，自身受到1/16HP的伤害。
The user's Speed is doubled while using kicking moves. Every third kicking hit must be a crit.
使用踢类技能时速度翻倍，并且每第3次使用的踢类技能的攻击必定会命中要害。
The Pokémon is Mutant-type. If the Pokémon is Deoxys, it will have multiple movesets.
此精灵将视为基因属性，如果此精灵是代欧奇希斯时，代欧奇希斯获得多套技能组。
Powers up Grass-type moves of itself and its allies by 30%.
自身和队友的草属性技能的威力增加30%。
A capsule that allows a Pokémon to switch to another Ability. Only used in Mono Ability Mode.
仅在单特性模式下可用，能将精灵的现有特性变为另一种特性的胶囊。
It may be held by a Pokémon to heal the user by 50% in a pinch (below 25% HP).
让精灵携带后，当HP小于25%时，可回复50%HP。
An item to be held by a Pokémon. The user gets three abilities, but its stats are cut by 10%.
一种可以携带的物品。携带者获得3个特性，但其能力会减小10%。
If held by a Pokémon, it heals its HP by 25% at half health, or 33% in a pinch.
让精灵携带后，吃下时，若当前HP大于25%，则回复25%HP，反之，则回复33%HP。
A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It raises the user's Attack stat by three steps.
激烈地跳起战舞增加气势，自身物攻增加3级。

善战之姿

宁静之雨
18
Stampede
狂奔之足
19
Tactician
战术之慧
20

暴君之怒
21
Warrior
猛士之勇
22
Test Tribe
测试部族
[28]
0
Your team members take one third less damage from sources that aren't attacks.
全员受到的非攻击伤害减小33%。
1
Your team members deal 20% more move damage after their first turn.
全员从自身出场的第2回合开始，技能造成的伤害增加20%。
2
Your team deal 20% more move damage on their first turn out.
全员出场的第1回合技能造成的伤害增加20%。
3
Your team's 'Not Very Effective' or 'Barely Effective' moves deal 50% more damage.
全员在使用被抵抗的技能时，伤害增加50%。
4
Your team members heal for 1/10th HP when swapping out. Your Aid Kit heals for 25% more.
全员在进行替换时，回复10%HP，急救包的效果增加25%。
5
Your team takes 20% less move damage on the turns they enter.
全员出场的回合受到的技能伤害减小20%。
6
Enemy trainers majorly overestimate how much damage their moves do.
对方训练师会严重高估技能造成的伤害。
7
Your team members' moves have a +30% chance to activate their moves' additional effects.
全员技能发动附加效果的概率增加30%。
8
Your team takes 10% less move damage.
全员受到的技能伤害减小10%。
9
You gain 10% more money from battles. If you have more than $100,000, your team gets a boost to Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, and Sp. Def (before modifiers). This bonus scales with the level cap and is currently {b1}.
玩家战斗获得额外10%金钱，拥有超100000金钱时，双攻和双防增加，与等级上限相关，目前{b1}。
10
Your team members gain 10% more EXP in battles. They also get a small boost to Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, and Sp. Def (before modifiers). This bonus scales with the level cap and is currently {b}.
全员战斗获得额外10%经验，双攻和双防小幅度增加，与等级上限相关，目前为{b}。
11
Whenever a member of your team uses a status move, they'll deal 25% more move damage next turn.
全员在使用变化类技能后，下回合技能造成的伤害增加25%。
12
Your team members take 15% less move damage if they're using a status move this turn.
全员如果本回合选择使用变化类技能，那么受到的技能伤害减小15%。
13
Your team has 30% increased Sp. Def. Foes can't lower your team's Sp. Def.
全员获得特防增加30%，且特防不会减小。
14
Your team members berries heal them for 25% more (multiplicative) and their gem-boosted attacks deal 25% more damage (multiplicative).
全员携带的树果的效果增加25%，宝石造成的伤害增加25%。
15
Your able party members and battlers heal for 1/10th HP whenever a foe faints.
全员在对方失去战斗力时，恢复10%HP。
16
Your team has 30% increased Defense. Foes can't lower your team's Defense.
全员的物防增加30%，且物防不会减小。
17
Enemy Pokemon's chance to activate their additional effects against your team members is halved.
对手技能发动附加效果的概率减半。
18
Your team has 15% increased Speed.
全员速度增加15%。
19
Your Pokemon deal 15% more damage to targets that haven’t moved yet this turn. Your priority attacks and priority status moves have doubled PP.
全员对于还没有行动的对手的伤害增加15%，先制技能需要多消耗1点PP。
20
Ignore the first time each battle that one of your team members would flinch or get a non-volatile status condition.
每场战斗免疫1次异常状态或畏缩。
21
Your team members take 15% less move damage if they're using an attack this turn.
全员如果本回合选择使用伤害类技能，那么受到的技能伤害减小15%。
22
This tribe exists to test the PBS extensions system
此部族用于测试PBS扩展系统。

Hook Line and Sinker
海王
[34]
Be officially crowned Champion of Makya.
成为马凯亚的冠军。
Reach the credits with 10 or fewer hours on your save file.
游戏时间10小时以内通关游戏。
Defeat Zain in Prizca West with a shiny Skitty in your party.
在队伍中有闪光向尾喵的情况下，于西宏礼市打倒赞恩。
Decline Mavis' phone call at the end of the game.
游戏结束时拒接梅维斯的电话。
Perfectly defeat Yezera in the Catacombs with the Tarot Amulet activated.
激活护身符的前提下，在地下墓穴中打倒叶泽拉。
Defeat a gym leader while at a level cap below that of the leader's team.
在等级上限低于对方时，打倒道馆馆主 。
Perfect Lambert, the first gym leader, at level cap 15 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高15级的情况下，激活塔罗护身符并完胜兰伯特。
Perfect Eko, the second gym leader, at level cap 20 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高20级的情况下，激活塔罗护身符并完胜艾克。
Perfect Helena, the third gym leader, at level cap 25 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高25级的情况下，激活塔罗护身符并完胜海伦娜。
Perfect Rafael, the fourth gym leader, at level cap 30 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高30级的情况下，激活塔罗护身符并完胜拉斐尔。
Perfect Bence and Zoé, the fifth gym leaders, at level cap 40 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高40级的情况下，激活塔罗护身符并完胜本斯和佐伊。
Perfect Noel, the sixth gym leader, at level cap 45 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高45级的情况下，激活塔罗护身符并完胜诺埃尔。
Perfect Victoire, the seventh gym leader, at level cap 55 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高55级的情况下，激活塔罗护身符并完胜薇克特尔。
Perfect Samorn, the eighth gym leader, at level cap 60 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高60级的情况下，激活塔罗护身符并完胜塞蒙。
Destroy any legendary avatar.
打倒任意传说化身。
Use a Primeval Move.
使用1次原初技能。
Defeat all 8 Team Chasm-created avatars within the locked chambers.
打倒8个上锁的密室中的化身。
Destroy the avatars of Spectrier, Glastrier, and Calyrex in the Crown Chamber.
打倒皇冠之厅的蕾冠王、雪暴马及灵幽马化身。
Destroy the avatar of Rayquaza in the Tempest Realm.
打倒暴风领域的烈空坐化身。
Capture a legendary Pokémon in a regular Poké Ball (thrown normally or created by the Ball Launcher.)
使用普通的精灵球捕捉传说中的精灵。
Capture at least one Pokémon in a Premier Ball, a Cherish Ball, and a Royal Ball.
分别用纪念球、贵重球和皇家球各捕捉1个精灵。
Capture at least one Pokémon in a Potion Ball, a Slice Ball, a Leech Ball, and a Disable Ball.
分别用毒液球、分割球、寄生球和禁制球各捕捉1个精灵。
Visit a PokÉstate plot that has 30 Pokémon in it.
参观一处有30只精灵的庄园。
Fully upgrade your Aid Kit.
全面升级急救包。
Reach Frostflow Farms Center without acquiring the Surf Board.
在未获得冲浪板的情况下抵达风霜农场中心。
Reach Prizca West without defeating the Avatar of Terrakion.
在不打倒代拉基翁化身的前提下抵达西宏礼市。
Connect all Avatar Totems.
点亮所有化身图腾。
Defeat all 7 former Makyan champions.
打倒7位马凯亚前冠军。
After being crowned champion, defeat Pokémon Master Vanya with a full team of genderless Pokémon.
成为冠军后，使用一支全员无性别的队伍打败凡雅。
Complete a full attempt of the Battle Monument (5 battles won).
完成1次完整的对战纪念碑。
Complete a full attempt of the Battle Monument (5 battles won) with a Team whose members were all introduced in the same generation (Pokémon introduced in Tectonic count as a generation.)
以同一世代引入的精灵完成1次完整的对战纪念碑，原创精灵视为新世代。
Complete a full attempt of the Battle Monument (5 battles won) with a Team whose members share no tribes in common.
在不激活部族的前提下完成1次完整的对战纪念碑。
Start a battle while having an active Tribal bonus.
在获得部族加成的前提下进入战斗。
At the end of a turn, have four or more hazards active on the opponent's side.
回合结束时，对手一侧有至少4个陷阱或其它威胁。
At the end of a turn, have a Weather, a Room, and a Screen (on your side) active at the same time.
回合结束时，同时激活天气、空间和己方的屏障。
Deal 1,000 or more damage in one hit.
打出一击1000点以上的伤害。
Deal 10,000 or more damage in one hit.
打出一击10000点以上的伤害。
Hold 500,000 or more money at once.
身上携带超过500,000金钱。
Have more than 1,000,000 experience stored in the EXP-EZ Dispenser at once.
在经验分配器中储存超过1,000,000点经验值。
Achieve the top prize at Aquatopia Menagerie's Ocean Fishing Contest.
在水世界的海钓比赛中拔得头筹。
[1313]
Wild
野生的
Ancient Priest
古代祭司
